story:
Roots In Nature is a community of parents dedicated to providing opportunities for children to find the wonder and magic in nature as well as instill the importance of ecological conservation through year round outdoor play and self directed learning.  We have been leading nature programs since 2016 in central MA and our number of participating families grows with every passing season. When surveyed, the financial burden of weather appropriate clothing and gear was the number one barrier to year round nature discovery that our participants named. With funding, we can provide families for years to come with the clothing and gear that makes this year round nature discovery possible.

 

 

We are asking for $6,000 to buy rain boots, waterproof gloves and mittens, rain coats and pants, base layers (for warmth), hats, hiking boots, high visibility vests (to keep kids safe during hunting season),  hand warmers and t-shirts to identify our adult leaders. These are items that can be used for multiple seasons and by multiple children as they grow.

 

Perks

 

$10 - Lady Bug - shout out on our Facebook page

$25 - Grasshopper - shout on Facebook as well as name on list of contributors on our website

$50 - Cicada - all of the above, plus a hand made thank you card by Roots in Nature children

$100 - June Bug - all of the above, plus a Roots in Nature t-shirt

$250 - Dragonfly Street Team - all of the above, plus a Roots in Nature stainless steel mug and stickers to share with friends

$500 - Monarch VIP - Roots in Nature t-shirt, mug, stickers and VIP tickets to all of our 2019 events

Even if we do not hit our target, we will use what you contribute to start our gear lending program.

The children of today hold the future in their hands and we strongly believe that instilling a deep love and connection to nature now will lead them to be the strong, empowered ecological stewards of the future.

Even if you cannot contribute monetarily, you can still help!  Share this page and tell your friends all about our Gear Lending Program!

story:
Short Summary

 

Hi Everybody,

we are people who cares about the environment and we are very sensible about the problem of plastic in our oceans and as one of the most source of waste.

One day during a typical dinner with friends we asked us a question:

what if a lot of people avoid single-use plastic for one week? how much plastic we can save?

From it the distance of 'No Plastic Game' challenge is very short

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We need money to found the legal society, make a website and do some marketing to increase our visibility. More people join our movement, more plastic we can save!!
  • We want to create a strong global community, all the decision will be made together. 
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will use the money reached for the original intent and we'll add extra work to implement where we failed  

The Impact

The impact of our campaign is very simple:

solve one of the most dangerous problem of the last years!

  • our project is valuable  to you  and to the world because the problem of the waste is global. Some cities and government are studying some law to delete the disposable plastic from the daily life. Don't get caught unprepared
  • With all the contributors and participants we can see our dream come true

Risks & Challenges

We don't have critical risks, because at this stage we don't sel nothing and we don't have manufacturing process.

We have a 9 am-18pm office work, we'll implement all the data in our free time, maybe we'll go long to give back to the participants the results! It depends from how many challenger we'll have. 

We are happy if there is a lot of work to do, it means that many will have decided to participate !!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no problem, we appreciate the time you've spent with us and maybe you can talk about it  to your friends, family or office if you know someone who can be interested!!

Every single voice for us is important!

story:
How can we better the World for future generations to enjoy? The answer is simple, don't destroy it.  My name is Quentin Alexander, a beekeeper from Encinitas CA. I rescue Africanized bees (mean bees) and rehab them at bee clinics into Italian bees (nice bees). Once safe they are placed back into society. I guess you could say I am best described as a problem solver and out-of-the-box thinker

How?

Make molds with wood, put the art piece inside the mold, pour resin, let set up and buff to a shiny finish.

What will be done with the preserved hive pieces?

Use as part of presentation while educating public and promoting bee stewardship in communities.

How else can you help?
Become a bee stewardship advocate, support your local beekeepers and offer to help commercial beekeepers; our future depends on it.

story:
The problem:

A Korean hydroelectric company has already conducted the survey work required to begin construction on a 114 megawat dam in Sumatra's Hadabuan Hills ecosytem, a place where tigers, tapirs, gibbons, and hornbills still mingle. Invasive, destructive development schemes should not be taking place in ecologically sensitive areas such as this were wildlife species such as tigers, tapirs, and hornbills -which are protected by Indonesian law- exist. We have camera trapped and photographed all of these species and more, but we need to install a new set of cameras in and around the dam construction site to prove to the government that this particular area is home to these animals and that the dam should either be cancelled, moved, or drastically downscaled. Your donation will help us pay for new camera traps and fund the field expenses required to set up a new camera trap stuy area around the dam. 

Our work at this site has been covered twice in The Guardian -here and here, as well as on other sites such as The Diplomat (story linked) and Asia Sentinel (story linked). Our project in Cambodia has been covered by Mongabay.

The Impact

At this point, proof of rare species via camera-trapping is probably the only chance of stopping or moving this dam. Your donation helps offer that chance. Everyone who donates will be kept in the loop about what's happening via email and a special blog that we will set up once the camera traps are deployed. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you prefer to use Paypal, you can donate here.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Should the global ecological commons be transformed into ecosystems services that will be quantified, turned into financial commodities and traded? In stark opposition to what green economists have traditionally conceived as the ‘green economy’ – new proposals aim to protect nature by privatizing ‘ecosystem services’. One of the many dangers associated with these new proposals is that environmental decision-making will be moved out of a political sphere and be relocated firmly in the marketplace, such that only those with financial capital can participate. This creative competition challenges artists and designers to respond to new proposals for the financialisation of ecosystem services. Please read the paper Re-Imaging the Commons as ‘The Green Economy’ for background information.

What we need

This campaign aims to raise money for prizes money for the winning entries and for costs towards the publication of the winning entries. We will need $1000 minimum to run this competition – but ideally we will raise significantly more. The more money we raise, the more prize money we can distribute to designers and artists. More money will also mean a better quality publication. Half of the money raised will be given to winning designers and/or artists. The other half will pay expenses for a printed publication and website made with winning entries. EcoLabs will not take money for the time we devote to this project.

About me

I am Dr. Joanna Boehnert, director of EcoLabs. EcoLabs is an environmental communication design studio. I am presently located in Boulder, Colorado where I am Visiting Research Fellow in the Center for Science and Technology Policy Research at CIRES (Cooperative Institute for Research in Environmental Sciences) at the University of Colorado.

What You Can Get

We can offer limited edition posters as thank you gifts. You may chose either the Eco-Literacy Map posters (A2 or A1) and/or other EcoLabs posters (for example An Audit of Development, Planetary Boundaries and The Visual Communication of Ecological Literacy). We can make your organization an official sponsor of this competition and publication. Winning entries will be published with a creative commons license and can then be used to help generate public debate on this topic.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot afford to help, please share this campaign. You can read more on my blog and website where there are many resources and papers available for free.

story:
My name is Mike Luttrell and my wife Laci and I run a dive operation called Diving PCB in Panama City, Florida. A part of our business is ocean awareness by getting people involved in scuba diving. Scuba divers are the ones who make a difference for our oceans. We not only get to see amazingly wonderful things underwater, but we also get to see some problems there too. Trash and conservation issues can be corrected by scuba divers since it is the divers who get to see first hand what is happening beneath the surface. Scuba certification costs are typically around $350-$500 dollars. Not everyone can afford this, which is why we are running this campaign. We believe that teaching people how to scuba dive helps our oceans and we want to be able to get more people involved in scuba diving for FREE. No one gets to see and contribute more to our oceans than scuba divers. Since it is the scuba divers who can make the biggest difference, we feel it is necessary to get more people into this amazing sport. When trash gets picked up underneath the water, it is by scuba divers. When animals are rescued from trash, debris, and structure beneath the water, it is by scuba divers. Donate today and when we meet our goal you will be able to try scuba diving for free anytime for the whole year of 2015. This means you will go on a guided scuba diving tour and learn to dive with a certified instructor for FREE while learning about Ocean Awareness.

We need to raise $225,000 to be able to conduct guided scuba diving tours for FREE for a whole year, teach ocean awareness, and conduct/teach/conduct underwater clean ups. If we do not meet our goal, ALL of the funds will be donated to the non profit Ocean Awareness.
We took over 700 people diving last year. Check out some of our pictures and videos of our diving and our operations of saving sea animals at DivingPCB.com. We hope you will donate and we also hope that we will see you this year, ready to scuba dive.
Our oceans are in trouble, whether people want to believe it or not. If we don't act now, our future generations will not be happy with us. I always think to myself, what will our future generations think of us when they realize that our ocean is dying and it was all caused by our generation not caring, or acting (doing nothing). I hope that our people in the future can enjoy the oceans as we have. The more people we get involved in scuba diving, the better chance our ocean will have at surviving continued generations.
Hope to see you soon.
Mike Luttrell
DivingPCB.com

story:
Sea pollution occurs when harmful effects result from the entry into the ocean of chemicals, particles, industrial, agricultural, and residential waste, noise, or the spread of invasive organisms. Eighty percent of sea pollution comes from land. Air pollution is also a contributing factor by carrying off pesticides or dirt into the ocean. Land and air pollution have proven to be harmful to marine life and its habitats.

The pollution often comes from nonpoint sources such as agricultural runoff, wind-blown debris, and dust. Nutrient pollution, a form of water pollution, refers to contamination by excessive inputs of nutrients. It is a primary cause of eutrophication of surface waters, in which excess nutrients, usually nitrates or phosphates, stimulate algae growth. Many potentially toxic chemicals adhere to tiny particles which are then taken up by plankton and benthic animals, most of which are either deposit feeders or filter feeders. In this way, the toxins are concentrated upward within ocean food chains. Many particles combine chemically in a manner highly depletive of oxygen, causing estuaries to become anoxic.

When pesticides are incorporated into the marine ecosystem, they quickly become absorbed into marine food webs. Once in the food webs, these pesticides can cause mutations, as well as diseases, which can be harmful to humans as well as the entire food web. Toxic metals can also be introduced into marine food webs. These can cause a change to tissue matter, biochemistry, behaviour, reproduction, and suppress growth in marine life. Also, many animal feeds have a high fish meal or fish hydrolysatecontent. In this way, marine toxins can be transferred to land animals, and appear later in meat and dairy products.

Our project is to have a safe and clean beach and sea.

story:
Short Summary

Oakheart Farm, a sustainable intentional community in Virginia, has been selected as a Glass Explorer. We want to use Glass to educate people about permaculture and sustainability, as we take an old, neglected family farm and revitalize it.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to use Glass:

  • to live-stream when we're shearing our alpacas, harvesting our crops, and working the farm
  • to show our successes and our failures so that eeryone can learn from our experience
  • to fulfill our goal of becoming an educational organization and freely share what we've learned

We need $5000 to pay for the Google Glass device, and to make the trip to New York to the Google service center to pick it up and get trained in its use. This funding will cover the actual cost of the device and the travel expenses for two of our people to drive to New York and back, which we project to take three days, two for the travel and one for the Google service center visit.

We're using the Fixed Funding model, so if we don't get fully funded, all contributions will be returned and we get nothing. If we go over our funding goal, we'll add stretch items!

See the Perks for the rewards at each level of funding contribution. We will be sending out farm products, one of a kind custom made items, and providing an onsite experience as part of the reward structure. 

Each level of reward includes all the levels below, with the exception of the sample kit, which already has everything in it.

The Impact

Our goal is to show people that you can remain connected to the world and still walk lightly on the Earth. We're going forward into a sustainable future, not back into a pre-Internet past.

Imagine watching over a farmer's shoulder in real time as livestock are tended. Do you want to know that the animals are being cared for humanely? Do you want to know that the chickens really are free range? Imagine a live camera on the farm, and the transparency that results.

Imagine joining a CSA, a Community Supported Agriculture food distribution. Once a month you get a box containing what the farm is currently harvesting. What's in it? It's a surprise. With Glass, we can show you what we're harvesting, show you the boxes as we're packing them, so you can do your menu planning before the box arrives.

Imagine going to the farmers' market and knowing what's going to be available before you get there.

You don't have to imagine. We're going to make it real.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that the economy is tight. We're farmers. But there's stuff you can do besides contribute to this funding campaign.

  • Buy your produce at your local farmers' market. It doesn't have to be from us. Every purchase you make from a local farmer, anywhere, helps support community agriculture.
  • Find out more about permaculture at http://permacultureprinciples.com/index.php.
  • Look into urban gardening. You can grow your own vegetables, compost your kitchen trash, and in some communities raise your own chickens.
  • Read Toby Hemenway's book Gaia's Garden, about how to set up a permaculture garden in your back yard.
  • Spread the word about our campaign. Tell people about our farm. The more the word gets out, the better a chance we'll have not only of funding this campaign, but of getting out our message, that it's possible to live in a sustainable way and still be part of the modern world.

Our goal is to show people that you can remain connected to the world and still walk lightly on the Earth. We're going forward into a sustainable future, not back into a pre-Internet past.
Imagine watching over a farmer's shoulder in real time as livestock are tended. Do you want to know that the animals are being cared for humanely? Do you want to know that the chickens really are free range? Imagine a live camera on the farm, and the transparency that results.
Imagine joining a CSA, a Community Supported Agriculture food distribution. Once a month you get a box containing what the farm is currently harvesting. What's in it? It's a surprise. With Glass, we can show you what we're harvesting, show you the boxes as we're packing them, so you can do your menu planning before the box arrives.
Imagine going to the farmers' market and knowing what's going to be available before you get there.
You don't have to imagine. We're going to make it real.


Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that the economy is tight. We're farmers. But there's stuff you can do besides contribute to this funding campaign.

Buy your produce at your local farmers' market. It doesn't have to be from us. Every purchase you make from a local farmer, anywhere, helps support community agriculture.
Find out more about permaculture at http://permacultureprinciples.com/index.php.
Look into urban gardening. You can grow your own vegetables, compost your kitchen trash, and in some communities raise your own chickens.
Read Toby Hemenway's book Gaia's Garden, about how to set up a permaculture garden in your back yard.
Spread the word about our campaign. Tell people about our farm. The more the word gets out, the better a chance we'll have not only of funding this campaign, but of getting out our message, that it's possible to live in a sustainable way and still be part of the modern world.

story:
Introducing ACT

 

ACT is a shopping app that advises you about the environmental and workers rights impact of products so that you can make the right decision for the planet and its people

 

ACT helps you shop efficiently with regards to brand, location and price and if you want to it also gives you the full opportunity to choose the products that are sustainable for the environment and for human rights.

A wealth of filters will allow you to search for certified organic, non-certified organic, non-GMO, nutritional information etc.

 

 


 

 

From your tomatoes to your apples, beer, meat - everything you need is categorized and information (certifications, reviews, ratings) is gathered for each brand.

A bit like a review site, but with more science behind. This way a wealth of information is gathered in one place for your information, and for a global audience so you know you are not ACTing alone. In fact your actions together with 1000s of ACT users will make a big difference. Together we gather the data, we supply the science and your make the purchasing desision.

 

This is possibly the first time a service connects and helps consumers globally know how their day-to-day grocery shopping affects the planet & the people and where the only metric for driving change is shown in real-time:

"How much money is flowing to the sustainable companies through our combined purchasing power of sustainable products."

We assume that since you are visiting this campaign (thank you for that), you are already very well aware that our environment and equality has never been harder pressed with 4 out of 9 planetary boundaries already crossed - climate change is just one of them. If you are not aware of this please take a look at our Facebook page for inputs on this. See under "About" in the top for links.

We have a vision and a goal to put all of us in the driver’s seat for shaping a sustainable future for us and our kids and as fast as we want to see that happen.

We are now 3 months away from our first pilot and we ask for your help so that we can develop the last parts of our software and get to the market.

With your help, our team will be able to finish development of the platform and get through our first pilot, granting you access to the best shopping tool, so that we can start buying back our future!

 

We have been working with the ACT project for more than 2 years now and a lot of things have been accomplished including partnerships, testing and surveying of end users and retailers. 

The main milestones include:

- Patent pending on our scalable rating system 

- Rating of 30.000 grocery products

- Design of 2 apps that are now in development 

- Creation of possibly the biggest grocery category structure in the world 

- Signed letters of agreement with potential pilots.

 

Our focus is on finishing the development of the shopping list app (shown in the videos) and to make sure it is an effective shopping tool that gives you a free and informed choice whether you are shopping for price, location, sustainability, transparency or a mix of these.

We are also building a smart checkout app that can be used by small stores for handling your checkouts.

With your help we will get faster to market and increase the quality of the product so that our first pilot becomes as solid as possible. Once we get to the pilot we will be fundraising again to fuel our growth phase so we can get out to as many as possible.

We want to bring ACTion to you and the planet as fast as we can. To give you an idea about how much we can achieve in the near future, consider this :

 

Our funding goal is 24,000 USD. Together with investors that can take us through our pilot and onto launch.

Unfortunately, in our society today, one of the main drivers for change is money! How much is shifted, how fast and in what direction. ACT puts you and all the other ACT users in the driver’s seat for shifting money towards a sustainable future.

The aim of this app is to create a GLOBAL collaboration platform around sustainable shopping to help solve some of the biggest problems facing the people and the planet today.

Because this is a big task, the more money we have available the faster we will be able to reach that goal, and the less money we will need to take from investors, which in turn will give us more momentum.

Our society is coming to a historic turning point in time. We cannot continue in the way we have previously.

Help us make ACT possible, so we can buy back our future.

Thank you for your help!

 

 

 

We are passionate about transparency and environmental sustainability. The majority of us are working on this project alongside our full time jobs, often working late into the evenings and into weekends because we believe in this project’s huge potential for creating a better world.

The team is international, with more than 10 nationalities represented and expertise in a wide range of disciplines. We know each other well through working together on this project. 

The structure is flat which allows us to disagree openly about the direction of our project and we do not have any problems telling our Danish CEO when he is too crazy. 

 

ACT exists as a Cooperative/Limited Company hybrid in Norway to make sure ACT is never distracted from its important work. This draws on the democratic strengths of being an employee-controlled organisation, but also benefits from the corporate advantages of a limited liability company

 

Other ways you can help

If you can’t contribute financially you can still help!

- You can always spread the word and make some noise about our campaign.

- Use the Indiegogo Share tools above to promote our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, etc.

We deeply appreciate your support.

 

Shout Out - 5 USD

Be a part of ACT Hall of Fame in the App with a special mention thanking you. For the person who supports our goals and wants to stay informed until the app is released to the public (after early access). High five!

- Special mention in the app

 

Early Access - 10 USD

We want you to enjoy the full power of ACT with this special offer. Get exclusive early access to our app when it is ready. 

- Special mention

- Early Access

 

Sustainable Shopper - 15 USD

Get the ACT Sustainable Shopping Guide + all of the above.

- Special mention

The Shopping Geek - 25 USD

How can I choose the design of the perk I want?

When you checkout in Indiegogo you will have the option to choose between designs based on the ones we have above in this page.

When will the app be ready?

The first MVP will be ready for November and the first version is expected to be available for custumers during the first months of next year.

When will I receive the perks? 

Perks will be shipped 3 weeks after the campaign has ended.

How does ACT rate products?

We are working with leading researchers in the field of environmental and human rights impact evaluation of products and value chains to constantly improve our rating system that currently rates most grocery products and scales globally at the same time as staying within a minimum level of accuracy.

How can I invest in the company?

Please subscribe to our investor mail list for breaking news by clicking the button under (we respect your privacy):

story:
მე ვარ ელ მობი, ვებ-გვერდი www.elektromobili.ge-სა და ფეიბუქის გვერდის „ელექტრომობილი“-ს ავტორი და ადმინისტრატორი. რამდენიმე ხნის წინ www.change.org   -ზე დავიწყე პეტიცია საქართველოში შიდა წვის ძრავიანი ავტომობილების იმპორტისა და წარმოების აკრძალვის მიზნით. პეტიცია მიმართულია საქართველოს პარლამენტისადმი, რათა მათ მიიღონ შესაბამისი კანონი. 

იმისთვის, რომ საქართველოს პარლამენტმა მიაქციოს ყურადღება ჩვენს პეტიციას საჭიროა, რომ რაც შეიძლება მეტმა საქართველოს მოქალაქემ მოაწეროს ხელი მას. შესაბამისად, ერთადერთი გზა, რომელსაც ახლა მე ვხედავ, ეს არის ფასიანი რეკლამის განთავსება ფეისბუქზე, კერძოდ, ჩემს საიტზე "ელექტრომობილი". რატომ ფეისბუქზე, იმიტომ რომ change.org-მა წერილობით უარი გამიცხადა რეკლამირებაზე, საქართველოდან ფასიანი რეკლამის განთავსების სერვისი არ ქონის გამო. გარდა ამისა, "ელექტრომობილზე" უკვე დევს პოსტი პეტიციის შესახებ, რომელიც მე, ჩემი ფინანსური სახსრებით, რამდენიც შემეძლო გავარეკლამე. შესაბამისად, რეკლამის გაგრძელების შემდეგ მოხდება ახალი კონტიგენტის მოზიდვა და გამორიცხული იქნება დუბლირებული რეკლამირება.

მისაღებია ნებისმიერი ოდენობის დახმარება, თითოეული ცენტი მნიშვნელოვანია. იმისთვის, რომ მოვიცვა ფეისბუქის ქართული საზოგადოება (დაახლოებით 1 500 000 მომხმარებელი) სულ საჭიროა დაახლოებით 10 000 $. პეტიციის ხელმომწერთა რაოდენობა დღეს 1700 შეადგენს ანუ ამ თანხის მისაღებად საშუალოდ 5,5 $ ანუ 13 ლარი. ჩვენი მიზნის მისაღწევად ღირს ამ თანხის გაღება, რას იტყვით?!. აუცილებელი არ არის მთლიანი თანხის ერთიანად გადმორიცხვა, გადმორიცხეთ მინიმალური ოდენობა, დაელოდეთ ჩემგან ყოველთვიური ანგარიშის გამოქვეყნებას და დარწმუნდით, რომ თანხა მიზნობრივად დაიხარჯა. ამასთან, მომხრეთა მომატებისა და შემომწირველთა რაოდენობის გაზრდასთან ერთად შემცირდება ყოველთვიურად საჭირო შემოსაწირი თანხის ოდენობაც.

თქვენი მხარდაჭერის  და თანადგომის იმედით,

პატივისცემით,

ელ მობი.

story:
Présentation détaillée du projet

Chaque année, des tonnes de nourriture, d'équipement, de vêtements, de linge..., sont écartés par les yachts et les villas pour être renouvelés. En 2014 Jean-Luc Annone, Président de DOCKWAY sas et Président aussi de l'Association ECO-MER, premier partenaire associatif de Dockway,  spécialisée dans les collectes anti-gaspillages au profit des nécessiteux via son événement les YACHTS du COEUR, et Martine Annone, cadre retraitée Carefour France, direction projet internet DOCKWAY et trésorière de l'Association ECO-MER* , créent l'application d'approvisionnement des yachts et des villas et de revalorisation humanitaire des surplus www.dockway.com.

Notre objectif est qu'une fois les Yachts et les Villas livrés, les surplus de denrées, vêtements, linges, etc... au lieu d'être jetés, seront collectés sur le lieu livré pour être redistribués selon les besoins, aux associations spécialisées du terrain, Banques Alimentaires et autres. 

À quoi servira la collecte de fonds ?

En soutenant notre projet, vous nous permettrez de :

-Développer notre Application "DOCKWAY" mondialement, dans le but de donner l'exemple d'une nouvelle société " l'Entreprise Socialement Responsable".

- Faire connaître notre action de redistribution auprès du plus grand nombre de yachts et de villas sur la Côte d'Azur, la communication dans ce projet étant un atout majeur du développement de notre principe de vie qui est le non gaspillage de l'existant et la valorisation humanitaire des surplus!

- Décupler nos collectes au profit du plus grand nombre de personnes dans le besoin dans le monde

- Centraliser les collectes dans un entrepôt adapté afin d'en faciliter la distribution aux associations ayant besoin de ce soutien.

Depuis 2009, l'association, ECO-MER, premier partenaire associatif de DOCKWAY SAS, a collecté, outre linges et uniformes marins, 17 tonnes de denrées, soit l'équivalent de 34 000 repas auprès des équipages des Yachts par le biais de ses événements les YACHTS DU CŒUR, au profit des associations spécialisées dans la redistribution de terrain aux personnes dans le besoin telles que la Banque Alimentaire. 
Beaucoup des personnes aidées par ces associations sont souvent des retraités qui ont perdu un conjoint et se qui retrouvent sans assez d'argent pour s'acheter à manger et nos jeunes sans moyens qui galèrent pour terminer leurs études et qui espèrent pour une meilleure vie. Aider le projet DOCKWAY "les YACHTS DU CŒUR" c'est leur donner l'espoir sans lequel rien n'est faisable. 

Historique de l'entreprise

DOCKWAY SAS a été créée en février 2013 par Jean-Luc ANNONE, professionnel du Yachting et personnalité du monde marin depuis 1995, Président de l'association ECO-MER. Équipe de gestion : Président : Jean-Luc ANNONE, créateur de sites internet, commercial du Yachting. Directrice du service informatique : Martine ANNONE, ancien cadre du groupe CARREFOUR, directrice de projets informatiques. Produits/services : Le site de vente internet DOCKWAY.COM est un centre commercial spécialisé haut de gamme avec ses multiples vendeurs et ses différents rayons. Il est le seul site à pouvoir répondre aux besoins d'approvisionnement globaux et de redistribution des surplus des yachts et des villas. Ces derniers réclament plus de produits, plus de services, plus de qualité, plus vite et 24 heures sur 24.

Risques et défis

  • Il est certain que le monde du haut de gamme n'est pas peuplé qu'avec des philanthropes; mais par l'exemple de votre soutien sans lequel nous n'aurions jamais accompli ce que nous avons déjà accompli, nous sommes confiant de pouvoir populariser et réussir le projet Dockway, les Yachts du Coeur, et décupler les collectes mondialement tout en montrant l'image  d'une société "Socialement Responsable" que nous espérons devenir un jour la norme plutôt que l'exception.

Autres façon d'aider

En cette période de crise, certaines personnes ne pourrons hélas pas contribuer à notre projet. Cependant, vous pouvez toujours nous aider en nous recommandant et cela nous sera toujours vraiment utile :

  • Utilisez les outils de partage Indiegogo pour communiquer sur notre action !
  • Passez le mot et faites de la publicité autour de notre projet Dockway, Les Yachts du Coeur !

Un grand merci pour votre soutien.

story:
My name is Alan Thom. I am the co-founder and managing partner of the 'HISCORE Engine Project'. Walter Reed, my American partner, is co-founder and the owner of the HISCORE Engine intellectual property. Walter and I are the Principals of the Project. My role is Corporate and Commercial Affairs responsible for funding, and Walter is the Technical Director. The Project is a joint Australian-American partnership. I am the Creator and Owner of this Campaign.


THE HISCORE ENGINE PROJECT

The Project has been established for the development and global comercialization of the unique HISCORE Engine technology. A game changing  green, climate friendly, technology that will help make a greener Earth and preserve our planet for future generations. The HISCORE will be the future of engines with applications in all classes of vehicles.

The specific objective of this campaign is to raise the initial funds to build and test the new 450hp HISCORE Engine which has been upscale designed from a lower powered engine model a proven technology concept. This funding will enable us to reach the pre-production milestone.

OUR TECHNOLOGY OBJECTIVE AND IMPACT

Our aim is for our efficient low or zero emissions "green" HISCORE Engine technology to supersede the inefficient highly polluting internal combustion engine (ICE) in vehicles. The introduction will impact positively and beneficially on climate change. The Introduction of our innovative HISCORE Engine will start the reverse of global pollution being caused by the internal combustion engine in all types of vehicles around the world. Particularly by heavy truck transport, a major global polluter  - we are starting our technology application roll-out in the heavy vehicle industry sector. 

With Earth's growing population consequently requiring the growth of the number of vehicles on roads therefore consequently increasing pollution - and with vehicle CO2 exhaust emissions highly contributing to global warming and climate change - the HISCORE is an engine whose time has come = it effectively is a global pollution solution. 

THE TECHNOLOGY

The HiSCOrE, formost, is a "High Torque, Silent, Closed-Cycle, Orbital Engine'. Unique steam-powered rotary engine technology. A new fuel-efficient and low-emissions technology = a climate friendly green engine. It can be simply described as a closed-cycle external combustion engine with water as the working fluid. Being an external combustion engine (ECE) it is flexi-fuel, that is it can burn any fuel in its power plant (prime-power unit), liquid or gaseous, or a combination of both (dual fuel). The  external combustion engine is not a new technology concept, it is a long-proven and acceptable technology that has been around for a long time with applications in steam locomotives, steam turbine ship propulsion and steam turbine power generation. The HISCORE engine system is a micro-sized version with the difference that the efficient HISCORE engine (the prime-mover unit component) replaces the turbine component. It is scalable from palm size 8hp up to thousands of horsepower. It can also uniquely function as an open-cycle high pressure direct injection (HPDI) engine with other than steam expansion fuels.

The HISCORE is a global impacting power and propulsion system for a diverse range of global market applications across land-based, maritime and aviation industries.

The purpose-designed HISCORE-1600 450hp engine is a generic power model that can be aftermarket (after purchase) retrofitted into the millions of heavy articulated trucks (these are the trucks that tow trailers, see photo below) now on the roads around the world (Internal combustion taken engine out, HISCORE Engine put in). 

In comparison with a 450hp ICE over the same route distance, the HISCORE-1600  will indicatively reduce diesel fuel consumption and therefore GHG/CO2 exhaust emissions reduction by better than 60%, better again with natural gas fuel, around +10%. Being a silent running engine, 100% noise pollution reduction. The significant fuel cost savings make retrofitting a compelling investment take-up by truck owners = expedient implementation of HISCORE engines around the world. Fuel consumption savings of 60% = fuel cost savings 60% (dollar amount variable on pump fuel price) = HISCORE engine demand = emissions saving = healthier environment = smiley planet. For every litre of diesel fuel burn saved by HISCORE = a saving of 2.67kg or 22.2lbs per US gallon, of CO2, significant pollution savings when you apply 60% emissions savings to the amount of diesel consumed by the number of heavy trucks around the world. 

Why Steam Power

When boiling water reaches 100C boiling point it turns into steam and expands 1600 times, the most of any medium known to man. The grandfather of thermodynamics, Carnot, proposed six conditions for a practical engine...he did not include efficiency. They were: (1) Safety (2) Solidity (3) DurabiIity (4) Compact (5) Low Cost (6) Fuel Economy. In today's world of harmful emissions, threat of runaway green house gas effect and finite reserves of fuel oil, we could change condition (6), surely with Carnot's approval, to Fuel Economy with Zero Emissions. For our ideal (HISCORE) engine in the 21st century, we could add a condition (7) Silent!

= The HISCORE Steam driven rotary piston displacement engine

Under our fuel development program we are working on both compressed air and liquid-air as a sustainable renewable energy fuel for HISCORE engine applications to deliver zero polluting exhaust emissions, only air. The HISCORE will also be tested with this expansion fuel power. The recent UN IPCC Report warned that we have to be weaned off fossil fuels by century end. The HISCORE air-fueled (gas or liquid) engine will contribute greatly to this and play its part for greening the Earth.

Key Attributes are:

  • Fuel consumption economy 
  • Emissions reduction (up to 100% - depending on fuel type)
  • Fuel cost economy
  • Flexi-Fuel capability
  • Silent running (like an electric vehicle)
  • High torque (like an electric motor)

See our website for more information including more attributes of the engine: www.hiscore-engines.com

The HISCORE-1600 model has been designed and now at the stage for building and testing. Its performance has been PhD. calculated. 


The US-based highly qualified design team consists of co-founder Walter Reed as the technology's IP owner and, Aaron Lasky and Kent Bingham:                                   

Walter Reed: http://www.linkedin.com/pub/walter-reed/b/97b/680                 Aaron Lasky: www.linkedin.com/in/aartdesigns                                                                       Kent Bingham: www.linkedin.com/pub/kent-bingham/a/616/9b1

Walter Reed will be the project's technical project manager for the building of the new higher-powered 450hp HISCORE-1600 Engine which is based on the previously test- proven 100hp (Gen-2) engine (see below).

FUNDING AND CONTRIBUTIONS

$1,500,000 USD funding is required to build and test the higher powered HISCORE-1600 model engine(s). This will take the Project to the pre-production milestone.

To date funding has been (in kind) from the Principals and time and effort  contributed by other team members over the past five years of the HISCORE's design development. The minimum funding we need for the first stage building and testing is $1,500,000. Any amount received over our goal, or not used, will be rolled over and applied towards funding our next stage development and commercialization. All monies received will be only applied towards HISCORE Engine - all for the good cause. Total capitalization of the Project is US$6,500,000 including the initial US$1,500,000 - and the balance we already have expressions of interest to provide subject the successful testing of the engine. The additional funding is the working capital for the 'HISORE Engine Systems' company to set-up, commence business operations and start retrofitting trucks - under the business plan this roll-out would be initially and simultaneously in both Australia and the USA (there are 400,000 articulated trucks in Australia and nearly 3,000,000 in the US), the USA the major market.

We realize that a lot of Contributers will be required, but we know that there are people out there in the international community that really seriously care as much as we care about our planet's health and future who will see the funding worthiness of our "making a difference" green technology. Because, "THERE IS NO PLANET B" ...Jose Maria Figueres, Carbon War Room.

Use of Funds (estimates): 
Commercial expenses $340,000: Fees/charges $170,000 | Corporate $10,000 | Admin $30,000 | Communications $10,000 | Legal & accounting $80,000 | Travel $40,000
Technical expenses $1,160,000: Project management $280,000 | Engineering $90,000 | Component parts/materials $130,000 | Contractor machining, engine assembly, build + test services $510,000 | Overheads/contingency $150,000

HISCORE COMPANY

Once Indiegogo crowdfunding is completed we will form the HISCORE (Mother) company, 'HISCORE Engine Systems Pty Ltd' an Australian registered private company. At the same time opening the USA wholly subsidiary company, HISCORE Engine Systems (USA), LLC.

CONTRIBUTION SUPPORT

Given the goal amount and the number of potential contributors that could be involved and what would be logistically involved, sorry but at this project funding stage (pre-product launch) we are not offering material incentive perks - if we did, because of the cost to us of this we would have to substantially inflate the minimum funding goal amount and therefore jeopardize achieving, fulfilling, our bottom-line funding goal. However we are open to suggestions. We believe the contribution incentive is obvious, opportunity to be involved in helping to reverse global vehicle pollution to save the planet! We are appealing to your philanthropy spirit to support a worthy project.

It will be rewarding for you to know that by your contribution you will be making a statement to the world about a concern that is important to you and by this support contribution your voice will be heard. You can proudly say, " I made the HISCORE happen". You will have made a positive and meaningful contribution, made a difference, done something worthwhile, towards saving our over-polluted planet.

Our Project needs 'crowd power' support to bring it to life and fruition. If you share our vision and passion and want to help make a difference to combat global warming and climate change, please back and support the HISCORE Engine - your planet will thank you.

Let's get the HISCORE on the road, please give it a push.The Contribution amount is left to you. As a guide, $5, $10, $25, $50, $100.

But if you cannot contribute please tell your friends about this worthy campaign, spread the word, thanks.

TIMELINE

Timeline for the engine build and test completion we estimate 12 months from Indiegogo funding completion date. Subject funding, we would like our demonstration truck to be on the road by end of 2015. Operations start-up mid 2016.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

There are always risks involved with funding/backing any new invention. However in the HISCORE's case this is deemed minimized by the fact that:

1) The HISCORE Engine prime-mover unit concept has been previously proven, the previous  Generation-2 model won awards. The 1600 model is an improved upscaled version, higher powered.

2) The flash boiler technology (prime-power unit) component in the HISCORE closed cycle system is long-proven technology. Flash boilers are available commercially-off-the-shelf (COTS) but for the HISCORE-1600 model we needed a special design to meet high performance specifications and designed our own.The HISCORE Flash Boiler is a proprietary design.

3) The external combustion engine (ECE) is a proven and accepted technology concept in a closed-cycle system (eg steam locomotives, steam turbine ship propulsion and steam turbine power generation). The HISCORE engine system is a micro version with the difference that the HISCORE engine prime-power unit replaces the turbine component.

4) Any original design problems, challenges, that may arise during building and testing can be solved by the highly respected and qualified team engineers,  supported by specialist consultants/associates if necessary.

NEED MORE INFORMATION

If you require further information or clarification or have a question: Please visit the website www.hiscore-engines.com or contact me via Comments or personally by email alanthom@rm.quik.com.au

(Also happy to address any skepticism comment. It's not unusual for new innovative technologies particularly like a new engine concept arrival to attract some degree of skepticism. Where would we be without innovation and forward vision!).

WE LOOK FORWARD TO YOUR SUPPORT
story_txt:
My name is Alan Thom. I am the co-founder and managing partner of the 'HISCORE Engine Project'. Walter Reed, my American partner, is co-founder and the owner of the HISCORE Engine intellectual property. Walter and I are the Principals of the Project. My role is Corporate and Commercial Affairs responsible for funding, and Walter is the Technical Director. The Project is a joint Australian-American partnership. I am the Creator and Owner of this Campaign.



THE HISCORE ENGINE PROJECT
The Project has been established for the development and global comercialization of the unique HISCORE Engine technology. A game changing  green, climate friendly, technology that will help make a greener Earth and preserve our planet for future generations. The HISCORE will be the future of engines with applications in all classes of vehicles.
The specific objective of this campaign is to raise the initial funds to build and test the new 450hp HISCORE Engine which has been upscale designed from a lower powered engine model a proven technology concept. This funding will enable us to reach the pre-production milestone.
OUR TECHNOLOGY OBJECTIVE AND IMPACT
Our aim is for our efficient low or zero emissions "green" HISCORE Engine technology to supersede the inefficient highly polluting internal combustion engine (ICE) in vehicles. The introduction will impact positively and beneficially on climate change. The Introduction of our innovative HISCORE Engine will start the reverse of global pollution being caused by the internal combustion engine in all types of vehicles around the world. Particularly by heavy truck transport, a major global polluter  - we are starting our technology application roll-out in the heavy vehicle industry sector. 
With Earth's growing population consequently requiring the growth of the number of vehicles on roads therefore consequently increasing pollution - and with vehicle CO2 exhaust emissions highly contributing to global warming and climate change - the HISCORE is an engine whose time has come = it effectively is a global pollution solution. 
THE TECHNOLOGY
The HiSCOrE, formost, is a "High Torque, Silent, Closed-Cycle, Orbital Engine'. Unique steam-powered rotary engine technology. A new fuel-efficient and low-emissions technology = a climate friendly green engine. It can be simply described as a closed-cycle external combustion engine with water as the working fluid. Being an external combustion engine (ECE) it is flexi-fuel, that is it can burn any fuel in its power plant (prime-power unit), liquid or gaseous, or a combination of both (dual fuel). The  external combustion engine is not a new technology concept, it is a long-proven and acceptable technology that has been around for a long time with applications in steam locomotives, steam turbine ship propulsion and steam turbine power generation. The HISCORE engine system is a micro-sized version with the difference that the efficient HISCORE engine (the prime-mover unit component) replaces the turbine component. It is scalable from palm size 8hp up to thousands of horsepower. It can also uniquely function as an open-cycle high pressure direct injection (HPDI) engine with other than steam expansion fuels.

The HISCORE is a global impacting power and propulsion system for a diverse range of global market applications across land-based, maritime and aviation industries.


The purpose-designed HISCORE-1600 450hp engine is a generic power model that can be aftermarket (after purchase) retrofitted into the millions of heavy articulated trucks (these are the trucks that tow trailers, see photo below) now on the roads around the world (Internal combustion taken engine out, HISCORE Engine put in). 


In comparison with a 450hp ICE over the same route distance, the HISCORE-1600  will indicatively reduce diesel fuel consumption and therefore GHG/CO2 exhaust emissions reduction by better than 60%, better again with natural gas fuel, around +10%. Being a silent running engine, 100% noise pollution reduction. The significant fuel cost savings make retrofitting a compelling investment take-up by truck owners = expedient implementation of HISCORE engines around the world. Fuel consumption savings of 60% = fuel cost savings 60% (dollar amount variable on pump fuel price) = HISCORE engine demand = emissions saving = healthier environment = smiley planet. For every litre of diesel fuel burn saved by HISCORE = a saving of 2.67kg or 22.2lbs per US gallon, of CO2, significant pollution savings when you apply 60% emissions savings to the amount of diesel consumed by the number of heavy trucks around the world. 
Why Steam Power
When boiling water reaches 100C boiling point it turns into steam and expands 1600 times, the most of any medium known to man. The grandfather of thermodynamics, Carnot, proposed six conditions for a practical engine...he did not include efficiency. They were: (1) Safety (2) Solidity (3) DurabiIity (4) Compact (5) Low Cost (6) Fuel Economy. In today's world of harmful emissions, threat of runaway green house gas effect and finite reserves of fuel oil, we could change condition (6), surely with Carnot's approval, to Fuel Economy with Zero Emissions. For our ideal (HISCORE) engine in the 21st century, we could add a condition (7) Silent!
= The HISCORE Steam driven rotary piston displacement engine
Under our fuel development program we are working on both compressed air and liquid-air as a sustainable renewable energy fuel for HISCORE engine applications to deliver zero polluting exhaust emissions, only air. The HISCORE will also be tested with this expansion fuel power. The recent UN IPCC Report warned that we have to be weaned off fossil fuels by century end. The HISCORE air-fueled (gas or liquid) engine will contribute greatly to this and play its part for greening the Earth.



Key Attributes are:


Fuel consumption economy 
Emissions reduction (up to 100% - depending on fuel type)
Fuel cost economy
Flexi-Fuel capability

Silent running (like an electric vehicle)

High torque (like an electric motor)

See our website for more information including more attributes of the engine: www.hiscore-engines.com

story:
Help everyone to play their part in tackling global warming

Be part of this important initiative


Do you know how much carbon the food you eat or grow captures?


The Problem

The world is heating up. The gas Carbon Dioxide is a main contributor to global warming. 

Capturing carbon reduces the thickening of the atmosphere, this helps reduce global warming.  

Massive numbers of decisions are being made everyday in relation to food grown and eaten. (Approximately 40% of the world's population are farmers and all of the world's population eat food).

The decisions about what is grown have an impact on the amount of carbon in the atmosphere and so impact global warming.

Most people, however, are unable to access information on how much carbon fruits and vegetables emit, store & capture.

Farmers, food gardeners and consumers are making decisions about fruits & vegetables every day.

Various types of fruits and vegetables emit, capture & store carbon differently. 

The Solution 

The Allripe team is creating a free web-based Application that can calculate the amount of carbon captured by growing fruits and vegetables. We call this the Carbon Capture Calculator. This will enable growers to measure exactly how much carbon their produce is capturing & storing. Growers can more easily calculate which fruits & vegetables are capturing carbon the most effectively.

We believe this is a great tool to empower anyone to create positive changes for the environment.

You will be helping many growers as well as the environment by supporting the Carbon Capture Calculator.

The Allripe team is creating a carbon capture calculator that allows anyone growing food to measure how much they are capturing and aggregate their capturing with others. This will enable them to see exactly how they are helping the environment. This can also be used as the basis of a database to help gain greater recognition of small scale producers who are often overlooked in carbon capture. 

To accurately calculate the amount of carbon that is captured, stored & emitted by fruit and vegetable producers, the calculator will need to consider over 50 factors.

These factors will be tied together by an algorithm developed by the Allripe team, which will then produce an exact measure of the amount of carbon captured, emitted & stored. 

It is critical that growers understand the impact of the types of fruits & vegetables they are growing as well as the impact of their methods of growing.

This application will allow you to share your progress with a group or a community. You can aggregate your “captured carbon” to see how much you and your group have captured. You can also set targets and goals. You can also see how people from different parts of the world are doing their part in reversing their carbon footprint. This will provide meaningful data to growers and also to the wider community.

We want to make this calculator as effective and easy to use as possible. This should support & encourage people to make good decisions about growing fruits and vegetables. 

You can make a difference

You can support this campaign with contributions and we would also appreciate if you can get the word out. The more people aware of what they can do to capture carbon the better. 

We need $15,000 to complete the work on the Carbon Capture Calculator. We have already developed part of it and now need support to develop the rest so that it is ready to use. So far our work has included: research, databases, modelling and coding. 

We need additional funds to help make the Carbon Capture Calculator for Food Growers happen. 

Your support will be used for:

* further modelling & database development 

* coding 

* rigorous testing

* improving the user experience

Get recognition as a Carbon Captor

Contributing $2 will get you a thank you for your contribution to the Carbon Capture Calculator.

Contributing $10 will get your initials as a supporter on the Carbon Captors page.

Contributing $50 will get your name as a supporter on the Carbon Captors page.

Contributing $100 will get your name listed as a sponsor on the Carbon Captors page.

Contributing $500 will get your name highlighted on the Carbon Captors page.

Contributing $1000 will get your name in the headlines on the Carbon Captors page as well as your ability to write a message on the page.

Contributing $3500 will make you an Associate Producer of the Carbon Capture Calculator and you will be listed in the Credits (only 2 available).

Contributing $7000 will make you the Executive Producer of the Carbon Capture Calculator and you will be listed in the Credits (only 1 available).

The Allripe team have already created a number of free functions for people to assess food, including: a function to upload & share assessments, a food assessment learning game, a visual catalogue to assess food you grow and more. We have the capability to create meaningful tools for food gardeners and small growers. You can see more at the Allripe website www.allripe.com

We need your support to help build the Carbon Capture Calculator.

The Allripe team help people to assess food quality & safety themselves, with an emphasis on food gardeners and small farmers. These people play an important role in capturing carbon. This project is a great way to help food growers and the environment.

We are a team based in Sydney, Australia, with backgrounds in: IT, science, engineering, food, design and economics. We're passionate about giving people the tools to assess food themselves. 

Allripe is a proud member of the Australian Society for Microbiology and the International Association for Food Protection.

We appreciate your support for this important project.

(Yes you can contribute to this campaign)

story:
Suga manufactures premium quality yoga mats in the USA from 100% recycled wetsuits. The name Suga evokes the two worlds it straddles: surfing and yoga.




OUR MISSION

Suga was born out of necessity by a lifelong surfer and yoga practitioner who was seeking a solution to an enduring problem. While surfers enjoy a bond with the environment, we struggle to reduce our impact. Non-biodegradable neoprene wetsuits present a unique challenge. Suga worked extensively with engineering experts to recycle these petrochemical based landfill clogging neoprene monsters into highly functional instruments of yogic bliss.

 Suga reengineered the traditional yoga mat to feel better and perform better, while solving a pressing environmental problem. Because Suga mats are manufactured from neoprene, they’re uniquely closed-cell foam, which means they don’t sponge up bacteria, sweat, dust, and dirt from yoga studio floors like other mats.  Suga mats maintain their grippiness whether dry or wet. They also give non-biodegradable wetsuits a second life by keeping them out of landfills.

OUR VALUES

 Suga is grounded in a culture of environmental stewardship. We seek to set an example of corporate sustainability and social responsibility. We engender these values by reducing the impact of neoprene wetsuits on our natural environment, creating a long-lasting product, and maintaining responsibility for the lifecycle of our products.

Our recycler/manufacturer is located here in United States and is ISO9001 certified. Our net energy consumption is considerably lower than producing conventional mats overseas from raw materials (like almost all existing mats). Finally, we reuse 100% of our scrap - any scrap cuttings from production go back into the grind for the next production round (along with worn out SugaMats in the future).

Suga has created a product using recycled materials that can and will be recycled at the end of its useful life. We have implemented two programs for our products, both of which allow our customers to return our used mats to us for recycling. We are also a proud member of 1% for the Planet.

Help us reach new eyes by sharing this campaign on social media!

We engender these values by reducing the impact of neoprene wetsuits on our natural environment, creating a long-lasting product, and maintaining responsibility for the lifecycle of our products.Our recycler/manufacturer is located here in United States and is ISO9001 certified. Our net energy consumption is considerably lower than producing conventional mats overseas from raw materials (like almost all existing mats). Finally, we reuse 100% of our scrap - any scrap cuttings from production go back into the grind for the next production round (along with worn out SugaMats in the future).



Suga has created a product using recycled materials that can and will be recycled at the end of its useful life. We have implemented two programs for our products, both of which allow our customers to return our used mats to us for recycling. We are also a proud member of 1% for the Planet.
Help us reach new eyes by sharing this campaign on social media!

story:
Background

Have you ever seen the products above?

There are so many designers and their masterpieces in the world. However, we can get only 0.1% of them!!!  So, where are the others now?

There are so many masterpieces buried. It is because of a large amount of investment, distribution and inexperience of a designer. We are sad that these works are buried. For this reason, we will dig for the designs.

We wish that people can use a better product with affordable cost. We hope that designers can easily introduce their works anywhere, anytime. The platform where the designer and the consumer can coexist, this is the SHAPL.

SHAPL is running the platform that making good design product and selling it at the affordable price, with the collaboration of designers and customers.

 

Tri-level Process of SHAPL Design Contest

1st.LIKE We choose a prize-winners design with reflecting the number of consumer’s Voting.

2nd. MAKE SHAPL choose and make products among the winner’s designs.

3rd. SELL We directly sell the product without middlemen, so we can provide affordable prices for our consumer.

We believe there are so many great designs in the world. There are many designs in Behance, Dribbble, and mostly, in the designer’s laptop.

So we wish to make an eco-system that designers can introduce their works to the world,  and be rewarded for their work, therefore they keep putting their effort to make a better world with their talent.

Lately, we celebrated 1st SHAPL Design Contest successfully.

742 works form 16 countries had submitted. Among them, more practical and beautiful designs were selected.

 

Submitted designs of the last Contest

742 designs were submitted from 16 countries to SHAPL Design Contest

When the 1st contest was going on, we were sure that people have sense to discover good design.  We were thrilled by knowing that because that means our business certainly has merit to both designers and consumers. The only matter was the price. The high-quality product should have come out with reasonable price.   

So, we are now holding the 2nd contest.

We really want that the designs in designer's laptop or brain would come out to the world!

SHAPL Design Contest

 

in ALL Category

Feel free to apply if your design is no larger than 900mm in three dimensions(WxHxD) total.
※ If your product total size is larger than our regulation but it is designed as can be assembled, it is acceptable.

 

The greatest design contest in the world

We are welcome all designers to the 2nd SHAPL DESIGN CONTEST.

 

Anyone can participate

No matter who you are - student, professional designer or design company – you can grab the chance to open a new door with your design.

 

This is how the contest goes

Just upload your design, and see what it would brings to you.

Eligibility

  • Anyone from all over the world 
  • Individual, team, studio and student can participate 
  • One (team) can register several designs 


How to participate

  • Click the Submit a design botton in the bottom.
  • Image(s): upload image representing your design usage the best
  • Video: Optional 
  • Description: Write a story of your design (300 characters in minimum)
  • Language: English

 

Product category

  • Designs with a total of 900mm or less can be submitted.
    If your product total size is larger than our regulation but it is designed as can be assembled, it is acceptable.
  • Accessories / Baby / Bath / Beauty / Education / Electronics / Fashion / Furniture / Game / Health care / Home / Jewelry / Kids / Kitchen / Leisure / Medical / Mobile life / Outdoor / Office / Personal Care/ Sports / Travel / Vehicles / Wearable

 

Evaluation method and standard

  • Professional Evaluation 50%(Design<Aesthetic / Functionality / Formal Quality>, Commercial value, Level of production difficulty, Degree of innovation)
  • Consumer Evaluation 50%(Design preference<Judged as obtained number of ‘like’>)

 

Schedule(IN EST)​

  • Submission: October 25 to December 20, 2018
  • Announcement of the shortlist: December 24
  • Shortlist Design Editing: December 24 ~ December 27, 2018
  • Voting: From January 2 to January 31, 2018
  • Winners Announced: 2019 Mid February
  • Award Ceremony: notice later

 

Winner's benefit

 

How you can help us

We will make Indiegogo Prize. 

The contribution collected will be used as a prize money of the Award.

All contributor's name will be written in the certificate, and the winners will receive the prize money.

Would you like to join us in rewarding a person who have designed a good product?

The more gathered, the more designer will be awarded the prize.

The other ways you can help

Thank you so much for reading until here. We are more than grateful!

If none of the perks we are offering is not an option for you, that’s OK! There is a simple but very powerful way to help us.

Please spread this to the world! Share this to the designers around you.

We wish that this platform will be a place where designers can introduce their work to the world, and sell freely. 

To make this happen, all members are putting their time and effort every day.

Although there are much valuable design draft, we can’t have them in our life.

We are so sad to waste it. We want to show them to people as products.

Therefore, we want people can get well-designed product in their life at affordable price.

Please inform the people, designers, and companies around you of this project!

We can’t do it without your help.

 

Questions?  Please don't hesitate to contact us!

www.shapl.com/contest

Or feel free to email to the Contest team directly. Just casual greeting or cheering will be welcome as well!

contest@shapl.com

Thank you for supporting our vision!

story:
You've no doubt seen the racist hatred spouted by evil men, their souls devoured. These lustful greedy pinks, it seems, would rather kill than serve our needs. What can we do to escape these bastards? Turn off the TV and pray it subsides? No! We must secede!

Science, education, health and welfare for all. And a nice, simple and clean beer. These are our goals. We can build a moderately self-sufficient village disconnected from the outside world, trading whatever we can grow, create, or brew with whatever we can't.

The problem is, creating a village costs quite a lot of money. The land is the most expensive part, unsurprisingly. And since we don't want to start a war with the existing owners, we ought to buy it legally. Next, we need somewhere to sleep. We could make quite large living quarters out of two shipping containers side-by-side, but that will get warm in summer. Adding a layer of mud bricks will provide adequate insulation. We don't want to live like primitives though, so we'll need electricity. Four kilowatts of solar panels at five hours of sunlight a day should be plenty, if we have a battery bank to store some of that juice in.

However, I fear that some outsiders may not approve of our way of life. Development approval may be necessary for our unorthodox dwellings, for flora and fauna reports, and bushfire safety. I call these "squeaky wheel" expenses - bureaucratic nonsense that we had better comply with or risk eviction.

Breakdown

  • Land: $150k
  • Twenty shipping containers: $50k
  • Solar cells: $10k
  • Batteries and wiring: $10k
  • Grease for squeaky wheels: $50k
  • Multiple water tanks: $10k
  • Brewing shed: $50k
  • Brewing containers: $50k
  • Total: $380k

Risks

The local council might try to stop us. If that happens, we should be able to  sell the land and rebuild in another area.

Drought is another risk, which can be mitigated by having many water tanks, and building in historically drought-free areas.

story:
Short Summary

I’m a social-entrepreneur who is risking it all to help the manifestation of a Revolutionary Project with altruistic purposes that does not overlook self-success.

Born in Colombia. Lived in the U.S. for 12 years during which I was able to experience many facets ~ from student, to corporate professional, to self-exploration.

Situation: Living out of credit-cards, staying at a Chez JJ - a camaraderie and idea-swapping hostel in Silicon Valley.

Challenge: Either make it OR go bankrupt.

Vision: A conglomerate non-profit business model that aims promote social-entrepreneurial solutions to the world’s greatest challenges.

Campaign’s brief description:  This campaign aims to be a catalytic agent for new ideals and impulses that once synthesize will empower each other mutually there by generating creative solutions to the world’s problems.

I feel this campaign to be my duty, I feel an urge to convey what I have seen as one of the most feasible opportunities to Unite and Change / Save the World.

By supporting this initial stage you would help me validate the acceptance hypothesis as well as giving us (you and me) the opportunity to share this common vision, get together and make it work!

You would also help me with my basic living expenses, minor technical support and to empower my enthusiasm by allowing me witness this seed grow.

Before you continue...

Given the multidimensional aspects of this project, please take a moment to watch the video :)

 

What We Need & What You Get

Given the magnitude of this project as well as its abstract concept I opted for dividing it in 3 stages:

Stage 1 Acceptance & Survival $10,000: Hypothesis testing, vision acceptance, survive, share, help volunteers and minor tech support investments. Fixed Funding (If goal is not met - money is returned) 

Stage 2 Materialization $30,000:  Team gathering, construct democratic online platform, drafting company laws, form non-profit corporation , real cost structure, official website and tech support.

Stage 3 Concrete Start $40,000:  Concrete plans and fundraising for starting partners.

This Stage Approach will allow you and me to validate the perpetuating effect that this company aims to cause. 

 

This is Stage 1 ~ A breaking point - The Chasm ~ Either the vision is understood, replicates and grows or it will help me to Get Real!

This is why it is a Fixed Campaign (If goal is Not met - Money is returned)

 

Detail - Stage Funding:

Since this is the First Stage, the Hypothesis Validation Stage, if $10,000 dollars are collected in 60 days, this would mean that people have understood the vision. It will mean that there is a replicating effect, that there is trust and hope. The money will be used as follows: 50% will be allocated towards survival expenses that I have and will incur by dedicating my entire energy to convey and spread this vision, 30% will be allocated to help reimburse expenses of people who decide to take part in this vision, and the remaining 20% of those funds will allow the project to pay for minor technical support like: web designer, and other methods to spread of our vision.

By the Second Stage 90 days, I envision that the company will have a small team of collaborators (All of you who resonate with the vision). At this point we will plead for an estimate of $30,000 that will go mainly toward paying for a physical location, all expenses that may be involved in the drafting of the laws of the corporation through an online democratic platform and legally forming the corporation. it will also try to alleviate as much as possible expenses incurred by people that is already part of the corporation as well as new comers. Another significant part of this capital will go to the development of an official website and other technical development.

By the Third Stage 120 days, there will be a concrete plan, detail cost structure, and great awareness about the project. By this time the company will be formed and a great collective energy as well as many possibilities will open up...  I estimated for this stage $40,000 but it might be less or not even necessary :)

 

Perks:

If you contributed, that means that something in you resonated with this vision. 

Your contributions will count as credits when you decide to jump aboard or you can support someone else's idea by donating your credits. 

You may or not have a business idea yet, but now you know that there will be a matrix that will be able support your business ideas through this empowering circle of capital. So get ready, get involved so that once this project materializes, you can use those credits, create your own company and change the world doing what you like doing.

The Impact

We believe the key lies on a “non-for-profit conglomerate-investment-commune-bank”. Dedicated to promote social entrepreneurs and form and interconnected network of new business methodologies.

Social-Entrepreneurial solutions to the world’s greatest challenges.

To Address: Environmental Protection, Equality, Sustainability and Profits with Principles.

The point is to achieve a perpetuating business model that will have a snowball effect and can bring both unification and success to its participants.

We believe that we need to align our self in a common approach towards success and unity, a hybrid view. We need to put the common good first, as the unifier factor, and then by coming together we will be able to generate a strong empowering engine that will allow us to regain our creative power and Change/Save the World!

When communications have excel the way we interact with each other “Now” is the perfect time to come together, “Now” is the time for a Entrepreneurial Business Revolution!

Other ways you can help: 

This is a co-creation effort that means that you can get involve in any aspect you feel you can help. 

We need:

Entrepreneurs, Revels, Volunteers, Cause driven, Open minded, Ideologist, Enthusiast, Creative, Different backgrounds, Can-Do Attitude, We-Can-Workout-How-To-Do-it.

E-mail me your ideas, your feedback, let me know what is not very clear, suggest other possibilities, give complete freedom to your creative power and spread the word!

Remember that this is a project by the people for the people.

Lets get together and make it work...

The world and the current situation is our canvas, in your harts and souls lies the colors, lets create a masterpiece.

We need to put the common good first, as the unifier factor, and then by coming together we will be able to generate a strong empowering engine that will allow us to regain our creative power and Change/Save the World!

We need:

story:
Short Summary

Broad View's prairie garden is a garden space free without cost for GLBT members.  The garden area serves a threefold purpose:

1)To provide outdoor opportunities of a recreational nature in an atmosphere where friendships can develop and mature, and where our sense of self acceptance and dignity is affirmed,

2) To provide a nature experience for good mental and physical health (note:  for liabiltiy reasons a visit must be scheduled in advance), and

3) To find within ourselves a place to feel free:  free from fear of discrimination, free from shame, and free from judgment.  Therefore, a place to celebrate our own selves admist the bright rays of sun, many wildflowers and fluttering butterflies.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $3200 dollars.  It goes to buy 10 truck loads of gravel to make a lane allowing access to the praire garden by June of 2014.
  • What are the benefits of donating?
    • You provide a solution so LGBT can reach the garden area.
    • You are seen to be doing it.  That's your name posted on a sign at the garden. 
    • Your name given a 'shout out' on a web page on Broad View Wildflower Seed.
    • A set of four photos taken at the prairie garden are emailed to you with our thanks for your support.
  • Where do funds go if we don’t reach our entire goal?  No funds are spent; no money is collected at all.  The entire project does not occur; I can't do it without this funding project.  It is all or nothing; it is up to you.

The Impact

  • You support empowers a myraid of opportunities; such possibilties as:
    • Graying senior LGBT will benefit spiritually with a beautiful space for reconciliation and contemplation; a networking place to meet for fellowship beyond the meeting rooms of churches, restaurants, and coffee shops; and an outdoor place to walk in an exculsive LGBT designated garden.
    • Young LGBT have a unique place to romp, meditate; and/or study various prairie plants and prairie life forms.
    • A new place for LGBT to sing; play warrior Xexia or if you're into a him, a Hercules; and enjoy a wild prairie environment.
  • My track record of successful prior projects springs from my being a past college student body president, chairman of a teacher's union, and various projects I spearheaded as a public school teacher and as a Peace Corps volunteer overseas in Africa.
  • Through sixty years, I have witnessed and encountered the traumatic loss experienced at the hands of bigots and know how those painful memories can affect the lives of LGBT.  The prairie garden is a healing place for me and a happy joy to experience.  I believe that this outdoor space is a place of spiritual joy and healing, not just for me, but for all LGBT who come to this prairie garden.  For that reason I offer this garden invitation to my fellow LGBT.  I charge no entrance fee.  I do ask for advanced notice when visitors want to visit.  The prairie plants I establish and maintain at my own cost as part of my seed business named Broad View Wildflower Seed.  The Internet sales site is:  Broadviewwildflowerseed.com

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this project campaign.
  • Remember to refer to Indiegogo!
