story:
Video from Jules' trip to the Rainforest in Ecuador:



Pre-Production Updates:

* We got word back from our "award winning director" friend stating that if we raise the funds he is interested in editing/"Directing" our film. If we get it done in a timely matter we can have the film ready for the Sonoma International Film Festival.

* We also got word back from a high-level associate of the Amazon Herb Company offering us all the contacts we'll need to meet with the tribes, and plenty of video to add to our film.

Funding Update: We have doubled our initial $10 contribution FOUR TIMES!!! We need to double our funds 7 more times in order to meet our goal. The next doubling will bring us to $320. (then $640, then $1,280, then $2,560, then $5,120, then $10,240, then $20,480 to make our goal!!!).

How To: Save the Rainforest

An Adventure Documentary, following Jack and Jules through South American, visiting sites that follow a 4-Solution Plan for the Rainforest:

* Replanting Deforested Areas in Costa Rica,

* Interviewing Tribes that have won land rights and sustained their land by harvesting herbs and high nutrition food,

* Interviewing Greenpeace of Brazil about their efforts protecting the remaining Rainforest,

* Interviewing Rand Paul in D.C. about Legalizing Hemp in the United States as a cheap alternative to Rainforest pulp,

Along the way we will interview locals, visit Antarctica to tie the film to its Global Connection, maybe even visit Haiti on the way back up to show a Country that has been complete deforested.

We will also capture as much of the nature beauty of the Rainforest as we can.

Jack and Jules

A bit about us:

  • Jack is currently a Farmer and Musician in Sonoma County. He worked for 5 years in the Video Game Industry, and studied English and Political Science in College. He currently volunteers for the Public Banking Institute and the Green Party of Sonoma County performing community organizing.
  • Jack has travelled through Asia and Europe, lived in Mexico and the U.K. and spent seven months in seven states for the Ron Paul 2012 Campaign. 
  • Jack's Couchsurfing Profile: https://www.couchsurfing.org/profile.html?id=1MHV095

  • Jules is a Musician from San Francisco, who recently graduated from SF State with a B.A. in Music.
  • Jules recently visited the Amazonia region of Equador to film video on a trip to visit his band-mate's friends and family.
  • Jules is has a genuine, engaging, character. He is inspired by the culture and music of South America.

Let's Make this Film Together!

In order to complete this project:

  • We need $20,000: This includes cameras, hard drives, and travel equipments. Flights to Costa Rica, and back to the U.S. from Brazil, funds to pay for the forest we are going to plant, funds to by a car, expenses for travelling around the continent, travel through the Darien Gap, travel to Antarctica, and staying in D.C. to interview Congressmen on Hemp.
  • For $10,000 we will Credit up to 3 Producers, for $3,000 you can decide what we do with our car upon leaving South America, for $1,000 up to two people can name the forests we plant, and for $100 two-hundred people can send up stickers of flags from their city, state or country to put on our car (showing the global impact of this issue).
  • $20,000 is the minimum we need to feel conformable leaving for the 6-8 weeks this trip will take. If we make less than that you get your money back!

Global Impact

By making this film, we hope to inspire action from the rest of the world;

  • This film will document, with a bias toward what will actually help save the rainforest, the efforts of active groups working to protect our environment. By doing so we will give people legitimate causes to support, increasing over-all donations and participation.
  • Likewise, the model for the Amazon can be used to protect Rainforests in Africa and South-East Asia.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute money you can help by doing the following:

  • Share this campaign on social media and with friends through email;
  • Call your Congressional Representative and ask them to support the legalization of Industrial Hemp,
  • Sign Petitions at greenpeace.org

And as always, be good to each other.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

We need to collect this amount so that we purchase the necessary seeds and agricultural tools for this environmental project.

the fires that swept Lebanon in the last quarter of last year it joined to the list of concerns and problems experienced by the Lebanese people. Although the environmental concern about the priorities of our concerns fall under the weight of progress concerns the living, political and security, the results of the risks to the environment from the destruction of the most dangerous to remain in the rank of deferred issues to be addressed. a day will come when the grandmothers tell their grandchildren that Lebanon was once a beautiful green country before it becomes more like a desert? And we will lead us to where neglect, disability, and poor planning? More desertification, more climate change, more than the loss of resources, especially those that make up the President sustenance to the poor? story:
LORESUM

LORESUM is a watchmaking company reaching for a new standard of aesthetics and mechanics.

Our name is derived from “lorem ipsum”, a common word used in graphic design. The term functions as a placeholder text in documents, webpages, typefaces, etc. before publication. It starts every stand-in paragraph. The word itself has no particular meaning; yet it visually appears to be a word with meaning. This is the beauty and appeal of “lorem ipsum” to the world of design. Its ability to accurately showcase the aesthetic value of a work without detracting from the form is something every designer must learn how to master. “Lorem ipsum” is the finishing touch of a good design and LORESUM aims to achieve that same standard of aesthetic completeness. We are a company oriented around design, striving to make completely original works of art for each and every watch lover.

Jason Chan, the head designer and founder of LORESUM is particularly experienced in all aspects of watch design. He specializes in the watchmaking process along with the development and design of unique time-telling systems.

In December 2017, Chan’s very first brand JW Watch made its debut. Through his efforts the company grew, firmly establishing its place in the watchmaking industry. His iconic models JW-01 and JW-02 are still out of stock to this day. Following this endeavour, he joined the Behrens Original team as a designer for several of their watches. Learning from a mature development team, Jason further expanded his knowledge of watch mechanics and in particular his experience working with high-quality modules.

“I want LORESUM to be designer oriented,” said Jason. “As many companies think in a business way, I want mine to be real creative. Not only playing around with the dials colours, materials, but also going for an innovative wristwatch experience.”

In tandem with creativity, LORESUM upholds a cost efficient, affordable, and reliable mindset. This is the least we hope to achieve as a professional watchmaking company. Combined with our expertise in design and mechanics, we want to bring you something original.

 

Design Concept: the Harry Beck Sensation

If you are a graphic designer then you’ve heard of Harry Beck. In 1933, he created the revolutionary 8-directional railway map of the transport lines in London. At a glance, it was no more than a simple 2D drawing made of straight lines, sharp angles, and tiny spheres. There were virtually no geographic elements. Most of the stations were spaced equally apart despite this being far from representative of the varying distances over London’s landscape. What it did display clearly though was each railway line and where they intersected, layering one upon the other in an easy to read manner.

Beck’s superiors were not impressed. This was not standard protocol for the engineering minds behind the original maps. His idea was too phenomenal. Beck persisted, however, and samples hit the streets. Its popularity grew exponentially and within the month, a large copy was requested and printed.

Check out more about Harry Beck and his concept.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Beck

 

Nowadays, this template is so widely recognized, distributed and reworked that it has become the norm. Close to every railway map of our modern world is produced in some variation of Beck’s original. He created a legend and we are experiencing the life-changing effects of his design here and now.

Inspired by Beck’s story, Chan decided to embark on a journey to create an equally radical masterpiece of his own. A mechanism that would change the very essence of telling time.

LS01 is the product of this journey. Deeply inspired by Beck’s legacy, Chan reinterpreted his map into the form of a tasteful timepiece. Eight directional lines and circles ripple out from the centre of the LS01. Weaving, layering, and intersecting in a topological fashion, they are the tracks on a railway map. These, in turn, span several vertical levels as the tunnels do underground. A ‘station’ in the form of two rotating discs sits on top. Chan finishes this rendition of mechanical beauty with the exposing of the inner gears.

This is a watch like no other. The design combines the 2D view of a map with the 3D elements of a cross-section. Paired with an entirely new time telling system, it has no parallel. The moment the watch is wound, this sensation is brought to life. The gears grind, discs turn, and the railway system operates full steam ahead. Close and intimate is the best way to admire the spectacle and wonder of this piece.

When Harry Beck created his map, he was working from an electrical schematic. With the smarts of an engineer and the creativity of a designing mind, the product was both aesthetically pleasing and useful. LORESUM’s first watch, the LS01 is based on the same concept. Combining the modern (3D) with the classic (2D) along with the artistry of a graphic designer, we developed the masterpiece Chan envisioned.

 

Unique: Made from Scratch

Unique and original. Those are the two qualities LORESUM wanted to achieve. Every part of Chan’s watches is made from scratch. They are custom made and specifically manufactured for his designs. There are no premade parts used at any point in the watchmaking process. For this reason, the development time takes more than 3 times that of a normal watch. The number of testing models, CNC testing parts as well as molding fees used are countless and costly. We left no room for compromise, spending days and nights on end to make this watch come true. Our only goal was to create something perfectly original.

 

The Movement: Slim and Powerful

The heart of a watch lies in its movement. And, in turn, the quality of the heart dictates the same of the timepiece.

LORESUM wants to give only the best. We are backed by a factory with more than 10 years of experience in watchmaking. They’ve produced a variety of both Swiss and Japanese movements throughout their history. For the LS01, we chose to use the Miyota 9015.

This Japanese movement is slim but high performing. Despite it being only 3.9mm in thickness and 26mm in diameter, it contains 24 jewels and boasts a frequency of 4Hz (28, 800 A/h). It also has a 42 hour power reserve, automatic winding, and sweep second movement. Not to be deterred by its many functions, the Miyota 9015 is stable and reliable. It’s a first-rate movement limited to elite watches that LORESUM is willing to pay for.

 

The Module: a new Time Telling Experience

Our watch uses a distinct in-house module made of 26 unique parts. It sits on top of the movement and each piece was developed by the same team behind Behrens Original’s watches. They are a group of talented individuals well versed in making innovative yet reliable mechanisms.

Our goal was to invent a time-telling experience exclusive to our watches. So we started from the basics and separated the hour and minute hands from the centre axis. Replacing the hands with sapphire crystal discs, we placed the hour indicator on the left and the minute on the right.

The exact minute and hour is indicated by a dotted marker on the perimeter of both discs. At night, the space beneath this area glows to illuminate the time. The nook is filled with Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9 to ensure maximum visibility even in the dark.

 

The Turning Force

  • Unique designed bearing is used. The whole weight of the mechanism is hung onto the bearing system developed by us, and thus, very little turning force is needed to turn the whole mechanism.
  • The turning force is very little and the accuracy of the watch will not be affected. It is as normal as pushing normal watch hands.
  • Gravitation will not affect the accuracy of the movement as our whole system is hung onto the bearing system, mounted directly onto the dial.

 

Sapphire Crystal: High Scratch Resistance

To preserve and prolong the life of our watches, we chose to use sapphire crystals to protect both the front and back of the LS01. This crystal is known for its scratch resistant properties. On the Mohs scale, it reaches a score of 9 in hardness, making it more than ideal for our purposes. To optimize the durability of our watch, the minute and hour discs are made of sapphire as well.

 

The Case: Multi-polishing

Nothing introduces an excellent watch better than its case. One look over can tell a watch expert a lot about its quality. The LS01 comes in a 316L stainless steel case, a material commonly used in high-end watches. Our rose gold models are plated using a 4-8㎛ ion plating (IP) process for a more durable yet affordable coating.

We finish our watch cases using multi-polishing techniques to give you the best results we can. The bezel and 45-degree diamond edge on the LS01 are applied with mirror finishing while the rest of the watch is finished with vertical and circular brushes. These two techniques combined bring out the layers in our timepiece. Although the process is costly and time-consuming, the results are worth it.

 

The Strap: Top-Notch Luxury Leather and Interchanging Pin

Perfection demands the best and LORESUM won’t settle for less. To match the excellence of our watches, we offer 2 options for comfortable wear. The standard strap we provide is made from Italian calf leather. This is a high-grade leather that is both soft and durable, making it a perfect match for our timepiece. Each strap is exquisitely crafted and pleasing to the touch.

Our second option is made by American company, Horween Leather Co. With more than 100 years of history, they are seasoned veterans in leather manufacturing and a well-known name in the watch strap industry. Unlike the Italian calf strap, the Horween leather strap has a more oily texture with an aniline finish.

All of our straps are made with an interchanging pin that allows for easy removal and replacement. Simply push and hold the pin in the unlock position, remove and/or insert the strap into the lugs of the watches, and release. No extra tools are necessary.

 

Accuracy: Staying On Time

LORESUM specializes in watch modification and movement tuning. Many things can be lost in such processes and accuracy is one of them. To prevent such losses, the parts are put through rigorous testing before each stage of assembly. The whole procedure takes a full week per watch.

Day 1

  • The movement is wound to its full capacity
  • 5 positions are tested: crown left, crown up, crown down, dial up, dial down
  • After a 24 hour rest period, the movement is retested in the same positions
     

Day 3

  • The watch is assembled and put into an auto-winding machine
  • In its fully wound state, the watch is tested like the movement was in its 5 positions
  • The watch is set aside for a 24 hour rest period
     

Day 5

  • Day 3 procedures are repeated
     

Day 7

  • The watch is wound and tested one last time before packaging
     

This procedure is not an industry standard. Where other companies stopped at 3 position testing, LORESUM raised the bar up 2 notches. We keep our watch accuracy within the range of -20 to +20 seconds/day. To maintain this standard, the extra testing time is necessary. The LS01 design samples endured an additional 9 month period of on-wrist testing prior to this launch.

All of our efforts were made to guarantee that an original and perfect watch makes it to your door. One that is durable, stable, reliable, and accurate. This is what LORESUM watches are.

 

Warranty

LORESUM employs watch masters that perform and monitor quality checks in our factory every day. None of our watches are shipped without passing through all procedures. That being said, we do include a 2-year warranty for your assurance. If our services are needed, your watches will be well cared for.

 

Free shipping worldwide

We offer free shipping worldwide so don’t hesitate to back our watches!

 

Timeline

 

THE MODEL

 

Specs

 

The straps

*The buckle is to be updated.

 

Press release

We provide a press release and a set of promotional materials for journalists and ambassadors. If you would like to feature us, you can download these resources below:

Promotion kit

You are always welcome to contact us for more marketing support.

Email: info@loresum.watch

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/loresum.watch

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/loresum.watch

We appreciate all of your support!

 

DECLARATION

Please note that it is our company policy not to lower the declaration value of the goods or mark as gift/sample, as it is illegal in most of the countries, we may be blacklisted and charged by the customs. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
story_txt:
LORESUMLORESUM is a watchmaking company reaching for a new standard of aesthetics and mechanics.Our name is derived from “lorem ipsum”, a common word used in graphic design. The term functions as a placeholder text in documents, webpages, typefaces, etc. before publication. It starts every stand-in paragraph. The word itself has no particular meaning; yet it visually appears to be a word with meaning. This is the beauty and appeal of “lorem ipsum” to the world of design. Its ability to accurately showcase the aesthetic value of a work without detracting from the form is something every designer must learn how to master. “Lorem ipsum” is the finishing touch of a good design and LORESUM aims to achieve that same standard of aesthetic completeness. We are a company oriented around design, striving to make completely original works of art for each and every watch lover.Jason Chan, the head designer and founder of LORESUM is particularly experienced in all aspects of watch design. He specializes in the watchmaking process along with the development and design of unique time-telling systems.In December 2017, Chan’s very first brand JW Watch made its debut. Through his efforts the company grew, firmly establishing its place in the watchmaking industry. His iconic models JW-01 and JW-02 are still out of stock to this day. Following this endeavour, he joined the Behrens Original team as a designer for several of their watches. Learning from a mature development team, Jason further expanded his knowledge of watch mechanics and in particular his experience working with high-quality modules.“I want LORESUM to be designer oriented,” said Jason. “As many companies think in a business way, I want mine to be real creative. Not only playing around with the dials colours, materials, but also going for an innovative wristwatch experience.”In tandem with creativity, LORESUM upholds a cost efficient, affordable, and reliable mindset. This is the least we hope to achieve as a professional watchmaking company. Combined with our expertise in design and mechanics, we want to bring you something original. Design Concept: the Harry Beck SensationIf you are a graphic designer then you’ve heard of Harry Beck. In 1933, he created the revolutionary 8-directional railway map of the transport lines in London. At a glance, it was no more than a simple 2D drawing made of straight lines, sharp angles, and tiny spheres. There were virtually no geographic elements. Most of the stations were spaced equally apart despite this being far from representative of the varying distances over London’s landscape. What it did display clearly though was each railway line and where they intersected, layering one upon the other in an easy to read manner.Beck’s superiors were not impressed. This was not standard protocol for the engineering minds behind the original maps. His idea was too phenomenal. Beck persisted, however, and samples hit the streets. Its popularity grew exponentially and within the month, a large copy was requested and printed.Check out more about Harry Beck and his concept.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Beck Nowadays, this template is so widely recognized, distributed and reworked that it has become the norm. Close to every railway map of our modern world is produced in some variation of Beck’s original. He created a legend and we are experiencing the life-changing effects of his design here and now.Inspired by Beck’s story, Chan decided to embark on a journey to create an equally radical masterpiece of his own. A mechanism that would change the very essence of telling time.LS01 is the product of this journey. Deeply inspired by Beck’s legacy, Chan reinterpreted his map into the form of a tasteful timepiece. Eight directional lines and circles ripple out from the centre of the LS01. Weaving, layering, and intersecting in a topological fashion, they are the tracks on a railway map. These, in turn, span several vertical levels as the tunnels do underground. A ‘station’ in the form of two rotating discs sits on top. Chan finishes this rendition of mechanical beauty with the exposing of the inner gears.This is a watch like no other. The design combines the 2D view of a map with the 3D elements of a cross-section. Paired with an entirely new time telling system, it has no parallel. The moment the watch is wound, this sensation is brought to life. The gears grind, discs turn, and the railway system operates full steam ahead. Close and intimate is the best way to admire the spectacle and wonder of this piece.When Harry Beck created his map, he was working from an electrical schematic. With the smarts of an engineer and the creativity of a designing mind, the product was both aesthetically pleasing and useful. LORESUM’s first watch, the LS01 is based on the same concept. story:
Our tribute to a dynasty of Noble lords and leaders, who have contributed to making the history of the city of Verona in Italy, gathering at their court nationally renowned artists. 

A limited and numbered collection: for each series we propose 11 chronograph models and 11 automatic models. A total of 300 numbered pieces with chrono movements and 300 numbered pieces with automatic movements.

Years 40's: an icon of watchmaking was born. Year 2020: the legend reinvents itself in a contemporary fashion. We were inspired by an icon of the past, a model of the 30's - 40's that is still among the most sought after by collectors all over the world. A timepiece that has made the history of watchmaking, a timeless, legendary icon. We transported it into the 21st century, modernizing it just enough to make it even more immortal in the memory of all those who have seen, worn or even dreamed of it. From unattainable, we will make it available to all those who have always wanted it. Its shape, style and charisma are now featuring in this new model. We developed two models, a chronograph with a hybrid mechanical quartz movement, and an automatic custom movement only time. A product conceived, designed and created with passion, and to which we dedicated a refined attention to detail. Discover with us this new Italian proposal that revives, updating it, a timeless icon of wrist watchmaking. A "must have" within everyone's reach. We restyled its external layout, blending it with an iconic new brand that is meant to be a tribute to the millennial history of the amazing Italian city of Verona.

 

 

 

 

The movement Seiko NH35 (or NH35A) is a 24-jewel automatic caliber based on the 7s26. It is therefore a robust and reliable movement. Being a "strong and very reliable movement", it has no finishes or aspects aimed at particularly increasing its prestige, compared to the high-end movements. This movement guarantees great reliability and good precision at a competitive price. Nevertheless, in our case, the caliber has been embellished with a specific customization that includes an "IP Yellow Gold" plating for the rotor, and a laser engraving on the visible part of the oscillating weight.

The diameter is 27.4 mm and the thickness is 5.32 mm. The rotor charges bidirectionally and the power reserve is 41 hours. It features a date at 3 o'clock, machine stop and the ability to wind it manually, unlike the 7s26 caliber which does not provide the possibility of manual winding.

The claimed accuracy stands at an error of -35/+ 40 seconds per day; however, when properly tuned, its performance is usually closer to -15/+ 15 seconds per day. It operates at a frequency of 21600 oscillations per hour, therefore an average frequency. The shock protection system is the Diashock, which is the standard shock protection system adopted by Seiko. The customized rotor, although it may seem a "trivial" thing, is actually synonymous with great attention to detail, reflected in all the technical and construction details of ours watches. 

The movement of the Chronograph models, is a Miyota Cal. OS21-10Z by Citizen 

Balance Weight  Minute 0.40 μN.m  /  Second 0.11 μN.m  /  Small 0.02 μN.m

Battery Life  5 years

Accuracy  ±20 sec per month

Height   5.10mm

Size   13 1/2’’’

Function  Chrono min/sec, 24 hour / Date

Basic Steel finishing & Black dial with silver color index

IPGold Steel finishing & Blue dial with gold plating color index

Bi-colors IPGold - Steel finishing & Blue dial with gold plating color index

IPRose Gold Steel finishing & Brown dial with Rose gold plating color index

Bi-colors IPRose Gold - Steel finishing & Brown dial with Rose gold plating color index

IPGold Steel finishing & Ivory dial with gold plating color index

Basic Steel finishing & Ivory dial with gold plating color index

IPRose Gold Steel finishing & White dial with Rose gold plating color index

Bi-colors IPRose Gold - Steel finishing & White dial with Rose gold plating color index

Bi-colors IPGold - Steel finishing & Black dial with gold plating color index

Basic Steel finishing & Black dial with gold plating color index

Our First 8 Official Ambassadors

The "Pulsometric Scale" on the dials 

This is our tribute to all the doctors, nurses and medical staff for this particular and difficult moment, but also a way of reminding everyone how important our health is. 

Each watch is numbered. Furthermore, we wish to dedicate an even more exclusive and special treat to the most rigorous and detail looking collectors, with the two initial references and the two final references, the two numbers 1 of 300 and the two numbers 300 of 300. 

This project is truly Italian

Verona is one of the most visited art cities in Italy. Once received your new watch, if you will ever have the chance to visit our beautiful Verona, come to visit us. Our flagship store is located in the heart of the ancient city, in front of the entrance to the courtyard of Juliet's House: we look forward to meeting you and offering you a good coffee !

Best known for its Shakespeare associations, Verona attracts a multinational gaggle of tourists to its pretty piazzas and knot of lanes, most in search of Romeo, Juliet and all that. But beyond the  Renaissance romance, Verona is a bustling center, its heart dominated by a huge, remarkably well-preserved 1st-century amphitheater, the venue for the city’s annual summer opera festival. Add to that countless churches, a couple of architecturally fascinating bridges over the Adige, regional wine and food from the Veneto hinterland and some impressive art, and Verona shapes up as one of northern Italy's most attractive cities. And all this just a short hop from the shores of stunning Lake Garda.

 

Davide, with decades of experience in the world of accessories, bijoux, jewelry and watches. For over 15 years he had followed the product development and related manufacturing activities for leading Italian international brands, in the watch and bijoux sector. Since 2000 he has been designing and developing watch collections under the "Damotime™ Verona" brand, spotting various fashion trends. Since 2015, he has dedicated himself to a new entrepreneurial venture with her own brand GIULIETTAVERONA®. In 2018 conceives the "I Signori di Verona" project and, between the end of 2019 and the beginning of 2020, he has been developing the collection to be launched on Kickstarter.

Monica, the elegant and contemporary soul of the team. For 20 years she has been working in the jewelry and accessories sector with passion and dedication. She has a particular flair for style and trends, and is naturally inclined to spot beauty. In her work she relates to customers and suppliers with empathy, attention to detail and pragmatism. A counterbalance to the originality and creative twist brought by Davide, with whom she shares the most beautiful projects of their lives.

Alessandro, with him ideas materialize in the form of sketches, drawings, photos, visuals, creative concepts. Rational and thoughtful, he is the perfect mix between Davide's exuberance and Monica's pragmatism. Since the start of the GIULIETTAVERONA® project in 2015, Alessandro is the one who knows how to put the team's ideas on paper, making them effective and adding that "artist's touch" to each project.

We have decided to create a real Limited Edition: once sold out, the models of a certain series will no longer be produced. Each new series will be offered with some differentiating elements. We want our products to be special and unique to you.Our commitment to those who will support us is to continue bringing to light new projects and exclusive proposals. 

Please, trust us and join us in this adventure: you will be thrilled !

Once received your new watch, if you will ever have the chance to visit our beautiful Verona, come to visit us. Our flagship store is located in the heart of the ancient city, in front of the entrance to the courtyard of Juliet's House: we look forward to meeting you and offering you a good coffee !Best known for its Shakespeare associations, Verona attracts a multinational gaggle of tourists to its pretty piazzas and knot of lanes, most in search of Romeo, Juliet and all that. But beyond the  Renaissance romance, Verona is a bustling center, its heart dominated by a huge, remarkably well-preserved 1st-century amphitheater, the venue for the city’s annual summer opera festival. Add to that countless churches, a couple of architecturally fascinating bridges over the Adige, regional wine and food from the Veneto hinterland and some impressive art, and Verona shapes up as one of northern Italy's most attractive cities. And all this just a short hop from the shores of stunning Lake Garda. Davide, with decades of experience in the world of accessories, bijoux, jewelry and watches. For over 15 years he had followed the product development and related manufacturing activities for leading Italian international brands, in the watch and bijoux sector. Since 2000 he has been designing and developing watch collections under the "Damotime™ Verona" brand, spotting various fashion trends. Since 2015, he has dedicated himself to a new entrepreneurial venture with her own brand GIULIETTAVERONA®. In 2018 conceives the "I Signori di Verona" project and, between the end of 2019 and the beginning of 2020, he has been developing the collection to be launched on Kickstarter.Monica, the elegant and contemporary soul of the team. For 20 years she has been working in the jewelry and accessories sector with passion and dedication. She has a particular flair for style and trends, and is naturally inclined to spot beauty. In her work she relates to customers and suppliers with empathy, attention to detail and pragmatism. A counterbalance to the originality and creative twist brought by Davide, with whom she shares the most beautiful projects of their lives.Alessandro, with him ideas materialize in the form of sketches, drawings, photos, visuals, creative concepts. Rational and thoughtful, he is the perfect mix between Davide's exuberance and Monica's pragmatism. Since the start of the GIULIETTAVERONA® project in 2015, Alessandro is the one who knows how to put the team's ideas on paper, making them effective and adding that "artist's touch" to each project.We have decided to create a real Limited Edition: once sold out, the models of a certain series will no longer be produced. Each new series will be offered with some differentiating elements. We want our products to be special and unique to you.Our commitment to those who will support us is to continue bringing to light new projects and exclusive proposals. Please, trust us and join us in this adventure: you will be thrilled !

story:
Inspired by the unmistakable supercar elements, ATOWAK Ettore presents a feeling of speed on your wrist with the curving elegance of a race track and sophisticated 4-arm wandering hour time display. Even in the dark, Ettore stands out with exciting curved lines and numerals illuminated by Swiss Super-LumiNova coating, delivering a feeling of driving a supercar at night! From inside to outside, every single detail of Ettore is meticulously perfected to the highest standards for premium quality and luxury style.

Wandering hour complications are the most sophisticated and intriguing time display in watchmaking. Often reserved for high-end luxury watches, the complexity involved in creating this dedicated movement and its time indicating system easily pushes the price to an unattainable level (most are over $10k). To make wandering hour watches accessible to more people, we have devoted several years of development to create our own exclusive custom movement and now, we are proud to present it in Ettore!




Ettore’s appearance impresses all from very first sight. The streamlined glass presents a breathtaking racing track while the case is inspired by the supercar iconic hood design, evoking a feeling of supercar racing and a vision of speed on your wrist.




Time reading in Ettore is intuitive yet eye-catching, 4-arm wandering hour hands each with 3 numbered indicators rotating in perfect precision to simultaneously show the Hour and Minute as it sweeps across a numbered indicator.  Combined with the supercar-inspired shell, Ettore is a guaranteed conversation starter!

Finished with a Swiss Super-LumiNova coating, Ettore’s curved lines and the numerals on the dial shine distinctively in the dark, which allows you to read the time easily and gives the watch a stylish standout appearance in low lighting.

Ettore’s dial and hands are crafted from 3D-printed copper and aviation-grade aluminum. The 3D printing process ensures consistency and superior fitment. The surfaces are covered with Swiss Super-LumiNova coating that enables easy time reading in low light conditions.

 

For those who prefer retrograde style time reading, ATOWAK Ettore Lite is a great choice that retains all the symbolic supercar elements. Its movement is redesigned based on the original MIYOTA 8215 movement.

ETTORE LITE  has the same material and strap as Ettore Drift (which means all 6 optional straps can be used in Ettore Lite) and the same functions such as 3ATM waterproof and super luminova coating. But its price is almost half!

Super- luminova coating makes ETTORE LITE shine through the dark. Durable 316L stainless steel, which is created through a series of 20 separate pressings and over 50 fine processing steps. Every part of the surface is delicately polished to highlight each stunning facet. We guarantee the same sophisticated design of ETTORE LITE at a more affordable price.

 

The case of the Drift and Lite are both machined from durable 316L stainless steel and are created through a series of 20 separate pressings and over 50 fine processing steps. Then, every part of the surface is delicately polished to highlight each stunning facet. 

Add to that, Ettore is made with the sapphire crystal that is finished with an anti-reflective AR coating which is more scratch and smudge resistant, delivering a luxury time-reading experience through the time!

Case Dimensions: 46.5 MM X 40.8 MM

All Ettore watches use top-quality Italian leather that is supple and comfortable, yet durable. Even after years of use, it retains its vivid luster and comfort. Ettore’s strap includes a quick-release spring bar system that allows you to replace the strap easily. With one simple press, you can detach the strap and replace it with different color options to fit different style requirements.

 

Strap Width: 24MM X 20MM

Strap Length: 120MM X 80MM

Ettore’s unique time indicator system requires a customized movement. To achieve this, our experienced engineering team spent years redesigning the special movement for Ettore based on the original MIYOTA 9015 movement and MIYOTA 8215 movement. Rigorous testing is done to ensure accuracy and precision for the 4-arm time display system.

Last year, we launched our first ATOWAK watch on Kickstarter and we have raised HKD $782,371 from 293 backers. So far,  we have successfully delivered packs to all the backers and have received many positive feedbacks from users worldwide. And now, we are proud to introduce our latest ATOWAK Ettore to all the Kickstarter audiences again!

 

 *Please note: Watches in review videos are 1st-round samples for test and review, the luminous performance will be consistent with the product picture as shown.

All 6 straps are compatible with both Ettore Drift and Ettore Lite, you can choose the add-on choice on the checkout page. We will confirm your color option after our campaign ends via a survey.

 

A passion for speed is a powerful human desire. It has inspired people to race to the finish line and to build the supercars that get them there. With breathtaking curves, luxury finishes, and the animal roar of the engine, a car drifting around a racetrack is a heart-pounding, breathtaking sight.

Inspired by that thrilling quest for speed, our team has devoted itself to designing a luxury mechanical watch that epitomizes the excitement of racing. Like a racecar, it possesses streamlined curves and is crafted around a high-tech time display that defines its superior style.

Ettore is stunning at first sight. Rather than reworking traditional styles, we begin anew, with bold curves inspired by supercar elements and the race tracks that they run. With precise radians of polished steel, Ettore is fast even while standing still.

Like the top racers that inspired it, Ettore is full of cutting-edge technology, built with a complex 4-arm wandering hour time display system only found in high-end luxury watches. With precision and constant movement, the rotating hour hands move along its indexed dial, revealing itself like a race car speeding into view.

One of the most stunning features of Ettore is the Night Mode. Just like driving a supercar along the highway at night, illuminated by the dashboard lights and feeling the speed with your whole body, the curves of Ettore’s shell are traced with a Swiss Super-LumiNova coating that highlights the watch’s most iconic design features.

Ettore is the result of tireless years of design and craftsmanship, racing towards a game-changing win. It's an affordable luxury for mechanical watch lovers and those passionate about the spirit of racing.

 

ATOWAK was established with the help of watchshopin.com and Bribeat. Watchshopin.com is a respected retailer of watches and gems and is a key partner and distributor for ATOWAK.

Bribeat is an experienced group of specialists who have been in the watch business for over 20 years focused on the production and advancement of luxury watches. They have partnered with some of the most celebrated worldwide watch brands for over 10 years and bring with them an experienced and flexible supply chain of watch components, movements, cases, straps, dials, hands, and different adornments.

ATOWAK watches are designed, created, and manufactured exclusively through these capable partners and supplied directly to consumers without brokers or middlemen, so that costs to the user are minimized and quality is ensured.

*This campaign is fully managed and presented by NEWWAVES LAB.

story:
Hey, I am Harsha Kasey, Founder of GOTTLICH - a menswear innovative luxury apparel startup. You don't know me, but just like you, I always wanted to look sharp & elegant. Just like you, I love wearing a blazer. It's a man's most elegant garment when worn right. But I just couldn't find 'the perfect blazer' that I could wear anywhere. The Wool/Polyester-wool blazers looked too overdressed, hot & suffocating. The Linen blazers are breathable but shrink & wrinkle even with the slightest touch. The Cotton blazers, well, they are heavy, stiff, hot, wrinkle easily & are just ugly. So, I dreamt:

What if a blazer breathes like no other blazer in human history? What if a blazer doesn't shrink & is so lightweight that it feels like a flower petal? And what if it still has a stunning luxury wool appearance? That would be the most revolutionary & magical blazer that can be worn by everyone, everywhere! Introducing the magnificent MAXIM AIR.

You can even choose a perk with a matching set of pants in the same fabric and solid color as your blazer to complete the suit.

 

Naturally better for the environment, our fabric is sustainably made from Austrian beech trees, giving it a smooth texture that is more breathable than cotton and 66% lighter. Heavy cotton and itchy wool suits don't even compare to the comfort of the Maxim Air.

 

Our fabric is naturally porous at a molecular level, which allows for free air flow making it 50% more breathable than cotton. Using a special weaving technique, the fabric itself contains micro-gaps creating an air permeability of 6000 units, resulting in a supreme breathability for the ultimate in comfort.
 

 

The Maxim Air is reversible with two stylish looks in one. Our 360˚ lapels and patented, futuristic magnetic enclosure helps transform one look to the other and takes you from the office to the club in seconds. We’ve even included an elegant monogram as a designer finishing touch on your look.

 

Every detail of our blazer has been perfectly designed, even down to the lapels.

 

Our patented 360-degree rotational lapels perfectly conceal the reversible nature of the garment. Because we use a special micro-coil single needle chain stitch, no one will know that it's secretly two blazers in one.

 


The futuristic magnetic closure not only gives your blazer a clean, smooth line, it's also quick and easy to use and aids in the reversibility of your garment. 

 

 

Our fabric is infused with pliable elastane providing an optimum three dimensional stretch and giving you the ultimate in freedom of flexibility.

 

Maxim Air's Modal fibers are harmoniously blended with Microfiber to enhance wrinkle resistance. Perfect for commuters, travellers, or those who work hard and play hard, our wrinkle-resistant fabric makes sure you look clean and polished no matter what the day brings.

 

We haven't compromised aesthetic for breathability. Our fabric is specially engineered and brushed to have the appearance of luxury wool, but with the breathability of a cotton shirt. 

 

Check out how the liquid just runs down the material and cannot penetrate.


Maxim Air is infused with advanced stain repellent nano technology.  By increasing the liquid contact angle of the garment to greater than 90 degrees, any liquid spilled on your blazer forms round droplets that stay “suspended” and roll off the garment instead of getting absorbed into the fabric, keeping you clean and dry.

 


Because we know you need to stay odor-free all day, we've infused our fabric with antibacterial silver ions. The silver ions disrupt the cell division process of bacteria and destroy it, keeping your blazer smelling fresh. 

 

 

Your style is uniquely your own and we let you customize your blazer with your own initials stitched in elegant Mulberry Silk to be picked in a survey after the campaign is over.

 

Our uniquely blended fabric wicks moisture and sweat away from the body, keeping the wearer cool and dry while feeling soothing against the skin.

 

Because we know that the modern man needs to look great and feel great, we've re-invented the blazer and designed a garment that looks good on most body types and includes modern features with classic elegance. 

 

Our custom blended materials feel buttery and silky smooth on the skin for the ultimate in all-day comfort.

 

 

 

Carefully handpicked, elegant, exotic colors!

 

After carefully and closely studying several high quality suit brands size charts, practically stitching the blazers and pants for 3 different sized male models in our video and extrapolating all this data - resulted in the above size chart. Our size chart works perfectly and combined with our stretch fabric, Maxim Air is one of the best off-the-rack fits you can find. 

 

 

 

"More than $40,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support"

story:
We are Harmattan Design (Holt & Radu), many of you know us for our Smart Belt series. With a track record spanning 6 years and 7 Campaigns with over 60 000 backers in crowdfunding overall, it's safe to say we have done this before.

       This year, as before, we have improved  upon our innovative belt to make it even better. We've done it with your help and feedback and are grateful, sincerely and extremely grateful to the Kickstarter Community  for providing us with a home and a place of learning. This year, THE SMART BELT UNIVERSAL is renewed with wider textile straps for the many backers that specifically insisted that they must have wider and more casual looking straps on their Smart Belts. Well, here they are.

 

 

                We have unlocked a whole new level of comfort by replacing the 5 hole system with 32 adjustments. This system brings  a whole new dimension of adjustability. Not many people think about it or realize it but, our waist changes as we go about our business throughout the day. A classic belt does not adjust correctly because holes are too far apart.

 

               Forget feeling tight or loose, you'll forget you have a belt on but your pants will stay exactly where they're supposed to.

 

   

The Leather we use is the most exclusive leather anywhere in the world. Vegetable Tanning is almost a lost art. Because it takes longer to tan the leather with natural tannins it has been replaced by chromium tanning at the turn of the century. We get our leather from a small valley in Tuscany, Italy, one of the handful of places in the world where this is still done. It's much more resilient that normal leather, it's all natural, eco friendly and really smells good too. It will come with a certificate of authenticity and a serial number. 

   THE SMART BELT UNIVERSAL is made out of leather that is dyed structurally, inside, as opposed to painting the top layer. By doing this, we made sure that scratches can be reabsorbed inside the leather itself, a kind of self healing.

 

   

      Have you ever had a problem with a wrong size or buying a present for someone, ever been in between sizes? Not our Smart Belt Universal. You will get to make your own size, so no chance of getting it wrong. 

 

 

    

   Our Kevlar® Core built with Kevlar® fibres is our staple innovation. Belts wear out because the leather flexes longitudinally and loses structure. Our Kevlar® Core prevents that from happening by reinforcing the whole structure like nothing else. It makes the whole thing highly durable yet light and comfortable.  We are the only licensee authorized by DuPont to make belts using the Kevlar® brand.

     DuPont™ and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company used under license by Harmattan Design LLC  (Project Creators).

 

THE CASUAL STRAPS

 

These straps are Polyester and are wider than our leather straps. They are 40 mm wide (1.6") and have a more casual look. These straps do not have a Kevlar Core as we do not think it to be necessary as these Polyester straps are strong enough without it. 

 

 

       THE LEATHER STRAPS

 

        These straps are our regular Vegetable Tanned Italian Leather straps with a Kevlar Core. They are dyed through so the color will not fade and will last much much longer than anything else.  They will cover a max. waist size of 115 cm / 45" (not pants size, actual measured waist size). For longer straps please get in touch with us by clicking on our name on the right and then "Contact Me".

 

THE BUCKLES

        

           We've been spoiled by support and trust of so many backers, so, thank you very much.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask in the comments or by direct message by clicking on our name, as creators, in the upper left corner of the page.

 

REVIEWS OF SMART BELT CAMPAIGNS

SOME OF OUR BACKERS THAT SENT VIDEOS:

 

 

COMMENTS FROM THE SMART BELT ULTIMATE & OTHER SMART BELT CAMPAIGNS:

(WE COULD NOT POST THEM ALL HERE, THE SPACE IS AUTOMATICALLY LIMITED)


 

Kickstarter Backers, Smart Belt Ultimate comments:

“Just wanted to post a quick Thank You to the Harmattan team. My very finicky husband loved your belt and wears it every day! I hope you will let me know if you launch a new campaign :) “

“Thank you for sending me a new order after original was lost by postal service, no hassle, or lack of trust, great customer service. Also extremely happy with quality, leather is wonderful and belts easy to put on and take off. Much appreciated“

“The belt is tightened by pulling it through the buckle and the ratchet tightens in small steps. To release the belt, pull the end that pokes out of the buckle whilst pushing the buckle release knob and push the belt back through the buckle. Once you’ve done it a couple of times it becomes second nature. When you get the belt, the leather part is long enough to fit the widest waist (within reason). Wrap the belt around you and cut to length so what the middle of the ratchet on the front end of the belt meets the cut end of the belt. Best to cut longer and then fit the buckle. You can always trim a bit more so that it eventually it is cut to your size. There is a small cream leaflet that comes with the belt and buckle that shows all this. That’s how I did it, and it’s the most comfortable belt I have ever owned.”

IMPORTANT NOTES

 

DuPont™ and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company used under license by Harmattan Design LLC.

We welcome third party sharing of our product in graphic form and text but only if in accordance and in full respect of trademark and copyright use guidelines concerning Kevlar® issued by it's respective owner, E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company.For more information on using these trademarks linked to the materials we use in manufacturing THE SMART BELT UNIVERSAL, please visit:  Kevlar® Trademark Policy

We, Harmattan Design LLC, are a responsible company and believe that quality is of the utmost importance. As such, we source our Kevlar® Fibre directly from manufacturers licensed by E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company and are Registered Customers.

Patents and Intellectual Property

Part of our due diligence as a reputable company, in launching a new product, is the undertaking of an IP Audit. Such an audit, by a well known US IP specialised law practice, has deemed our Smart Belt UNIVERSAL to be free of any infringement on any  standing patent, domestic or foreign. Any claim to the contrary, in a public arena, in a purposeful attempt to disparage our efforts will be pursued for damages.

Video and Audio Content

All footage, images and soundtracks presented within this campaign are our own manufacture or are licensed from their respective owners for the purpose and scope in which they are used. Testimonials of our product are voluntary and renders from actual backers from previous campaigns that have had extensive experience in using  the initial iteration of The Smart Belt UNIVERSAL . The testimonials are their own manufacture and are used with their specific and direct consent.

Warranty & Money Back Guarantee

The Smart Belt UNIVERSAL  has a limited warranty of 1 year from the receipt of the product. The warranty covers manufacturing defects, structural failure of the buckle or the strap. The Money Back Guarantee is valid 30 Days from receipt of the product and can be claimed only after the product is returned to us in a good working order and with no apparent marks, cuts or signs of wear.
story_txt: We are Harmattan Design (Holt & Radu), many of you know us for our Smart Belt series. With a track record spanning 6 years and 7 Campaigns with over 60 000 backers in crowdfunding overall, it's safe to say we have done this before.       This year, as before, we have improved  upon our innovative belt to make it even better. We've done it with your help and feedback and are grateful, sincerely and extremely grateful to the Kickstarter Community  for providing us with a home and a place of learning. This year, THE SMART BELT UNIVERSAL is renewed with wider textile straps for the many backers that specifically insisted that they must have wider and more casual looking straps on their Smart Belts. Well, here they are.                  We have unlocked a whole new level of comfort by replacing the 5 hole system with 32 adjustments. This system brings  a whole new dimension of adjustability. Not many people think about it or realize it but, our waist changes as we go about our business throughout the day. A classic belt does not adjust correctly because holes are too far apart.                Forget feeling tight or loose, you'll forget you have a belt on but your pants will stay exactly where they're supposed to.    The Leather we use is the most exclusive leather anywhere in the world. Vegetable Tanning is almost a lost art. Because it takes longer to tan the leather with natural tannins it has been replaced by chromium tanning at the turn of the century. We get our leather from a small valley in Tuscany, Italy, one of the handful of places in the world where this is still done. It's much more resilient that normal leather, it's all natural, eco friendly and really smells good too. It will come with a certificate of authenticity and a serial number.    THE SMART BELT UNIVERSAL is made out of leather that is dyed structurally, inside, as opposed to painting the top layer. By doing this, we made sure that scratches can be reabsorbed inside the leather itself, a kind of self healing.          Have you ever had a problem with a wrong size or buying a present for someone, ever been in between sizes? Not our Smart Belt Universal. You will get to make your own size, so no chance of getting it wrong.          Our Kevlar® Core built with Kevlar® fibres is our staple innovation. Belts wear out because the leather flexes longitudinally and loses structure. Our Kevlar® Core prevents that from happening by reinforcing the whole structure like nothing else. It makes the whole thing highly durable yet light and comfortable.  We are the only licensee authorized by DuPont to make belts using the Kevlar® brand.     DuPont™ and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company used under license by Harmattan Design LLC  (Project Creators). THE CASUAL STRAPS These straps are Polyester and are wider than our leather straps. They are 40 mm wide (1.6") and have a more casual look. These straps do not have a Kevlar Core as we do not think it to be necessary as these Polyester straps are strong enough without it.          THE LEATHER STRAPS         These straps are our regular Vegetable Tanned Italian Leather straps with a Kevlar Core. They are dyed through so the color will not fade and will last much much longer than anything else.  They will cover a max. waist size of 115 cm / 45" (not pants size, actual measured waist size). For longer straps please get in touch with us by clicking on our name on the right and then "Contact Me". THE BUCKLES                   We've been spoiled by support and trust of so many backers, so, thank you very much.If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask in the comments or by direct message by clicking on our name, as creators, in the upper left corner of the page. REVIEWS OF SMART BELT CAMPAIGNSSOME OF OUR BACKERS THAT SENT VIDEOS:  COMMENTS FROM THE SMART BELT ULTIMATE & OTHER SMART BELT CAMPAIGNS:(WE COULD NOT POST THEM ALL HERE, THE SPACE IS AUTOMATICALLY LIMITED) Kickstarter Backers, Smart Belt Ultimate comments:“Just wanted to post a quick Thank You to the Harmattan team. As such, we source our Kevlar® Fibre directly from manufacturers licensed by E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company and are Registered Customers.Patents and Intellectual PropertyPart of our due diligence as a reputable company, in launching a new product, is the undertaking of an IP Audit. Such an audit, by a well known US IP specialised law practice, has deemed our Smart Belt UNIVERSAL to be free of any infringement on any  standing patent, domestic or foreign. The warranty covers manufacturing defects, structural failure of the buckle or the strap. The Money Back Guarantee is valid 30 Days from receipt of the product and can be claimed only after the product is returned to us in a good working order and with no apparent marks, cuts or signs of wear.

story:
Cycle in complete safety with this intelligent, autonomous jacket that combines technology, comfort and style. 

 

 

The CIRRUS airbag jacket automatically detects when its wearer suffers a fall or accident while cycling and releases its airbag in 0.08 seconds. It absorbs the impact and protects the four vital areas of the upper body: the neck, back, abdomen and thorax.

 

Specially designed for bikes and electric bikes, the Cirrus jacket offers protection all year round for everyday travel, weekend trips and outdoor adventures.

 

 

Pre-order today and find out why CIRRUS is the only jacket you need to cycle in cities and the countryside with complete peace of mind.

 

 

 

More and more of us cycle in cities and on country roads on a daily basis, which is great news!  ?

 

There were 12% more cyclists in France in 2020 and 67% more traffic on Paris’ cycle paths. Bike sales have gone through the roof in the US and Canada, with sales of classic bikes rising by 65% and electric bikes by 165% between 2019 and 2020!

 

 

And yet we all have to share the road with motorized vehicles that make us vulnerable:

And we are exposed to numerous hazards that increase the risk of falls and accidents and therefore injury:

And if we do have an accident, the only think that will protect us is the equipment we are wearing. Helmets are a key essential, but they’re not enough for more serious accidents:

 

 

We believe it is possible to reduce this vulnerability. That’s why we decided to create CIRRUS, the first airbag jacket for cyclists. 

 

 

CIRRUS is a smart airbag jacket designed for everyday use on bikes and electric bikes. The airbag is released automatically in the event of an accident or fall, inflating in 0.08 seconds to provide maximum protection to the vital parts of the upper body.

 

 

 

 

Cirrus analyzes the cyclist’s movements in real time. The system captures and analyzes their position over 100 times a second—that’s every 0.01 seconds! 

If it detects a fall or accident, the airbag inflates within 0.08 seconds. 

So, in the event of a fall or accident, the airbag will be operational in under 0.09 seconds—literally in the blink of an eye!

 

 

That speed ensures the airbag is released and operational before your body comes into contact with any external elements such as the ground, an obstacle or a car, offering you immediate protection, no matter how fast the accident happens.

 

 

Bike accidents and falls can happen quickly and without warning, leaving cyclists no time to react. 

CIRRUS detects falls and accidents completely autonomously and automatically.

 

1/ The system senses the cyclist’s movements

Accidents and falls are detected thanks to 2 built-in movement sensors, one on the bike and the other on the jacket:

 

 

These two sensors communicate via a radio proprietary protocole. They uses accelerometers and gyroscopes to track 400 times per secondes the movements and position of the system.

 

2/ The system analyzes the cyclist’s movements

The system uses a proprietary algorithm that identifies specific movements associated with cycling accidents and falls which took over two years to develop. Our design engineers studied hundreds of bicycle falls in simulations and crash tests and collected a vast amount of data.

 

 

Once complete, the entire system was trialled in crash-tests and real-life conditions by beta tester cyclists for several months.

The system was then certified in Europe (CE PPI Category II) and in the United States (FCCC, UL and IEC 62368-1).

 

3/ A system that detects ALL cycling falls and accidents

The algorithm identifies specific movements from the cyclist during all types of accidents and falls: 

. collision with a vehicle: whether from the front (car door or head-on collision), the side (failure to give way) and behind (sudden stop),

. collision between the bike and an urban hazard causing the cyclist to fall,

. loss of control of the bike (skids, uncontrolled braking, loss of balance, sun, etc.).

 

From all directions, from the side, front or back. 

Whatever direction the bike falls in, whether in the same direction as the cyclist, in the opposite direction, with the cyclist still seated or if they become separated from the bike. 

Whether or not the cyclist is moving, at both high speeds and a complete standstill.

 

Finally, because the algorithm was developed specifically to identify accidents and falls while on a bike, the airbag cannot be accidentally triggered by any other movement. It will not, for example, be triggered by movements of the body like bending over to pick up keys!

 

 

CIRRUS is designed to protect you from serious injuries that could put your life in danger and therefore offers maximum protection for the vital organs located in your chest: 

 

 

To ensure maximum protection, the CIRRUS airbag offers a large volume: 

. 17 litres / 4,4 gallons for XS to L models

. 28 litres / 6,5 gallons for XL to XXL models

This means the entire back is covered, from the back of the skull to the coccyx, and the entire chest area. 

 

The elasticated side straps ensure comfort and security when the airbag is inflated, without compressing the thorax.

 

 

CIRRUS can be turned on and off in a single click:

CIRRUS couldn’t be easier to use. Simply press the only button inside the jacket three times and a green light will go on. Zip the jacket up to chest height and you’re ready to go! 

To switch it off, simply press the same button three more times.

 

CIRRUS goes into standby mode automatically: 

To conserve battery power, CIRRUS automatically goes into standby mode after 30 seconds of inactivity. It reactivates automatically at the slightest movement.

 

CIRRUS communicates with you: 

. The light turns orange when only two hours of batter power remain.

. If the system has not been properly reconnected after washing or if the cartridge has not been replaced after being triggered, the light will turn red and a beeping sound will indicate that the airbag is not operational.

 

 

 

The airbag for the CIRRUS jacket is reusable. If the airbag has been deployed, simply wait ten minutes for it to naturally deflate. Then replace the used gas cartridge with a new one. 

The gas cartridge is easy to reach via the side zip opening inside the jacket.

CIRRUS was made to come with you day after day, during all your rides and to help you overcome any obstacle. 

 

 

CIRRUS lasts approximately 25 hours between charges, the equivalent of one week’s use on average.

The light turns orange when only two hours of batter power remain.

 

 Then simply remove the sensor from the jacket via the inside side zip and recharge it using the charger provided. The battery will be fully charged in just three hours.

 

 

 

 

CIRRUS is equipped with reflective, stretchy Rainbow Impact® fabric:

 

That technology-infused fabric features an iridescent coating of glass micro-beads that reflect light from sources up to 500 feet away (150 m).

 

This fabric uses millions of glace beads 65 micron in diameter backed by a vaporized aluminium coating. The net effect of the beads is that regardless of where you are in relation to the light source, a number of glace spheres are pointed at it and will reflect its light.  

When you wear this jacket, you will be visible at night to anyone with a source of light.

 

Because it’s so stretchy, the airbag can deploy, and the fabric will shrink back to its original shape once it deflates.

Rainbow Impact® fabric is iridescent, producing an array of shades from blue to violet that make every Cirrus jacket unique.

 

 

CIRRUS was designed to protect you even in bad weather, meaning you can still cycle in the depths of winter and heavy rain.

 

. 10,000 mm Schmerber waterproof and windproof membrane 

CIRRUS is equipped with a micro-perforated membrane that creates a waterproof barrier to rain and wind. It offers optimum waterproofing of 10,000 mm Schmerber (ISO 811 standard).

 

. Durable water-repellent treatment

This water-resistant treatment creates a protective layer preventing water from penetrating fibres, causing it to slide off the surface of the fabric without being absorbed. It performs at level 4 out of 5 in the Spray Test (NF EN ISO 4920 standard).

 

. Thermofused stitching

Seams can create breaks in the membrane’s waterproof barrier, that’s why all the seams in the CIRRUS jacket have been heat-sealed. 

This involves placing heat-activated waterproof tape over the seam, before heating it between two rollers. Once cooled, a solid bond forms between the tape and the seams, prevented water from entering.

 

. Waterproof zippers 

 

 

CIRRUS is designed for everyday cycling, especially the daily commute. That’s why it needed to be breathable and well-ventilated.

 

. Breathable membrane:

CIRRUS fabric allows water vapour to be evacuated while remaining waterproof, meaning you’ll never be left damp by transpiration while cycling. 

The micro-perforated membrane allows water to pass through at a moisture vapour transmission rate (MVTR) of 5,000 g/m²/day.

 

. Three venting zips:

Depending on the size and number of hills on your route, these can help increase the ability to evacuate the moisture released by the body.

CIRRUS is equipped with four zip openings so you can choose your preferred level of ventilation.

 

CIRRUS is so versatile it can be used both in the depths of winter and the hottest parts of autumn and spring.

 

 

CIRRUS offers comfort and protection in every situation you might face as a frequent cyclist:

 

1/ SMART POCKETS

Carry all your essentials with you, keeping them within easy reach thanks to the 5 specialized pockets:

 . A secret pocket at the top of the sleeve for your keys or bank card.

 . A touchscreen smartphone pocket so you can see your phone when using it in GPS mode.

 . A zip-up chest pocket for easy access to your wallet.

 . Two side pockets for storing a book, hat or other item!

 

 

2/ MULTIFUNCTION HOOD

The Cirrus hood is particularly versatile and can be adjusted to fit all protective headgear. It’s ergonomic and the height and depth can be adjusted to fit your physiognomy perfectly, adapting to your head’s movements and offering perfect visibility. 

When not in use, it can be removed or stored in the pocket on the neck.

 

 

3/ VERSATILE JACKET FOR ALL SEASONS 

 Every details counts to make CIRRUS an efficient day to day bike jacket: 

 

 

CIRRUS allows you to carry your belongings and use your phone safely and comfortably while cycling.

 

 

Daily biking in the city means dirt related to pollution. It can even decrease the reflective property of the jacket over the long term. 

This is why the jacket part of CIRRUS if fully machine washable. 

 

 

The Cirrus jacket was designed to make removing and reattaching the airbag system easy. The device is hidden in the lining of the jacket and can be accessed via a hidden zip in the jacket’s bottom hem.

Once the device has been removed, the jacket can be washed at 30° or in cold water and left to air-dry.

 

 

Love the jacket’s style and features but aren’t ready for the airbag?

CIRRUS is also available in a light version that doesn’t include the airbag: it is the CIRRUS JACKET LIGHT. 

 

 

You will still be able to buy the airbag separately and install it in the jacket later if you wish. 

Rainbow Impact® fabric is iridescent, producing an array of shades from blue to violet that make every CIRRUS jacket unique.

 

 

The personal protection airbag won the CES Innovation Award 2019 in the category “wearable technology”, as well as the 2019 French Road Safety Innovation Award in the category “two-wheeled assistance”.

 

 

European certification: 

. CE-certified as PPE by the Alienor Certification laboratory (Zone du Sanital, 21 Rue Albert Einstein CHATELLERAULT - France - notified organization no. 2754), using the protocol CRITT-SL no. ACDE-001: 10/2019, in accordance with the regulation EU 2016/425.

American certifications: 

. FCC Certification for radio, telecommunications and electronic equipment.

 . UL Certification, equivalent to CE certification, for potential risk of fire, electric shock and mechanical hazards. 

 . IEC 62368-1 safety certification.

 

 

Up to 4 years' warranty:

Cirrus’s airbag system is covered by a two-year warranty. You can extend that warranty to four years by registering your jacket’s airbag system on our partner Helite’s website. 

CIRRUS has been designed for long-term use for all trips and any falls.

 

The CIRRUS jacket is slightly slim fitting while remaining comfortable and has been designed especially for cycling positions:

 

The CIRRUS cut is unisex, so make sure to get the right size for you!

For women, if you prefer a more fitted style, choose a size below your usual size. For a more comfortable fit, choose your normal size.

For men, if you prefer a fitted style, choose size your usual size. For a more comfortable fit, choose a size above your normal size.

 

 

We plan on producing a small quantity of additional sizes so you can ask for an exchange if you’re unhappy with the jacket’s size once it arrives.

Free return for France 

 

 

Weight: Jacket : 0.8kg - 1.76 Lb // Airbag system : 1kg - 2.2 Lb

 

Composition: 

. The exterior of the jacket is 100% polyester.

. The lining is 100% polyamide, and the interior netting is 100% polyester.

. The airbag’s casing is 100% nylon.

 

 

The CIRRUS airbag jacket includes:

. the CIRRUS jacket and pre-installed airbag system

. the pre-installed jacket sensor and charging cable

. the saddle sensor and mounting kit (three mounting rings, three screws nuts, three Allen keys and one magnet for checking the sensor)

. one gas cartridge pre-installed in the jacket

. instructions for the jacket and airbag system

 

 

 

The CIRRUS airbag jacket is the fruit of collaboration between two French businesses, both leaders in their sector: 

 . Urban Circus, a leading supplier of high-visibility clothing for cyclists since 2016 

 . Helite, a leading supplier of personal personal protection airbags since 2002

 

 

Urban Circus is a French business founded in 2016, specializing in high-visibility clothing. We want to show that safety can go hand-in-hand with style and dream of a world where soft transport dominates the road. 

Years of research and innovative products quickly led us to become a leading reference for reflective technical clothing.

 

Helite is a Dijon-based company founded in 2002, specializing in personal protection airbags. Helite has developed its technology for several sectors, creating airbags for motorcyling and horseriding, as well as protective equipment for elderly persons at risk of falls in the home. Today the business have moved into the world of cycling and soft transport. 

With over 120,000 airbags sold worldwide, Helite is now the leader in portable airbag systems.

 

 

We hope you love cycling as much as we do and that you will back the CIRRUS airbag jacket!

 

SPECIAL THANKS

We would like to thank Ygal and Marie, as well as all the team at Pomelo, Gregory at Gogoro and Cycle Sport Urbain!

Special thanks to Khadeeja, Boris, Benjamin, Jessica and Noémie ! 

We’d also like to thank the entire Urban Circus community for their unfailing support since the start of the adventure!

Please share this project with as many people as possible—friends, family and colleagues... But most importantly with those who want to feel safer on the road, because we all deserve our own place there!

 

Urban Circus & Helite teams
