The system captures and analyzes their position over 100 times a second—that’s every 0.01 seconds! If it detects a fall or accident, the airbag inflates within 0.08 seconds. So, in the event of a fall or accident, the airbag will be operational in under 0.09 seconds—literally in the blink of an eye!  That speed ensures the airbag is released and operational before your body comes into contact with any external elements such as the ground, an obstacle or a car, offering you immediate protection, no matter how fast the accident happens.  Bike accidents and falls can happen quickly and without warning, leaving cyclists no time to react. CIRRUS detects falls and accidents completely autonomously and automatically. 1/ The system senses the cyclist’s movementsAccidents and falls are detected thanks to 2 built-in movement sensors, one on the bike and the other on the jacket:  These two sensors communicate via a radio proprietary protocole. They uses accelerometers and gyroscopes to track 400 times per secondes the movements and position of the system. 2/ The system analyzes the cyclist’s movementsThe system uses a proprietary algorithm that identifies specific movements associated with cycling accidents and falls which took over two years to develop. Our design engineers studied hundreds of bicycle falls in simulations and crash tests and collected a vast amount of data.  Once complete, the entire system was trialled in crash-tests and real-life conditions by beta tester cyclists for several months.The system was then certified in Europe (CE PPI Category II) and in the United States (FCCC, UL and IEC 62368-1). 3/ A system that detects ALL cycling falls and accidentsThe algorithm identifies specific movements from the cyclist during all types of accidents and falls: . collision with a vehicle: whether from the front (car door or head-on collision), the side (failure to give way) and behind (sudden stop),. collision between the bike and an urban hazard causing the cyclist to fall,. loss of control of the bike (skids, uncontrolled braking, loss of balance, sun, etc.). From all directions, from the side, front or back. Whatever direction the bike falls in, whether in the same direction as the cyclist, in the opposite direction, with the cyclist still seated or if they become separated from the bike. Whether or not the cyclist is moving, at both high speeds and a complete standstill. Finally, because the algorithm was developed specifically to identify accidents and falls while on a bike, the airbag cannot be accidentally triggered by any other movement. It will not, for example, be triggered by movements of the body like bending over to pick up keys!  CIRRUS is designed to protect you from serious injuries that could put your life in danger and therefore offers maximum protection for the vital organs located in your chest:   To ensure maximum protection, the CIRRUS airbag offers a large volume: . 17 litres / 4,4 gallons for XS to L models. 28 litres / 6,5 gallons for XL to XXL modelsThis means the entire back is covered, from the back of the skull to the coccyx, and the entire chest area.  The elasticated side straps ensure comfort and security when the airbag is inflated, without compressing the thorax.  CIRRUS can be turned on and off in a single click:CIRRUS couldn’t be easier to use. Simply press the only button inside the jacket three times and a green light will go on. Zip the jacket up to chest height and you’re ready to go! To switch it off, simply press the same button three more times. CIRRUS goes into standby mode automatically: To conserve battery power, CIRRUS automatically goes into standby mode after 30 seconds of inactivity. It reactivates automatically at the slightest movement. CIRRUS communicates with you: . The light turns orange when only two hours of batter power remain.. If the system has not been properly reconnected after washing or if the cartridge has not been replaced after being triggered, the light will turn red and a beeping sound will indicate that the airbag is not operational.   The airbag for the CIRRUS jacket is reusable. If the airbag has been deployed, simply wait ten minutes for it to naturally deflate. Then replace the used gas cartridge with a new one. The gas cartridge is easy to reach via the side zip opening inside the jacket.CIRRUS was made to come with you day after day, during all your rides and to help you overcome any obstacle.   CIRRUS lasts approximately 25 hours between charges, the equivalent of one week’s use on average.The light turns orange when only two hours of batter power remain.  Then simply remove the sensor from the jacket via the inside side zip and recharge it using the charger provided. The battery will be fully charged in just three hours.    CIRRUS is equipped with reflective, stretchy Rainbow Impact® fabric: That technology-infused fabric features an iridescent coating of glass micro-beads that reflect light from sources up to 500 feet away (150 m). This fabric uses millions of glace beads 65 micron in diameter backed by a vaporized aluminium coating. The net effect of the beads is that regardless of where you are in relation to the light source, a number of glace spheres are pointed at it and will reflect its light.  When you wear this jacket, you will be visible at night to anyone with a source of light. Because it’s so stretchy, the airbag can deploy, and the fabric will shrink back to its original shape once it deflates.Rainbow Impact® fabric is iridescent, producing an array of shades from blue to violet that make every Cirrus jacket unique.  CIRRUS was designed to protect you even in bad weather, meaning you can still cycle in the depths of winter and heavy rain. . 10,000 mm Schmerber waterproof and windproof membrane CIRRUS is equipped with a micro-perforated membrane that creates a waterproof barrier to rain and wind. It offers optimum waterproofing of 10,000 mm Schmerber (ISO 811 standard). . Durable water-repellent treatmentThis water-resistant treatment creates a protective layer preventing water from penetrating fibres, causing it to slide off the surface of the fabric without being absorbed. It performs at level 4 out of 5 in the Spray Test (NF EN ISO 4920 standard). . Thermofused stitchingSeams can create breaks in the membrane’s waterproof barrier, that’s why all the seams in the CIRRUS jacket have been heat-sealed. This involves placing heat-activated waterproof tape over the seam, before heating it between two rollers. Once cooled, a solid bond forms between the tape and the seams, prevented water from entering. . Waterproof zippers   CIRRUS is designed for everyday cycling, especially the daily commute. That’s why it needed to be breathable and well-ventilated. . Breathable membrane:CIRRUS fabric allows water vapour to be evacuated while remaining waterproof, meaning you’ll never be left damp by transpiration while cycling. The micro-perforated membrane allows water to pass through at a moisture vapour transmission rate (MVTR) of 5,000 g/m²/day. . Three venting zips:Depending on the size and number of hills on your route, these can help increase the ability to evacuate the moisture released by the body.CIRRUS is equipped with four zip openings so you can choose your preferred level of ventilation. CIRRUS is so versatile it can be used both in the depths of winter and the hottest parts of autumn and spring.  CIRRUS offers comfort and protection in every situation you might face as a frequent cyclist: 1/ SMART POCKETSCarry all your essentials with you, keeping them within easy reach thanks to the 5 specialized pockets: . A secret pocket at the top of the sleeve for your keys or bank card. . A touchscreen smartphone pocket so you can see your phone when using it in GPS mode. . A zip-up chest pocket for easy access to your wallet. . Two side pockets for storing a book, hat or other item!  2/ MULTIFUNCTION HOODThe Cirrus hood is particularly versatile and can be adjusted to fit all protective headgear. It’s ergonomic and the height and depth can be adjusted to fit your physiognomy perfectly, adapting to your head’s movements and offering perfect visibility. When not in use, it can be removed or stored in the pocket on the neck.  3/ VERSATILE JACKET FOR ALL SEASONS  Every details counts to make CIRRUS an efficient day to day bike jacket:   CIRRUS allows you to carry your belongings and use your phone safely and comfortably while cycling.  Daily biking in the city means dirt related to pollution. It can even decrease the reflective property of the jacket over the long term. This is why the jacket part of CIRRUS if fully machine washable.   The Cirrus jacket was designed to make removing and reattaching the airbag system easy. The device is hidden in the lining of the jacket and can be accessed via a hidden zip in the jacket’s bottom hem.Once the device has been removed, the jacket can be washed at 30° or in cold water and left to air-dry.  Love the jacket’s style and features but aren’t ready for the airbag?CIRRUS is also available in a light version that doesn’t include the airbag: it is the CIRRUS JACKET LIGHT.   You will still be able to buy the airbag separately and install it in the jacket later if you wish. Rainbow Impact® fabric is iridescent, producing an array of shades from blue to violet that make every CIRRUS jacket unique.  The personal protection airbag won the CES Innovation Award 2019 in the category “wearable technology”, as well as the 2019 French Road Safety Innovation Award in the category “two-wheeled assistance”.  European certification: . CE-certified as PPE by the Alienor Certification laboratory (Zone du Sanital, 21 Rue Albert Einstein CHATELLERAULT - France - notified organization no. 2754), using the protocol CRITT-SL no. ACDE-001: 10/2019, in accordance with the regulation EU 2016/425.American certifications: . FCC Certification for radio, telecommunications and electronic equipment. . UL Certification, equivalent to CE certification, for potential risk of fire, electric shock and mechanical hazards.  . IEC 62368-1 safety certification.  Up to 4 years' warranty:Cirrus’s airbag system is covered by a two-year warranty. You can extend that warranty to four years by registering your jacket’s airbag system on our partner Helite’s website. CIRRUS has been designed for long-term use for all trips and any falls. The CIRRUS jacket is slightly slim fitting while remaining comfortable and has been designed especially for cycling positions: The CIRRUS cut is unisex, so make sure to get the right size for you!For women, if you prefer a more fitted style, choose a size below your usual size. For a more comfortable fit, choose your normal size.For men, if you prefer a fitted style, choose size your usual size. For a more comfortable fit, choose a size above your normal size.  We plan on producing a small quantity of additional sizes so you can ask for an exchange if you’re unhappy with the jacket’s size once it arrives.Free return for France   Weight: Jacket : 0.8kg - 1.76 Lb // Airbag system : 1kg - 2.2 Lb Composition: . The exterior of the jacket is 100% polyester.. The lining is 100% polyamide, and the interior netting is 100% polyester.. The airbag’s casing is 100% nylon.  The CIRRUS airbag jacket includes:. the CIRRUS jacket and pre-installed airbag system. the pre-installed jacket sensor and charging cable. the saddle sensor and mounting kit (three mounting rings, three screws nuts, three Allen keys and one magnet for checking the sensor). one gas cartridge pre-installed in the jacket. instructions for the jacket and airbag system   The CIRRUS airbag jacket is the fruit of collaboration between two French businesses, both leaders in their sector:  . Urban Circus, a leading supplier of high-visibility clothing for cyclists since 2016  . Helite, a leading supplier of personal personal protection airbags since 2002  Urban Circus is a French business founded in 2016, specializing in high-visibility clothing. We want to show that safety can go hand-in-hand with style and dream of a world where soft transport dominates the road. Years of research and innovative products quickly led us to become a leading reference for reflective technical clothing. Helite is a Dijon-based company founded in 2002, specializing in personal protection airbags. Helite has developed its technology for several sectors, creating airbags for motorcyling and horseriding, as well as protective equipment for elderly persons at risk of falls in the home. Today the business have moved into the world of cycling and soft transport. With over 120,000 airbags sold worldwide, Helite is now the leader in portable airbag systems.  We hope you love cycling as much as we do and that you will back the CIRRUS airbag jacket! SPECIAL THANKSWe would like to thank Ygal and Marie, as well as all the team at Pomelo, Gregory at Gogoro and Cycle Sport Urbain!Special thanks to Khadeeja, Boris, Benjamin, Jessica and Noémie ! We’d also like to thank the entire Urban Circus community for their unfailing support since the start of the adventure!Please share this project with as many people as possible—friends, family and colleagues... But most importantly with those who want to feel safer on the road, because we all deserve our own place there! Urban Circus & Helite teams

story:
With the capabilities of rain boots and the comfort of summer sandals, Vtex are the best all-season shoes. You’ll never want to take them off! Use them on rainy days or take them to the snow. Vtex V20 with 20 advanced features & triple odor protection will keep your feet comfortable, fresh and protected no matter where you go, any time of the year!

 

                            

Do you remember puddle hopping in the rain - only to wear those cold, wet sneakers all day long in grade school? 

Now you can relive those childhood memories and get to your destination with your feet as dry as when you left your home. Our fabric is designed to block water while letting air still pass through, keeping you extra dry and comfortable.  

                              

                          

                          

We added Silver coated fibers to the Vtex V20 inner layer. Silver is used by healthcare facilities and even NASA. Silver fiber keeps the area around your feet sterile, keeping the cause of bad odor away.

 

Vtex Nanotech membrane uses advanced patented technology to prevent dampness and has been tested and proven to block 99.9% of the cause of the bad odor.

 

We also added our new Bamboo insoles with cushiony memory foam. The bamboo sucks moisture and bad smell away while keeping you dry and fresh. The cushiony memory foam provides support and comfort. It's like having high-quality mattresses inside your shoes.

 

To perfect the odor protection, we have integrated a long-lasting deodorant technology to the Vtex V20 fabric. 

 

Your Vtex V20 will keep your feet dry and fresh even without socks thanks to the replaceable bamboo insole covers. They release heat and absorb moisture, keeping you fresh.

Simply change the bamboo insole covers to get that fresh feeling. Pretty neat!

 

*IMPORTANT NOTE

All V20 perks come with Bamboo Insoles. The Bamboo Insole Covers are NOT included. You can get yours as an add-on once you start the purchase process.

- Check the FAQ section to learn how to get add-ons.

 

Vtex is ultra hygienic, ensuring optimal freshness and cleanliness. Vtex fabric uses a self sterilizing technology which is also used by NASA and medical facilities. We tested the efficiency of our technology and Vtex scored a grade of ‘surgical level’. There is no better way to protect your feet than with the Vtex V20.

 

Ultra-Breathable

Vtex’s advanced nanotech efficiently blocks outside elements from infiltrating your shoes while still being ultra-breathable. The breathability allows air and humidity to get out of your shoes to prevent dampness and heat and provide maximal comfort.

Moisture-Wicking

Vtex shoes are made of moisture-wicking materials ensuring that humidity will always find its way away from your feet. Say goodbye to damp, humid shoes that make you feel uncomfortable, and enjoy feeling dry and fresh with Vtex.

 

The new Vtex V20 are cold-resistant for up to - 20 degrees. Don’t worry about cold rain, arctic winds, or even snow, our patented nanotech will stop the cold from infiltrating your shoes. Vtex keeps you at a perfectly comfortable temperature at all times.

 

* The Vtex V20 triple odor protection effect can vary from one person to another.

 

                        

                          

 

 

* Price does not include possible tax/duty/service fee

The sweat and humidity inside your shoes act as a nursery for odor-causing bacteria, helping them grow bigger and stronger colonies. That’s not all; nasty fungus also like to join the party! That’s why you need silver fiber; none of these can survive, grow, and reproduce on Silver. Silver ions attract these pathogens and shatter their DNA, killing them before they get a chance to reproduce. NASA, Olympic athletes, and most military forces are using silver fiber to protect themselves against harmful odor-causing bacteria. 

Learn more in these scientific studies: 

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC22...

https://www.silversafeproducts.com/# 

We lined the inner layer of Vtex using SILVERPLUS; the advanced silver fiber technology from the world leaders in the field, Rudolf Group. Their advanced process transforms pure silver into a silver compound that releases a perfect amount of silver ions when moisture is detected. We then use the silver compound to coat the fibers of the shoes. This technology has been proven to stop odor-causing bacteria. 

 

See how our backer, Sylvain Caron, enjoyed his Vtex 12 features shoes that include waterproof, sand-proof, and cold-resistant, and others in his outdoor activities. Extra: He also tried out his new V-Tex shoes in the sand and in the snow. Check it out.

 

 

Check also out our amazing backers reviews:

"I really love this, I got the Ninja Blue and they look so good!!! They are so comfortable and the quality is just great, I am really thinking of getting more pairs, these are the best shoes ever!!!
Congratulations V-Tex for such a good product!!!"

E. S. Martinez.

"Got my Blue Ninja today（ID2122）and and it is love at first sight. Ordered a usual size and they fit great. Super cozy and warm. They exceeded my expectations. Thank you for such amazing shoes."

L. Muratova.

"I absolutely these shoes! They exceeded my expectations! As a boomer, my feet have served me well for 6 decades & I require comfort now, no high heel s, to keep me going for another 3! I get lots of compliments & have referred several people into buying their own. Thanks, Vtex."

E. Taylor.

"Got mine in the post just before Xmas, they re beyond expectations, the only thing I’ve changed is the laces for a set of no tie elastic shoelaces and they are perfect These are the best leisure/boots I’ve over-purchased. Been brilliant out in the cold as well as driving. Big thanks to the project team for bringing them to the market."

C. Banks.

"Not stopped wearing them since they arrived (several days). Really amazing. Even better than I had hoped for."

R Scott-Watson.

"Hi, received my shoes and socks today. Tested both in -5 degrees celsius. Feet stayed warm and the shoes were very comfortable. Happy so far :)"

P. Harju.

"I received my shoes a couple of weeks ago and love them so much I just backed again for 2 more pairs! I’ve worn them now every day since they arrived – walking in snow and slush – and I haven’t felt the cold or gotten wet socks (the bane of my existence!) at all. And yet when I am wearing them indoors, despite my feet being so warm outside, my feet don’t sweat or feel uncomfortably hot. (I’ve also had many compliments about how great they look.) I can’t recommend these shoes enough."

Joe B.

                        

                          

V-TEX is a waterproof shoe brand with factories in Taiwan and design teams and sale offices in Korea, Japan, Germany, and the UK. V-TEX uses raw material to create functional membranes which become your waterproof shoes, totally on our own. We have been producing waterproof raw materials and functional films for decades and have been producing the V-TEX Low Top waterproof shoes with our patented technology while selling them in Taiwan, Japan, and Korea for years.  

With our international shoe design teams collaborating from Japan, Korea, Germany, and the UK - we're working with today's best talent to bring you tomorrow's best shoe. 

These combined efforts of multiple design signals, high-grade materials, and a passion for quality is what we are standing by.

 

For more info: www.corygroup.co

story:
SELTEN is proud to launch their very first collection of watches on Indiegogo– SERIES 00 & SERIES 01, a watch that has an unparalleled value for money while having their own unique design. 

 

SELTEN is the German word for “rare”—due to our utmost respect for German watchmaking.

 

We are a contemporary microbrand watch company that opens to different ideas, creative thinking, unique materials, and an overall fresh approach to making timepieces. These watches will capture your attention immediately and refuse to let it go.

 

A defining feature of SELTEN watches is the use of intriguing materials that offer unique finishes. 

Whether Meteorite or Aventurine, the theme that binds these materials together is that the final executions of the same raw material are never exactly the same. 

Therefore, every SELTEN watch offers its own distinct design touches and no two watches are identical. 

 

 

 

 

Living up to our motto, “A Rare Kind, Not a Stereotype”, each watch that bears the SELTEN name is fundamentally unique. 

 

We source them directly from Meteorite Hunter. Period.

 

 

The amazing thing about automatic watches is that they do not require a battery inside the watch in order to work.

Instead of using a battery, our watches have a weighted rotor on the back of the movement that will rotate whenever you’re wearing or shaking the watch.

 

 

What this means is that whenever you’re moving about, you’re generating energy to power your watch – how cool is that?

 

 

We offer 4 colors for our meteorite dials.

The pattern of the meteorite dial is first brought out by etching it in the acid bath, and we rinse it with alcohol to remove any water residue on it, and in this stage, the dial is in Natural color.

For the Natural color dial, it will be coated with a transparent protective layer to isolate it from moisture. While the Anthracite, Black, and Midnight Blue colors are achieved by ion-plating which is the same method done by the other microbrand watches.

 

In the watch world, a lot of intriguing substances are used for dial making.

Aventurine is a part of the quartz family. It is translucent in appearance but is most known for its many mineral inclusions that give the material a shimmering effect.

The Aventurine we use here is the Dark Blue Aventurine which is a rather uncommon color among its type.

Typically, when you search for an Aventurine watch, you'd probably see that the Aventurine is in a rather Blue-ish color. However, we prefer a more subtle one, so we spent a lot of time searching for a supplier who does this Dark Blue Aventurine.

Aventurine on a dial does a wonderful imitation of a starry sky. The flashes of light bouncing off spangles that appear to be floating inside the dial.

Combining with our watches, like the night sky, Dark Blue Aventurine bears a subtle twinkling, attracting us to seek poetic ways to read the time.

 

In line with our “A Rare Kind, Not a Stereotype” philosophy, we thermally blue watch hands by hand, carefully subjecting the steel to high temperatures to achieve the most exquisite blue tone.

 

Thermal bluing requires a deft hand and is time-consuming, but the result is that each watch hand is bestowed with its own unique shade, featuring a fusion of blue and purple hues.

 

We offer two types of colorway for our heated blue steel hands.

The option is based on its legibility. 

Type I is with the Blue Hour & Min Hand and Silver Second Hand.

Type II is with the Silver Hour & Min Hand and Blue Second Hand.

 

 Lance Hands is available for all dial options.

SERIES 00 utilise two meteorite slices on the Day & Night Indicator.

They are placed inside the subsidiary dial at 6 o’clock where a bright-coloured piece of meteorite represents day and a darker-coloured piece of meteorite represents night. 

Due to the nature of the Widmanstätten pattern, no meteorites are the same. Therefore each subsidiary dial of a SERIES 00 watch will stand out by having different meteorite finishes. 

SERIES 00 & SERIES 01 both come with custom rotors.

 

Every movement sourced for SELTEN watches is fitted with a custom rotor, which is visible through the watches’ exhibition casebacks.

 

The design of our custom rotor is based on the Triple Horn of Odin emblem from Norse mythology. 

 

Double Finish

In all its versions, SERIES 00 & SERIES 01 radiates its status as an art. 

 

The serial number for each watch will be randomly distributed to backers.

If you wish to reserve your preferred number,  you can select the customised serial number service in the add-on section.

 

Sapphire crystal rates a full 9 on the Mohs scale. The Mohs scale is used to measure the relative mineral hardness of materials, with diamond being a 10 on the Mohs scale as one of the hardest materials. This is why we chose this for both SERIES 00 & SERIES 01. 

We’ve specially chosen these luxury Italian leather for our watches.

 

  •  Meteorite dial to pair with Museum Calf leather from Ilcea Tannery  

Museum Calf is made famous by John Lobb Pairs for their luxury leather shoes. Each leather hide is hand-dyed featuring a glossy sheen with a unique marble-like effect. 

 

  •  Aventurine dial to pair with Maine Liscio leather from Tempesti Tannery 

Maine Liscio is a pure vegetable tanned leather in aniline-dyed, featuring a natural surface with a pleasant hand touch. Over wear, it will become silky smooth and age beautifully.

Our butterfly deployant clasp bracelet is made of 316L Stainless Steel.

Our bracelets are with solid end links that fit the wrist better and are more comfortable than hollow end links. It comes with screw-in links which makes it the simplest bracelet to resize. It’s also very reliable. 

The butterfly deployant clasp is completely invisible when you’re wearing the watch. It makes the band look seamless like the watch is magically staying buckled without the clasp. It’s perhaps the most elegant type of watch clasp that you will encounter.

 

It is for those looking for a secure and inconspicuous type of clasp – it closes on the wrist, so the mechanism will not be seen on the outer strap.

 

Our first collection offers two different models, the SERIES 00 and the SERIES 01, each with its own signature dial layout. 

 

SERIES 00 includes a subsidiary dial at 6 o’clock, complete with a pair of meteorite discs to indicate day and night. 

 

On the other hand, the absence of the subdial on SERIES 01 allows the striking Meteorite/Aventurine Dial to take center stage.  

Each watch will come with a handcrafted leather strap made by HAS NO BOUNDS.

For any additional SERIES 00, please add $349 to your pledge

For any additional SERIES 01, please add $299 to your pledge

 

*Shipping fee $20-$30(Depends on the shipping method) will be charged separately after the end of the campaign.

 

 

You can purchase these Add-Ons after selecting your pledge.

 

 

 

 

https://www.hasnobounds.com/

 

A native of British Hong Kong, Leonardo Tsai founded SELTEN in 2017. 

 

I come from a family of watch professionals with a rich heritage in horological excellence. My parents had always dreamed of owning their own watch brand.

 

After working for JP Morgan since I graduated, I decided to continue the family legacy and build something exceptional. Thus, SELTEN was born. If you’re new to the name, get ready for timepieces that are truly unique. They’re built to the highest standards and feature designs that captivate the imagination and maintain spectacular levels of accuracy.

 

While traditional watch brands are often confined to one location and thus rooted in one particular way of thinking, as a modern watch brand, we have the privilege of looking to all corners of the globe for inspiration. 

 

The quality, craftsmanship, and beauty of German watches, as well as the resilience of the German watchmaking industry, serve as inspiration to SELTEN and me.

All our watches come with a Certificate of Authenticity and a one-year international warranty against manufacturing or movement defects.

 

 

 

We have worked very hard over the past 4 years to reach this stage. We don't have big money to spend on PR/Marketing, as a result, we could keep our cost even lower to offer you such affordable prices for our watches.

We hope that you could share our project with the world, letting more people know about us!
story_txt:
SELTEN is proud to launch their very first collection of watches on Indiegogo– SERIES 00 & SERIES 01, a watch that has an unparalleled value for money while having their own unique design. 
 
SELTEN is the German word for “rare”—due to our utmost respect for German watchmaking.
 
We are a contemporary microbrand watch company that opens to different ideas, creative thinking, unique materials, and an overall fresh approach to making timepieces. These watches will capture your attention immediately and refuse to let it go.
 
SERIES 00.00A defining feature of SELTEN watches is the use of intriguing materials that offer unique finishes. Whether Meteorite or Aventurine, the theme that binds these materials together is that the final executions of the same raw material are never exactly the same. Therefore, every SELTEN watch offers its own distinct design touches and no two watches are identical.  SERIES 01.13  The main difference between SERIES 00 & SERIES 01 is the Day And Night Indicator Living up to our motto, “A Rare Kind, Not a Stereotype”, each watch that bears the SELTEN name is fundamentally unique.  We source them directly from Meteorite Hunter. Period.  The amazing thing about automatic watches is that they do not require a battery inside the watch in order to work.Instead of using a battery, our watches have a weighted rotor on the back of the movement that will rotate whenever you’re wearing or shaking the watch.  What this means is that whenever you’re moving about, you’re generating energy to power your watch – how cool is that?  We offer 4 colors for our meteorite dials.The pattern of the meteorite dial is first brought out by etching it in the acid bath, and we rinse it with alcohol to remove any water residue on it, and in this stage, the dial is in Natural color.For the Natural color dial, it will be coated with a transparent protective layer to isolate it from moisture. While the Anthracite, Black, and Midnight Blue colors are achieved by ion-plating which is the same method done by the other microbrand watches. In the watch world, a lot of intriguing substances are used for dial making.Aventurine is a part of the quartz family. It is translucent in appearance but is most known for its many mineral inclusions that give the material a shimmering effect.The Aventurine we use here is the Dark Blue Aventurine which is a rather uncommon color among its type.Typically, when you search for an Aventurine watch, you'd probably see that the Aventurine is in a rather Blue-ish color. However, we prefer a more subtle one, so we spent a lot of time searching for a supplier who does this Dark Blue Aventurine.Aventurine on a dial does a wonderful imitation of a starry sky. The flashes of light bouncing off spangles that appear to be floating inside the dial.Combining with our watches, like the night sky, Dark Blue Aventurine bears a subtle twinkling, attracting us to seek poetic ways to read the time.There is the option of the traditional Pontife style hands, characterised by large circular accents, in heated blue steel.An increasing number of watch brands choose to chemically treat watch hands to achieve a blue colour. The outcome is a homogeneous shade of blue which is devoid of any personality. In line with our “A Rare Kind, Not a Stereotype” philosophy, we thermally blue watch hands by hand, carefully subjecting the steel to high temperatures to achieve the most exquisite blue tone. Thermal bluing requires a deft hand and is time-consuming, but the result is that each watch hand is bestowed with its own unique shade, featuring a fusion of blue and purple hues. We offer two types of colorway for our heated blue steel hands.The option is based on its legibility. Type I is with the Blue Hour & Min Hand and Silver Second Hand.Type II is with the Silver Hour & Min Hand and Blue Second Hand.  Lance Hands is available for all dial options.Alternatively, there is the choice of the sleek Lance style hands coated with Swiss Super-Luminova for optimal legibility in low light.Our Lance Hands option has equipped with Swiss Super-LumiNova BGW9 on it and also we’ve added Super-LumiNova C3 in our black pigment to make the index glow.*Lume only applies for Lance HandsSERIES 00 utilise two meteorite slices on the Day & Night Indicator.A pair of meteorite slices are used on the SERIES 00 watches for the Day & Night (also known as A.M./P.M. display) indicator.They are placed inside the subsidiary dial at 6 o’clock where a bright-coloured piece of meteorite represents day and a darker-coloured piece of meteorite represents night. Due to the nature of the Widmanstätten pattern, no meteorites are the same. Therefore each subsidiary dial of a SERIES 00 watch will stand out by having different meteorite finishes. SERIES 00 & SERIES 01 both come with custom rotors.SERIES 00SERIES 01 Every movement sourced for SELTEN watches is fitted with a custom rotor, which is visible through the watches’ exhibition casebacks. The design of our custom rotor is based on the Triple Horn of Odin emblem from Norse mythology.  
 Double FinishIn all its versions, SERIES 00 & SERIES 01 radiates its status as an art.  Our watch is done with contrasting finishes to give the watch an interesting and sophisticated look and create extra depth to the look of the watch from many angles.
 
 Our buckle also features a double finish, a polished finish on the top, and a brushed finish on the side.
Applied baton indices with a polished finish on topApplied logo plate with a circular brushed finish The serial number for each watch will be randomly distributed to backers.If you wish to reserve your preferred number,  you can select the customised serial number service in the add-on section. The first 1000 pieces of each SERIES will be individually numbered.Sapphire crystal rates a full 9 on the Mohs scale. The Mohs scale is used to measure the relative mineral hardness of materials, with diamond being a 10 on the Mohs scale as one of the hardest materials. This is why we chose this for both SERIES 00 & SERIES 01. Our sapphire crystal has also applied 5 layers of Anti-Reflective Coating on the underside to improve legibility.Double lug holes have been retained to accommodate both straight and curved straps.
 
We are proud to announce our collaboration with HAS NO BOUNDS, a newly established brand, who focuses on premium handcrafted leather goods. They will be crafting the leather straps for SELTEN watches!
Apparently, HAS NO BOUNDS shares the same vision with us of creating unique products with unparalleled value for money.
Every watch will come with a leather strap as the default option.We’ve specially chosen these luxury Italian leather for our watches.  Meteorite dial to pair with Museum Calf leather from Ilcea Tannery  
Museum Calf is made famous by John Lobb Pairs for their luxury leather shoes. Each leather hide is hand-dyed featuring a glossy sheen with a unique marble-like effect.   Aventurine dial to pair with Maine Liscio leather from Tempesti Tannery 
Maine Liscio is a pure vegetable tanned leather in aniline-dyed, featuring a natural surface with a pleasant hand touch. Over wear, it will become silky smooth and age beautifully.Our straps come with the Quick Release Spring Bar which allows you to switch straps easily.
 Our butterfly deployant clasp bracelet is made of 316L Stainless Steel.Our bracelets are with solid end links that fit the wrist better and are more comfortable than hollow end links. It comes with screw-in links which makes it the simplest bracelet to resize. It’s also very reliable. The butterfly deployant clasp is completely invisible when you’re wearing the watch. It makes the band look seamless like the watch is magically staying buckled without the clasp. It’s perhaps the most elegant type of watch clasp that you will encounter. The bracelet is tapered to 16mm.It is for those looking for a secure and inconspicuous type of clasp – it closes on the wrist, so the mechanism will not be seen on the outer strap. It also equips with Quick Release Mechanism to allow you to change it to leather strap in a flash.We also offer an extra 1.25x link for the micro adjustment needs.
 
 
 
 
 Our first collection offers two different models, the SERIES 00 and the SERIES 01, each with its own signature dial layout.  SERIES 00 includes a subsidiary dial at 6 o’clock, complete with a pair of meteorite discs to indicate day and night.  On the other hand, the absence of the subdial on SERIES 01 allows the striking Meteorite/Aventurine Dial to take center stage.

My parents had always dreamed of owning their own watch brand. After working for JP Morgan since I graduated, I decided to continue the family legacy and build something exceptional. Thus, SELTEN was born. If you’re new to the name, get ready for timepieces that are truly unique. They’re built to the highest standards and feature designs that captivate the imagination and maintain spectacular levels of accuracy. While traditional watch brands are often confined to one location and thus rooted in one particular way of thinking, as a modern watch brand, we have the privilege of looking to all corners of the globe for inspiration.  The quality, craftsmanship, and beauty of German watches, as well as the resilience of the German watchmaking industry, serve as inspiration to SELTEN and me.

All our watches come with a Certificate of Authenticity and a one-year international warranty against manufacturing or movement defects.  SERIES 00.00

story:
Our 2 in 1 modular design so you don't have separate bags for your day and travel use.

No need to unpack your travel stuff if you just want to you use it as a day pack, thanks to our detachable travel compartment. 
 
 

Detachable Hip Belt and Sternum Straps with Zipped Pockets for cards or small items

 

The Travel Compartment gives the Day Pack an extra 12.5L of storage. Airline Carry-On luggage limit is 22" x 14" x 9" / 56cm x 36cm x 23cm, and between 15lb -25lb / 7kg - 11.5kg depending on airline.

 

 

The artwork on the interior is a very creative depiction of the impact of tourism- both positive and negative. We would not describe it as dark or negative but it is a creative depiction of both sides of the story.

For us, our travel packs are a symbol of change. We wanted to include powerful artwork as a reminder of the reasons behind what we do and what we're working toward.

The artwork is incredibly subtle and blends in seamlessly on the interior of the bag. 

 

WANDE Industries is not just any brand. The name Ominira means ‘Freedom’ in the West African language of Yoruba. We are a social enterprise, driven by our vision of raising awareness about the traveler’s impact upon marginalized communities and doing what we can to minimize our negative footprints on the places we go. 

We have partnered with nonprofits across the globe fighting for freedom and justice for those who cannot. 

Checkout our partnerships: https://wandeindustries.com/partnerships

We are also here to revolutionize the fashion industry beginning with the supply chain, and setting a standard for ethical and sustainable fashion. We have partnered with the same manufacturer who are the makers for some of the house hold names of Kickstarter, to help them establish and maintain ethical and sustainable standards. 

Learn more about what we do: https://wandeindustries.com/

 

 

*The Color of the towel will be inverted during production.

 

 

In 2018, Charlie began to travel full-time to expand his worldview and meet people from different backgrounds and cultures than his own. Throughout his travels, he was confronted with the realities of how human trafficking operates globally, especially in the fashion industry.

He also realized that many of his fellow travelers didn't understand how their own actions contributed to the exploitation of others. 

This sparked the creation of Wande Industries at the beginning of 2019, which aims to minimize our impact on the exploitation of others worldwide. Wande Industries combines Charlie's love of fashion and design background with his passion for education and a better world. 

He hopes that Wande Industries will be able to unite people from all over the world, through education, to create sustainable, real change in more ways than one.  

Learn more about us: https://wandeindustries.com/our-vision

 

Risks and challenges

Nothing makes Charlie happier than to know someone is happy with his products. Trust us when we say he will do everything in his power (natural powers are unfortunately out of his hands, along with supernatural) to get a wonderful, quality product to his customers in the shortest time frame. That being said, due to the pandemic, manufacturing timelines have been affected. We are working with manufacturers who are behind some of the biggest backpack brands. Many of who launched on Kickstarter and Indiegogo, so we have the utmost confidence in their work.

Thank you for your support so we can continue supporting others doing amazing work on the ground.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone is in the position to help us by purchasing one of our products, however, you can still show us your love and support by sharing our campaign so we can continue spreading our positive impacts on the world.

story:
With 5 successful campaigns under our belt, we bring you our latest project, SHINKAI.

                             

Introducing SHINKAI - The World's First 3 Way Kickstarter Wallet 

Designed for efficiency and the minimalist palette, our latest innovation focuses on multi-purpose functionality and simplicity. Now you can carry what you need, and when you need in a form that adapts to your lifestyle.

story:
Hello Everyone,

Welcome to the launch of Cizor, conceived and created during lock-down. I hope you have all been well, because these times are hard on everybody. Let us hope for better ones ahead.

Cheers,

Sander

Unique Tungsten Carbide Knives

 

Cizor knives are crafted from one of the hardest man made materials in existence, tungsten carbide. You may recognize the compact and time tested form factor of the popular Tidashi knife. Carry it with you anywhere, held securely in its silicone cap. The back of the Cizor is  a functional safety tool, which can break a car window in case of an emergency. I am also introducing a much larger pen size version and anodized aluminum stands for both sizes.

 

Two Sizes

Both the small and the large version of the Cizor have the same razor sharp edge. While the smaller portable knife is well suited for every day cutting tasks such as opening packages, the large Cizor will be more at home on a desk, performing fine cutting tasks. Although vice versa is fine too. 

While designing the larger version, I referenced one of the most widely used hand held objects of the modern industrial era: the BIC Cristal pen, a design from 1950. The Cizor feels much more substantial than the pen, but it enjoys the same ergonomics and balance.

Not only the form factor, but especially the choice of material is what makes the Cizor knives stand out. Tungsten carbide is an extremely hard compound. Almost any manufactured object has been touched by it. For example, the aluminum and steel parts of your Apple products are most likely cut with tungsten carbide tools.

Larger and sharper than its predecessors

 

Break Glass in Emergencies

Car windows are notoriously hard to break, and for good reason.  But tempered glass does not stand a chance against the conical back tip of the solid tungsten carbide Cizor. Obviously, this particular use of the Cizor is intended for emergency situations only.

 

 

Heavy Stone

Tungsten translates to “heavy stone” in Swedish. Its density is close to that of gold. And like gold, tungsten carbide has found its way into some amazing jewelry. Although I would not categorize the Cizor knives as jewelry, I have spent quite some time on the appearance.

 

Natural or Black

In addition to the grey luster of raw tungsten carbide, both sizes of the Cizor are available in a black finish as well. Through a vapor depositing technique, a thin layer of deep black aluminum titanium nitride is applied before the final bevel is cut. This creates a nice contrast between the polished edge and the black shaft. In this case the finish is just for looks, but in the machining industry this particular coating is known for its extreme resistance to heat and friction.

 

In the survey you will be able to pick and choose the colors of your knife, stand, and cap.

 

Anodized Aluminum Stands

 

tip up or tip down, the stand can be used both ways

Both the small and the large Cizor are available with a 6061 aluminum desk stand, anodized in red, black, blue or natural. The design of the stand is very utilitarian; just a straight forward chunk of machined metal, yet still mimicking the exact angles of the conical design of the back of the Cizor knife itself.

The tip of the Cizor is perfect for penetrating and cutting a wide variety of packaging materials. The polished cutting edge is ruthlessly sharp and will stay that way unless you absolutely abuse the blade. It would be a misconception to compare this cutting edge to an average steel blade, it is a completely different animal. 

The scientific name of tungsten is wolfram, and the tip of the knife looks and functions a bit like a canine incisor. It did not take long to arrive at Cizor as a fitting name.

The complete Small Cizor Kit

I also designed a custom zippered hard case for each knife and its accessories. The exterior is made from robust 1680D ballistic cordura nylon. A removable EVA foam insert keeps the knife securely in place during transport. 

The Small Cizor kit and the Large Cizor kit

Exceptionally Hard

Delving a little deeper into the details of the design, you may wonder how such a hard material can be manipulated into the shape I designed. The basic shape of the Cizor knives is formed out of a powdered state of the material, often consisting of pulverized recycled carbide tools. The finer details of the design are cut by diamond encrusted wheels. Diamond is one of the few materials in existence harder than tungsten carbide, and thus able to cut it.

Dimensions

Tungsten carbide is much harder than steel, but therefore also less flexible. For that reason the tip design of the Cizor has seen many iterations to optimize its strength.  A hardened steel blade might lose its tip when accidentally dropped. This would also be the case when you drop the Cizor, so be careful.

The conical back

Extra Safety Feature

Because the back of the portable Cizor was designed to break glass, a tough 6061 aluminum barrier prevents the sharp tip of the blade from being forced into the cap during an impact. This safety feature was designed to prevent damage to the cap (or worse). During my tests of breaking glass, I found the barrier to be overkill, but nonetheless comforting to have. The glass hardly provides any resistance and falls away like sugar.

 

The silicone cap bisected to show the aluminum impact barrier

If you ever find yourself in a situation where you need to use the Cizor in this way, I do want to stress that you protect your and any bystanders' eyes and limbs from the shattering glass. In addition you should be aware of your local laws regarding damaging other people’s property in emergency situations. (California recently passed a law that allows you to break a car window to rescue an animal in distress.) 

A collage of blue and natural colored metal

The Cizor is a very unique every day cutting tool, and it has been a challenge to find the right manufacturer to help me realize this long standing design idea. There are very few other EDC tungsten carbide knives available in the world, and the prices are often quite high. This is due to the difficulty that manufacturers encounter when trying to shape this material. For the same reason, a simple tungsten carbide wedding ring can be a serious investment too. I am glad to be able to keep the cost of the Cizor very reasonable, considering these factors.

Thank you for reading all the way to the end, and I hope to have sparked your interest in this unique project. If you have any questions, please feel free to message me or post them publicly in the comment section, which I will be monitoring.

Cheers,

Sander

 

Pledge Levels

Below you will find a schematic summary of what is included in each pledge level. I am showing only a sampling of available color combinations. The NATURAL COLOR CIZOR package is limited to a single color. Your will make your final color selection in the survey which will be issued after the campaign closes. In the survey you will also be able to add extra caps, cords, stands and possibly other accessories.

If you would like to pledge for multiple rewards, you can adjust your pledge amount to reflect the additional cost. In the survey you will be able to allocate those extra funds to whatever extra rewards you would like to purchase.

 

NATURAL SMALL CIZOR: fixed color scheme

 

SMALL CIZOR: Pick any color cap, cord and small Cizor.

 

SMALL CIZOR KIT: Pick any color cap, cord, small stand and small Cizor.

 

LARGE CIZOR KIT: Pick any color large stand and Cizor.

 

COMBO: LARGE KIT + SMALL KIT: Pick any color small stand, large stand, caps, small Cizor and large Cizor.

 

Risks and challenges

Although I have done it several times now, creating a new product from scratch is always challenging. As with any challenge there are risks involved. Even with manufacturing prices agreed upon, prices of raw materials can fluctuate or new trade tariffs can be introduced. As an entrepreneur I am used to carrying those risks, so please do not worry about this. Another type of risk involves potential delays. If the production schedule changes due to unforeseen circumstances, delays can occur. Logistical hiccups are another source of potential delays. From my past projects I have also learned to not skip steps like quality control to rush things. In my experience these types of delays are not uncommon, so I have already incorporated some extra time in the schedule. Together we will have to accept the risk of any further delays. When pursuing a new design, a manufacturer's technical capabilities can be pushed to the limit. This is surely the case here. But after having seen dozens of samples, I have confidence that the manufacturer of the tungsten carbide is able to repeat the same quality that you can see in the images. Something to be aware of as a backer is that this is a tool, made by a tool manufacturer in a very limited production run. The price is about what you would expect to pay for a tool like this. It should tell you that it is not a custom handmade knife and also not a piece of jewelry, so please do not expect that level of finesse at this cost. I will try my very best to get the manufacturers to deliver the best quality possible, but there is always the risk of minor cosmetic flaws inherent to the production process chosen. To give a specific example: From the tool manufacturers perspective, the black nitride coating is a functional coating, but from our perspective it is an aestetic choice. A minor flaw in the coating will have a different meaning from those two different perspectives. I consider it my job to bring those two perspectives closer to each other, without losing track of cost. (anything can be executed to perfection if your pockets are deep enough). For the production of the stands I am relying on a manufacturer I have worked with for years. They have always delivered excellent quality. In addition, aluminum processing is relatively simple compared to tungsten carbide processing. For that reason I am not expecting too many issues here. For the silicone, small pouch and cords I am again relying on manufacturers that I have already worked with for years, so no problems expected there either. I chose a company with a stellar reputation to make the hard cases. They build cases for many reputable brands like Bose and Beats. Finally there is always a risk of a manufacturer going out of business. I have never experienced that, but it would involve trying to recoup funds and finding a new manufacturer causing major delays. I chose to work with large established manufacturers, reducing the risk of them bailing on you. A separate potential issue that anyone outside of the U.S. should be aware of is that this is a knife, albeit a small one with a short edge. In some countries carrying a knife, no matter how small, is prohibited. Be aware of your local laws. Related to this is the shipping of the Cizor outside of the US. For customs it will be marked as the glass cutting tool that it is. The declared value will most likely be above the duty threshold. This means that you will have to pay some duties when you receive your items. Here in the US we are used to paying our sales taxes separately, but for many people outside the US this can come as a surprise. In order to lessen the burden on you, I will minimize the declared value on the package within legal limits, but it will most likely still be above the threshold. I hope to hereby have given you full transparency about the risks involved. It is not the same as buying a product off the (virtual) shelf. But let's not forget the reason why all of us are involved in crowdfunding. It is exciting to be involved in creating a new product, especially when you share that experience with many likeminded people. S
story_txt: Hello Everyone,Welcome to the launch of Cizor, conceived and created during lock-down. I hope you have all been well, because these times are hard on everybody. Let us hope for better ones ahead.Cheers,SanderUnique Tungsten Carbide Knives Cizor knives are crafted from one of the hardest man made materials in existence, tungsten carbide. You may recognize the compact and time tested form factor of the popular Tidashi knife. Carry it with you anywhere, held securely in its silicone cap. The back of the Cizor is  a functional safety tool, which can break a car window in case of an emergency. I am also introducing a much larger pen size version and anodized aluminum stands for both sizes. Two SizesBoth the small and the large version of the Cizor have the same razor sharp edge. While the smaller portable knife is well suited for every day cutting tasks such as opening packages, the large Cizor will be more at home on a desk, performing fine cutting tasks. Although vice versa is fine too. While designing the larger version, I referenced one of the most widely used hand held objects of the modern industrial era: the BIC Cristal pen, a design from 1950. The Cizor feels much more substantial than the pen, but it enjoys the same ergonomics and balance.Not only the form factor, but especially the choice of material is what makes the Cizor knives stand out. Tungsten carbide is an extremely hard compound. Almost any manufactured object has been touched by it. For example, the aluminum and steel parts of your Apple products are most likely cut with tungsten carbide tools.Larger and sharper than its predecessors Break Glass in EmergenciesCar windows are notoriously hard to break, and for good reason.  But tempered glass does not stand a chance against the conical back tip of the solid tungsten carbide Cizor. Obviously, this particular use of the Cizor is intended for emergency situations only.  Heavy StoneTungsten translates to “heavy stone” in Swedish. Its density is close to that of gold. And like gold, tungsten carbide has found its way into some amazing jewelry. Although I would not categorize the Cizor knives as jewelry, I have spent quite some time on the appearance. Natural or BlackIn addition to the grey luster of raw tungsten carbide, both sizes of the Cizor are available in a black finish as well. Through a vapor depositing technique, a thin layer of deep black aluminum titanium nitride is applied before the final bevel is cut. This creates a nice contrast between the polished edge and the black shaft. In this case the finish is just for looks, but in the machining industry this particular coating is known for its extreme resistance to heat and friction. In the survey you will be able to pick and choose the colors of your knife, stand, and cap. Anodized Aluminum Stands tip up or tip down, the stand can be used both waysBoth the small and the large Cizor are available with a 6061 aluminum desk stand, anodized in red, black, blue or natural. The design of the stand is very utilitarian; just a straight forward chunk of machined metal, yet still mimicking the exact angles of the conical design of the back of the Cizor knife itself.The tip of the Cizor is perfect for penetrating and cutting a wide variety of packaging materials. The polished cutting edge is ruthlessly sharp and will stay that way unless you absolutely abuse the blade. It would be a misconception to compare this cutting edge to an average steel blade, it is a completely different animal. The scientific name of tungsten is wolfram, and the tip of the knife looks and functions a bit like a canine incisor. It did not take long to arrive at Cizor as a fitting name.The complete Small Cizor KitI also designed a custom zippered hard case for each knife and its accessories. The exterior is made from robust 1680D ballistic cordura nylon. A removable EVA foam insert keeps the knife securely in place during transport. The Small Cizor kit and the Large Cizor kitExceptionally HardDelving a little deeper into the details of the design, you may wonder how such a hard material can be manipulated into the shape I designed. The basic shape of the Cizor knives is formed out of a powdered state of the material, often consisting of pulverized recycled carbide tools. The finer details of the design are cut by diamond encrusted wheels. Diamond is one of the few materials in existence harder than tungsten carbide, and thus able to cut it.DimensionsTungsten carbide is much harder than steel, but therefore also less flexible. For that reason the tip design of the Cizor has seen many iterations to optimize its strength.  A hardened steel blade might lose its tip when accidentally dropped. This would also be the case when you drop the Cizor, so be careful.The conical backExtra Safety FeatureBecause the back of the portable Cizor was designed to break glass, a tough 6061 aluminum barrier prevents the sharp tip of the blade from being forced into the cap during an impact. This safety feature was designed to prevent damage to the cap (or worse). During my tests of breaking glass, I found the barrier to be overkill, but nonetheless comforting to have. The glass hardly provides any resistance and falls away like sugar. The silicone cap bisected to show the aluminum impact barrierIf you ever find yourself in a situation where you need to use the Cizor in this way, I do want to stress that you protect your and any bystanders' eyes and limbs from the shattering glass. In addition you should be aware of your local laws regarding damaging other people’s property in emergency situations. (California recently passed a law that allows you to break a car window to rescue an animal in distress.) A collage of blue and natural colored metalThe Cizor is a very unique every day cutting tool, and it has been a challenge to find the right manufacturer to help me realize this long standing design idea. There are very few other EDC tungsten carbide knives available in the world, and the prices are often quite high. This is due to the difficulty that manufacturers encounter when trying to shape this material. For the same reason, a simple tungsten carbide wedding ring can be a serious investment too. I am glad to be able to keep the cost of the Cizor very reasonable, considering these factors.Thank you for reading all the way to the end, and I hope to have sparked your interest in this unique project. If you have any questions, please feel free to message me or post them publicly in the comment section, which I will be monitoring.Cheers,Sander Pledge LevelsBelow you will find a schematic summary of what is included in each pledge level. I am showing only a sampling of available color combinations. The NATURAL COLOR CIZOR package is limited to a single color. Your will make your final color selection in the survey which will be issued after the campaign closes. In the survey you will also be able to add extra caps, cords, stands and possibly other accessories.If you would like to pledge for multiple rewards, you can adjust your pledge amount to reflect the additional cost. In the survey you will be able to allocate those extra funds to whatever extra rewards you would like to purchase. NATURAL SMALL CIZOR: fixed color scheme SMALL CIZOR: Pick any color cap, cord and small Cizor. SMALL CIZOR KIT: Pick any color cap, cord, small stand and small Cizor. LARGE CIZOR KIT: Pick any color large stand and Cizor. COMBO: LARGE KIT + SMALL KIT: Pick any color small stand, large stand, caps, small Cizor and large Cizor. Risks and challengesAlthough I have done it several times now, creating a new product from scratch is always challenging. As with any challenge there are risks involved. Even with manufacturing prices agreed upon, prices of raw materials can fluctuate or new trade tariffs can be introduced. As an entrepreneur I am used to carrying those risks, so please do not worry about this. Another type of risk involves potential delays. If the production schedule changes due to unforeseen circumstances, delays can occur. Logistical hiccups are another source of potential delays. From my past projects I have also learned to not skip steps like quality control to rush things. In my experience these types of delays are not uncommon, so I have already incorporated some extra time in the schedule. Together we will have to accept the risk of any further delays. When pursuing a new design, a manufacturer's technical capabilities can be pushed to the limit. This is surely the case here. But after having seen dozens of samples, I have confidence that the manufacturer of the tungsten carbide is able to repeat the same quality that you can see in the images. Something to be aware of as a backer is that this is a tool, made by a tool manufacturer in a very limited production run. The price is about what you would expect to pay for a tool like this. It should tell you that it is not a custom handmade knife and also not a piece of jewelry, so please do not expect that level of finesse at this cost. I will try my very best to get the manufacturers to deliver the best quality possible, but there is always the risk of minor cosmetic flaws inherent to the production process chosen. To give a specific example: From the tool manufacturers perspective, the black nitride coating is a functional coating, but from our perspective it is an aestetic choice. A minor flaw in the coating will have a different meaning from those two different perspectives. I consider it my job to bring those two perspectives closer to each other, without losing track of cost. (anything can be executed to perfection if your pockets are deep enough). For the production of the stands I am relying on a manufacturer I have worked with for years. They have always delivered excellent quality. In addition, aluminum processing is relatively simple compared to tungsten carbide processing. For that reason I am not expecting too many issues here. For the silicone, small pouch and cords I am again relying on manufacturers that I have already worked with for years, so no problems expected there either. I chose a company with a stellar reputation to make the hard cases. They build cases for many reputable brands like Bose and Beats. Finally there is always a risk of a manufacturer going out of business. I have never experienced that, but it would involve trying to recoup funds and finding a new manufacturer causing major delays. I chose to work with large established manufacturers, reducing the risk of them bailing on you. A separate potential issue that anyone outside of the U.S. should be aware of is that this is a knife, albeit a small one with a short edge. In some countries carrying a knife, no matter how small, is prohibited. Be aware of your local laws. Related to this is the shipping of the Cizor outside of the US. For customs it will be marked as the glass cutting tool that it is. The declared value will most likely be above the duty threshold. This means that you will have to pay some duties when you receive your items. Here in the US we are used to paying our sales taxes separately, but for many people outside the US this can come as a surprise. In order to lessen the burden on you, I will minimize the declared value on the package within legal limits, but it will most likely still be above the threshold. I hope to hereby have given you full transparency about the risks involved. It is not the same as buying a product off the (virtual) shelf. But let's not forget the reason why all of us are involved in crowdfunding. It is exciting to be involved in creating a new product, especially when you share that experience with many likeminded people. S

story:
The original purME mask was a great success. So we took into account all the feedback from our backer community, and built an improved second product — purME Air, the wearable air purifier! 

 

 

 

Breathe Easier & Safer

 

With purME Air, breathing through a mask is easy!

Featuring twin innovative turbines, the mask constantly supplies you with filtered air. Go running, cycling, work out in a gym or just walk in the street wearing your fresh air!

What’s more, you can always adjust the airflow to your needs with the 3 power levels: You decide how much pure air is enough for you. 

 

 

 

Ultralight

 

Weighing at just 80g, purME Air is one of the lightest powered twin-turbine masks. Go hiking, cycle to work, exercise at the gym or just take to the streets with maximum protection and almost no-mask feel!

 

 

REWARDS

 

 

 

ADD-ONS

 

 

 

 

 

How It Works

         

 

1. Choose one of the 3 power levels to supply sufficient filtered air to you depending on your activity, both indoors or in crowded places.

2. A pair of identical, silent microturbines will draw exactly the same amount of air in and out of your mask, continuously providing you fresh air.

3. Breathe in, breathe out! You’re ready to face the world.

 

DEMO VIDEO

 

Working Prototype Demo

 

One-way Airflow & Constant Pressure Demo

 

 
 

Media About Us

 
 

Ergonomic Design

 

 

Perfect Fit

 

The silicone facepiece of purME Air that contacts your face is designed to deliver unrivaled comfort while keeping you safe.

Made of firm yet supple LFGB food grade silicone—free of organic vapor, heavy metals, and harmful residues—the silicone face mask not only ensures a perfect airtight fit to minimize air leakage but also seals tightly against your nose while you’re on the move.

 

 

Super Comfortable Feel

 

 

We’ve created purME Air with your comfort in mind. 

Made of firm yet supple LFGB food grade silicone—free of organic vapor, heavy metals, and harmful residues—the silicone face mask  will never cause any allergic reactions nor leave marks on it, even after hours of use.

With its folded-over seamless ergonomic design, the flexible silicone edge of the mask will sit comfortably on your face, and never leave marks on it, even after hours of use.

 

 

Full-Day Protection

 

purME Air is powered by a rechargeable battery stored inside. It offers 6-8 hours of operation, which is more than enough to protect you for the whole day. 

Need longer protection? No probs! Even if your mask’s battery is low, you can still wear it as the filters will continue to protect you. To bring back the full protection powers of purME Air, you’ll need only 2 hours and any USB cable to recharge it. 

 

 

Most people now breathe air containing high levels of pollution. 
Wearing a mask can help you filter the air from air pollutants, pollen, tobacco, wildfire smoke, and dust, which are mostly within the PM2.5 range.

 

Two-Sizes Fit All

 

purME Air is now available in 2 sizes—both Standard and Large!

Considering the feedback from our backers, we have decided to also add a Large size silicone facepiece.

It’s approximately 15% larger and is recommended for backers with larger face or taller nose

 

You will be able to select your size in the shipping survey, which we’ll send to you after the campaign ends. Note that the sizes come at no extra cost!

 

 

Wear purME Air now!

Scan the QR code with your phone or click the buttons below to try it on.

                                                       

 

 

Comparison Chart

 

 

 

 

Technical Specifications

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lab Certified

 

All components of purME Air have been tested by independent labs to be safe for your wear.

Electronic Device: purME Air has been certified by SGS to Federal Communications Commission (FCC) rules and regulations, and is safe for wearing.

Silicone Facepiece: The silicone part of purME Air that contacts your skin is made with food grade silicone and certified by SGS to LFGB standard. The design ensures you feel comfortable even when you wear it for hours.

And on top of that, purME Air fulfills most common regulations by health and safety authorities.

 

 

Stretch Goals

 

 

 

Our First Generation Was a Big Hit!

 

 

Production Stage

 

The idea of a powered mask was brought to us by our backer community during the original purME campaign. Back then some of our backers suggested adding a fan to increase the airflow. We embraced this idea but after extensive evaluation had to decide against it as our technology was still immature.

The breakthrough happened when we came across a prototype mini air purifier: the device was not only small and light enough to be pocketed, but also very quiet and powerful enough to purify the surrounding air. We quickly acquired the technology and the first purME Air was born.

Our design is complete and prototypes have undergone trials. Once the funding goal is reached, we will purchase raw materials and prepare assembly lines to start the production on time.

Even though purME Air is completely different from our original purME mask, we are going to use our previous manufacturing and delivery experience to ensure the highest quality and smooth production. Some materials are already certified for safety and durability. Also, we have contacted SGS and applied for safety and quality testing.

 

 

TIMELINE
 

 

 

OUR TEAM 

 

 

 

Behind purME Air stands a group of designers and engineers interested in making a better reusable mask. Adopting unconventional designs with existing materials, we aim to create a reusable respirator mask with excellent protection, comfort and value for immediate use against air pollution and other threats.

Our mission is to raise awareness about the invisible dangers of air pollution and air-transmitted threats, and help people protect themselves with our affordable air pollution mask. By adopting common components and standards, purME users will be able to use this air filter mask with other filtration devices too, directly or with minimal modification. This means that even in the worst case of disaster, the owner will be able to keep it operational.

With our Indiegogo campaign, we wish to raise sufficient funds for the testing, certification and production of purME Air. We have already secured production arrangements to fulfill at the campaign’s end to deliver you the best air purifier mask on time.

Production Stage

Some materials are already certified for safety and durability. Also, we have contacted SGS and applied for safety and quality testing.
 
 
TIMELINE 

 
 
OUR TEAM 
 
 

 
Behind purME Air stands a group of designers and engineers interested in making a better reusable mask. Adopting unconventional designs with existing materials, we aim to create a reusable respirator mask with excellent protection, comfort and value for immediate use against air pollution and other threats.

By adopting common components and standards, purME users will be able to use this air filter mask with other filtration devices too, directly or with minimal modification. This means that even in the worst case of disaster, the owner will be able to keep it operational.
With our Indiegogo campaign, we wish to raise sufficient funds for the testing, certification and production of purME Air. We have already secured production arrangements to fulfill at the campaign’s end to deliver you the best air purifier mask on time.

story:
After 7 successful Kickstarter campaigns and 48k+ pledges fulfilled to backers all over the world we are excited to share our latest project with you:

Nanobag 4.0 - The ultimate reusable shopping bag

Ultra-light, ultra-strong, ultra-foldable. You won't believe how small these premium shopping bags pack. These tiny shopping bags are convenient to keep in your pocket at all times, are super comfortable to hold, and easily carry 66lbs (30kg).

 

 

 

 

We consume somewhere between 500 billion to 1 trillion plastic bags per year, and it’s totally unnecessary. Reusable bags are great for the environment, but most are bulky or poor quality. Nanobag 4.0 is a premium shopping bag so compact that you won’t even know you’re carrying it. The compact super-soft fabric easily folds into your pocket, and does away with impractical reusable shopping bags.

 

If you want to make our project an even greater success, please share our campaign with your friends on Facebook. We will be eternally grateful!

 

 

One tree per bag

We're 100% committed to making a climate positive product. That means that we give more back to the planet than we take. We already consider our bags environmentally conscious, as they contain less materials than other bags in their category and offset single use plastic bags. In addition, for each bag sold we’ll plant one mangrove tree with Eden Reforestation. Mangrove trees happen to be one of the most effective tools against climate change, and can store up to ten times more carbon than land based tree species. One single mangrove tree can store around 1750lbs (800kg) in its 40 year lifespan. As an added bonus they prevent soil erosion and help sustain coastal ecosystems.

 

Commitment to excellence

We're committed to creating high-quality products. The bags are made with premium custom made nylon polymer fabric and we've put in place a thorough quality-control and testing process to make sure you receive a great final product. We guarantee that your bags will be of excellent quality.

 

Shipping

We offer FREE international shipping to backers pledging for 4 bags and above. All parcels will be shipped with tracked air mail.

 

Nanobag Standard - 19 liters

 

Nanobag Mini - 15 liters

 

Nanobag Micro - 12 liters 

 

Nanobag Sling - 19 liters

 

Nanobag Pack - 14 liters

 

Nanobag XL - 25 liters

 

 

The Team

Tiptop Things is a group of friends working together to infuse everyday items with premium quality and cutting edge technology. We also make sure all our products are climate positive, as we only have one planet.  Nanobag 4.0 is our seventh Kickstarter campaign, and you might have seen our previous Nanobag and Air Deck campaigns.

 

 

Why do we need your support?

We simply can't do this without you. The funds we raise here will go towards producing our custom made fabric, printing and stitching the bags as well as logistics. 

 

Space and Minerals credit: NASA
