The wide peak lapels and tapered cut make this design a truly unique and modern hi-fashion power suit. THE CLASSICO DESIGN:The Classico design is inspired by the traditional Italian Power Suit.  The risen notch lapel and a tapered cut give this design a unique appeal.Dress it down: You can wear your suit in a formal dressed up fashion or you can wear it in a more casual environment without a tie or collared shirt. We teamed up with a fourth generation tailoring facility. story:
Pitot Watches - F/A-18 Super Hornet Inspired Pilot Watch

Since 1886, the time when Carl Benz applied for a patent for his vehicle powered by a gas engine, the birth certificate of the modern-day automobile, humanity has been obsessed with going faster. First, it was the automobile, then our obsession evolved into aircraft with Wilbur and Orville Wright making their first four brief flights at Kitty Hawk. From speed on the ground to speed in the air, we’ve constantly challenged ourselves to push through to new levels. Even with all of humanity's past technological ingenuity, we sometimes come to points in time where even we ourselves are taken aback by our own designs. That feeling of shock, awe, excitement, and sheer power all in one—is something most of us feel when we hear or see a F/A-18 Super Hornet streaking through the skies. An aircraft built for speed, agility, and multi-role capabilities, it truly is a Swiss Army knife of the skies… So it only seemed fitting that we designed a Swiss-powered wristwatch inspired by the one and only—F/A-18 Super Hornet.

Introducing Pitot Watches’ F/A-18 Super Hornet inspired wristwatch

My name is Thomas, a former RDAF aircraft mechanic. I’ve been around incredible pieces of engineering in the form of aircraft all of my life, and with this watch, I’ve taken inspiration from the things I love to create a watch designed to make you feel the way you feel watching a fighter jet fly through the skies. Inspired by the wing profile, foldable wings, square air-intake, jettison button, and 2x exhausts this watch - like the F/A-18-is something to look at.

Features:

-Powered by a Swiss Ronda Quartz movement with Chronograph and Tachymeter complications

-Titanium case for lightweight, strength, and scratch-resistant durability
-Durable rubber strap with secure fold-over clasp
-F/A-18 silhouette etched rear case back

Three Editions:

-Green edition inspired by cockpit digital displays
-Light blue edition to pay tribute to the upcoming Top Gun Maverick movie
-Blue to pay homage to the legendary Blue Angels

Help me bring this fantastic watch that pays homage to a fantastic flying machine in the F/A-18 into a reality! Any support is much appreciated, I’m positive you’ll love the watch!

HUD display added - Second hand updated

HUD display added, inspired from a carrier landing with ILS and approach distance and height - Second hand added pattern from the canopy ejection handle

 

We are applying to use the Blue Angels logo and hopefully, we will be approved for this design.

 

The watch is inspired by key features from the F/A-18 Super Hornet and incorporated into the watch case, subdial buttons, crown, and dial.

We are using aircraft titanium material for the watch case and a lightweight smart rubber strap with a smart and practical fold-over clasp.

Chronograph subdial buttons inspired by the double engine exhaust

Watch data

Case: Titanium

Case Finish: Brushed

Glass: Sapphire with Anti Reflex coating

Crown: Stainless steel 316L

Movement: Swiss Ronda 5021D Quartz with chronograph

Bezel: Tachymeter

Dial: Lumina 356 C

Strap: 23/20 mm

Dim: Width 44mm - Height 10mm - Lug to lug 44mm

Water resistance: 10 ATM

Weight: 90 gram

 

I use crowdfunding to help watches become a reality. After my years in the airforce, I became a product developer in the civil and now building up a new watch brand with fighter jets inspired watches.

Our first watches are the F-14 Tomcat-inspired ones, which we just recently delivered with help from backers on both Indiegogo and Kickstarter. 

Our second watch is the F/A-18 Super Hornet-inspired watch, which we now seek funds for to help with prototype production, so we can launch the big Kickstarter with the prototypes ready later in early 2022.

F-14 Tomcat inspired watches from our first Kickstarter campaign

 

F/A-18 Super Hornet history

The Boeing F / A-18E / F Super Hornet is a US 4.5. generation jet fighters are available in two versions: F / A-18E with one seat and F / A-18F with two seats.

The Super Hornet first flew in 1995 and was put into production in 1997 after Boeing took over McDonnell Douglas in July of that year. The aircraft has replaced the Grumman F-14 Tomcat as the U.S. Navy's air superiority fighter. It can be used from land as well as from aircraft carriers and on its first voyage in 2002 it was used for the first time in combat.

The Super Hornet is also used by the Australian Air Force (RAAF), which has ordered 24 two-seater aircraft to replace the F-111.

Some of the inspiration for our new F/A-18 Super Hornet inspired watch come from the new Top Gun:Maverick movie where they fly the Super Hornet.

There were three painted Super Hornet to assist on the shooting. After the filming, one of the Super Hornet was transferred to the US Navy demo team Blue Angels and now flying as the first F/A-18 Super Hornet delivered in the Blue Angels paintscheme.

F/A-18 Super Hornet
 
Blue Angels demo
 

Long-awaited Top Gun: Maverick

 

What We Need & What You Get

We seek funding to produce a minimum of three prototypes or more and marketing the Kickstarter campaign. The prototypes take 55 days to produce (after releasing the funding from IGG and the invoice to production being verified).

The F/A-18 Super Hornet watch itself comes in three different color editions. The watch is inspired by the wings profile, foldable wingtips, engine exhaust, cockpit button, and digital displays.

  • The green dial editions are inspired by the digital displays in the cockpit.
  • The blue/yellow is inspired by the Blue Angels.
  • The light blue is inspired by the new Top Gun: Maverick movie

We offer these watches for only €225 for 15 backers since the help we are getting by having funds this early makes the project possible, and we want to reward that with a low price for the backers who help with this to become a reality!

 

 

 

 

The funding we reach goes to the production of the prototypes and marketing of the Kickstarter campaign (I have run 5 campaigns already and tried this before, so I'm sure we will reach the funding with help from new and previous backers).

You can check out our previous F-14 campaigns, both here on Indiegogo and on Kickstarter.  I started with prototype funding, then made the prototypes, launched a Kickstarter campaign to fund for production, made the production, and then delivered the watches to all over the world. The feedback in quality and design has been amazing, and I'm very happy with the product in both quality, design, and finish.

Kickstarter F-14 Tomcat watch campaign

Indiegogo F-14 Tomcat watch prototype funding & F-14 Tomcat funding 2

Webshop pitotwatches.com

Instagram.com/pitotwatches pictures and news from campaigns

https://www.facebook.com/pitotfighter

 

Risks & Challenges

With the experience from previous campaigns in the time of a pandemic, we learned a lot, and know what it takes to deliver a watch, all the way from the first sketches, production and to carefully pack the watches and ship them out.

From previous funding results, we managed to get an investor on board to help grow the company in the direction we want, and we are now a company with 4 owners and a board of directors, and an advisory board.

Our goal is not to stay a microbrand, and I have dedicated my life to build up this watch company, I take it very seriously and we already came far in this our fourth year now as a company.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you like our campaign please share the project as much as possible, thank you!
  • Indiegogo has some great campaign share tools to help get the campaign out!

 

Regards Thomas Clausen CEO and founder

Long-awaited Top Gun: Maverick

 


What We Need & What You Get
We seek funding to produce a minimum of three prototypes or more and marketing the Kickstarter campaign. The prototypes take 55 days to produce (after releasing the funding from IGG and the invoice to production being verified).
The F/A-18 Super Hornet watch itself comes in three different color editions. The watch is inspired by the wings profile, foldable wingtips, engine exhaust, cockpit button, and digital displays.

The green dial editions are inspired by the digital displays in the cockpit.
The blue/yellow is inspired by the Blue Angels.
The light blue is inspired by the new Top Gun: Maverick movie


We offer these watches for only €225 for 15 backers since the help we are getting by having funds this early makes the project possible, and we want to reward that with a low price for the backers who help with this to become a reality!

 

 

 


 
The funding we reach goes to the production of the prototypes and marketing of the Kickstarter campaign (I have run 5 campaigns already and tried this before, so I'm sure we will reach the funding with help from new and previous backers).
You can check out our previous F-14 campaigns, both here on Indiegogo and on Kickstarter.  I started with prototype funding, then made the prototypes, launched a Kickstarter campaign to fund for production, made the production, and then delivered the watches to all over the world. The feedback in quality and design has been amazing, and I'm very happy with the product in both quality, design, and finish.
Kickstarter F-14 Tomcat watch campaign
Indiegogo F-14 Tomcat watch prototype funding & F-14 Tomcat funding 2
Webshop pitotwatches.com
Instagram.com/pitotwatches pictures and news from campaigns
https://www.facebook.com/pitotfighter

 

Risks & Challenges
With the experience from previous campaigns in the time of a pandemic, we learned a lot, and know what it takes to deliver a watch, all the way from the first sketches, production and to carefully pack the watches and ship them out.
From previous funding results, we managed to get an investor on board to help grow the company in the direction we want, and we are now a company with 4 owners and a board of directors, and an advisory board.
Our goal is not to stay a microbrand, and I have dedicated my life to build up this watch company, I take it very seriously and we already came far in this our fourth year now as a company.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our campaign please share the project as much as possible, thank you!
Indiegogo has some great campaign share tools to help get the campaign out!

 
Regards Thomas Clausen CEO and founder

story:
We are processing the first batch

of Early Shipping (Aug) orders

 

 
The Wearbuds Watch is a revolutionary device that brings together a game-changing smartwatch, high-quality earbuds, and an advanced health & fitness tracker into one perfect timepiece.
 
 

The sleek design hides a built-in charging compartment for your earbuds. Together with its various tracking and communication features, Wearbuds Watch is stylish enough to make a statement and modern enough to keep up with your lifestyle.     

 
 
Our Engineering and product design team made the extra effort to redesign and create a smartwatch that stores the earbuds and charges them very quickly. Slide your earbuds into the smartwatch to charge their batteries. Then, take them out whenever you need them and enjoy the high-quality audio that keeps you motivated and helps hit the goals!
 
 
 

After 2 successful Indiegogo campaigns, we're back with the 3rd gen Wearbuds Watch! Building on the feedback from thousands of backers and happy customers, we designed Wearbuds to be better and bolder. And thanks to our improved manufacturing and delivery processes, now we can offer early shipping! We have 1,500 units and can ship you yours the moment the campaign ends. 

That's right - you don't have to wait for your Wearbuds because you can order yours with early shipping (you can add it as an Add-on when checking out) and get your Wearbuds Watch shipped as soon as this campaign ends. So instead of getting it in October, you'll get it in August.

 

 

Wearbuds Review by Gamesky
 

 

 

 

 
With a large and high-brightness display for enhanced readability and advanced performance features, Wearbuds Watch is built to help you keep up on all your goals. Track your activity, listen to music, answer calls, and much more, all from the comfort of your wrist.
 

In addition to advanced fitness features, a new design, and a built-in magnetic charger station for earbuds, the Wearbuds Watch improves on its predecessor with a larger display and advanced health monitoring features, such as a blood oxygen sensor, more accurate heart rate monitor, blood pressure sensor, skin temperature, sleep monitor and sedentary alerts. 

 
 
 
 
 

Experience seamless wireless audio performance, 2.5 hrs of continuous audio (on a single charge), perfect stability, and call clarity with Bluetooth 5.0 technology. Take your beats with you no matter where you go, and let your favorite jam motivate you to hit the desired goals.

 
The Wearbuds Watch has been designed to inspire your workout and life with clear, high-quality sound and reliable stability. Thanks to the newly upgraded design for a tight seal, its earbuds will stay put no matter how much you move or exercise, without causing any discomfort to your ears.
 
-
 
Wearbuds Watch earbuds with an improved battery life of up to 12 hours (with recharges), and Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity ensure a seamless and powerful listening experience. Simply tap the earbuds to stop and play the music, answer or reject calls.
 
 

When it comes to workouts, better motivation than music is hard to find. Wearbuds Watch delivers you the quality sound that'll make your workouts enjoyable. 

The earbuds provide a snug and comfortable fit, ensuring the passive noise-cancellation you need for an exceptional soundscape. So keep on listening to your favorite music without hearing the surrounding noise.

 
 
 
 
Instead of interrupting your workout simply tap the earbuds and take or make a call. Tap the earbuds to adjust the volume, change the track, play or pause, or access your phone assistants (Siri, Google Assistant, Alexa, etc.)
 
 
 
With IPX6 Wearbuds Watch is sweat and water-rated, making it a perfect partner for gym workouts, morning runs, yoga meditations and more, without compromising your audio experience.
 

 

Wearbuds Review by Tech I Want

 

 
 
You can choose from six preloaded watch faces or upload your own through Wearbuds application.
 
 
With its cutting-edge design and intuitive interface, Wearbuds APP is the ultimate tool you'll need to track, monitor, and analyze every data so you can live and train better!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Dear Backers,

We would like to thank you for making this journey with us an unforgettable one. Thank you for showing me that everything is possible with good friends next to me.

We introduced Wearbuds for the first time in 2019, and two years have passed since then. Our team of experts worked hard during this period to upgrade and advance our product, which is why I am excited to introduce you to the 3rd generation of Wearbuds today.

The Aipower® team is made up of experts who know how to create products with style and functionality. We’ve developed fresh, cutting-edge and original consumer electronics that take the industry to new places.

And this would not have been possible, without your help! Thank you for your belief and support!

Cheers

Gary & Aipower Team
 
 
Press Kit

story:
Overview

The PUNCH BRACELET by LES FINES LAMES is the first wearable cigar accessory many were waiting for. The only cigar accessory that will blend seamlessly into your life. The one you will instantly find when you need it, and that is a fashionable bracelet the rest of the time.

Get yours now starting at €42 (approx. £36 or $49) 40% OFF the retail price!

Key features

  • It’s a fashionable bracelet.
  • It’s also a 7mm cigar punch. But only to those who know.
  • Always at hand
  • You won’t forget it on the table
  • Made in France
  • The only cigar accessory you can swim with and seamlessly go through security checks

 

UPDATES:

This is where updates to the campaign will be posted. Make sure to visit this page frequently.

UPDATE #1 : 

  • Funded in 5 hours!
  • Stretch goals & Referral contest announced, the details to be unveiled later this week.
  • 40K€ Stretch Goal unveiled : Cigar Journal joins the campaign!

 

UPDATE #2:

  • 40K€ Stretch Goal unlocked!
    Everyone gets a free one year subscription to Cigar Journal. Now onto the 55K€ Stretch Goal : LFL cap & keyring added to every parcel shipped!
  • Referral contest prizes and leaderboard added. 


UPDATE #3:

  • 55K€ Stretch Goal unlocked!
    Cool LES FINES LAMES caps & keyrings for every backer!
    Now onto the 60K€ Stretch Goal: a slow smoking masterclass with Marko BILIC, the Cigar Smoking World Championship founder! 
  • Referral contest leaderboard updated.
  • Flavor wheel coasters gifts
    Every campaign backer will get a couple of exclusive coasters shipped with their bracelets

 

UPDATE #4:

  • 60K€ Stretch Goal unlocked!
    Marko BILIC's Slow Smoking Masterclass for everyone!
    Now onto the 70K€ Stretch Goal : coffee swag with a free top quality enamel mug. Three days left to unlock this perk.
  • Referral leaderboard updated. 

 

Campaign story ⬇

 
 

Following the most successful cigar related crowdfunding campaign to date with LE PETIT by LES FINES LAMES : meet the PUNCH BRACELET, the easiest cigar accessory to carry around. A beautiful and fashionable bracelet hiding a 7mm cigar punch - we're reinventing the cigar smoker everyday carry one accessory at a time.

 

 
Designed in Marseille and made in France, the PUNCH BRACELET by LES FINES LAMES conceals a 316L surgical steel 7mm punch that has excellent long lasting properties. Its the only cigar accessory you will be able to bring everywhere and that will provide you with a #PerfectCut every time.

The PUNCH BRACELET by LES FINES LAMES operates in a few simple steps for impossible to miss cuts :

  • Remove the bracelet from your wrist
  • Open the clasp to reveal the blade
  • Twist the blade into the cap of your cigar
  • And voilà! 

 

 

From Panatela to Gordo size, its 7mm blade makes it the ideal accessory tocut any kind of cigar.

#PerfectCut

We recommend to download and use our printable wrist sizer to precisely measure your wrist: download link .

As we want every bracelet to perfectly match your wrist size, please follow the below steps to measure your wrist size : 

  1. Please measure at the point just between your hand and the wrist bone.
  2. Please measure in a tighter fit.
  3. Please do not add any 'space' yourself to your wrist measurement.

Alternatively, you can also use a measuring tape or a piece of string.

 

  • The PUNCH BRACELET is available for wrist sizes from 15cm to 21cm (5.9 inches to 8.3 inches).
  • Indicate your wrist size when selecting the desired perk.
  • If you are still not sure after measurement, we would recommend picking a tighter fit.
  • If you want to secure your purchase and take the necessarry time to measure your wrist, chose "Ask me later". We will send you an email when the campain ends.

The average wrist size for men would be 18 cm / 7.1 inches.
The average wrist size for women would be 16 cm / 6.3 inches.  

 

The PUNCH BRACELET is available in 8 different kind of 10mm beads.

 

MAGNESITE - Master of thoughts
White magnesite is known for its calming properties. It helps to improve creative visualization and imagination. It makes thoughts clearer, more orderly and more harmonious when worn as a bracelet.

ONYX, The spiritual shield
The Onyx gemstone helps to focus on the essentials: gaining confidence, facilitating communication and speech.⁠

SERPENTINE, The state rock of California
Wearing serpentine jewelry in contact with the body, such as a bracelet, allows the energy of the stone to help you turn negative thoughts and actions into positive ones.

SODALITE, The royal blue
Enhancing self-esteem, self-acceptance and self-confidence, sodalite broadens the understanding of oneself and one's environment. Sodalite is mainly found in British Columbia.

TIGER EYE, The chatoyant gemstone
Silky and lustrous, Tiger Eye offers a level of grounding security that keeps you feeling safe and protected in all circumstances. Tiger's Eye is also a talisman of good luck and fortune.

RED JASPER, Bringer of success
Jewelry use of jaspers goes back into the early history of civilization. In ancient Egypt, red jasper stone was linked to the fertility of Mother Isis and Native Americans believed that red jasper was the blood of Mother Earth. A gemstone known to sharpen the mind, give courage and bring success and wealth.

LAVA, Filled with the energy of the Earth
Lava is a stone made from cooled magma. Carrier of joy and happiness, used to soothe, it is a gemstone known to balance your mind.

TURQUOISE, The colorful
The word turquoise dates back to the 17th century and is derived from the French turquois which means "Turkish" because the mineral was first brought to Europe by Turkey. It adorns a beautiful cyanish-green color, based on the gem of the same name.

 

The PUNCH BRACELET is available with two types of connectors bodies, both with a 316L stainless steel blade. This probably also makes the PUNCH BRACELET the only cigar accessory you can swim with.

Brass body, the Patina King

Known since ancient times, brass is still used today for its properties in applications such as interior design, musical instruments, jewelry, and even ammunition casings.  It is a very durable copper alloy with exceptional corrosion resistance. Brass is prone to patina, a natural phenomenon that can be easily removed or cultivated for best results.

 

What is patina?⁠

It is simply a natural, superficial discoloration of a metal that lies on the surface as a kind of coating. A broad concept that can be described as a product that has "aged". A product that has improved over time, like some cigars for example.

Patina has many functions, like being a kind of "seal" on metal for example, but for us, the most important seems to be that it represents the relationship between the object and its owner.

The common history they will have written together, day after day, month after month, year after year. The patina is easily removed, but if you let it grow, the PUNCH BRACELET will have changes in color that will make it unique.

There lies all the beauty of the patina.⁠⁠

 

316L Stainless Steel body, the inalterable

Sometimes refered as Marine Grade Stainless Steel, used in a variety of fields such as the petrochemical industry, water treatment, medical implants, or high-end diving watches, 316L is the superior choice for high corrosion and high temperature applications.

 

Combining beads and body materials, the PUNCH BRACELET by LES FINES LAMES exists in 10 versions.

Each version of the PUNCH BRACELET by LES FINES LAMES is available as : 

  • 40% OFF EARLY BIRD perk - limited to 30 each
  • Then each version is still available for you to purchase, saving 20% on the retail price.

*MSRP = Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price

 

What are stretch goals?

Stretch goals are additional features, products or add-ons that will be added for free to all contributions or that will be made available for purchase if we reach a certain amount of money raised.

 

What is a referral contest and how does it work?

A referral contest is a way to reward the people who share the campaign link the most and generate the most contributions.

Entering the contest is easy : all you have to do is to promote our campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account.

Learn more by reading indiegogo FAQ page : How to Participate in a Referral Contest

Please find below the prizes :

 

After testing our first PUNCH BRACELET prototype since February and crafting a 100 pieces pre-production series in June, we've been constantly improving them in order to bring you the best cigar accessory. Join us on our journey to bring the PUNCH BRACELET to market and ensure you're one of the first to own one.

 

Born in 2015 after a successful first INDIEGOGO campaign, LES FINES LAMES proposes a unique range of exceptional cigar accessories, 100% made in France, and sold all over the world: more than 90% of its turnover is made abroad. With a strong presence on social networks, LES FINES LAMES built in less than 5 years a loyal 53K followers Instagram community, met during international cigar events, and developed numerous collaborations with leading and prestigious brands.

 

Q: You guys are already an established company, why do you do a crowdfunding campaign?
A: Because we did that three times already. It’s part of our DNA, and it’s also a very cool way to launch a new product, rewarding our community with time limited launch discounts!

 

Q: How do I remove Patina from brass?
A: There are plenty of ways to remove patina. One of the easiest might be scrubing the connector gently with a soft toothbrush and a small amount of toothpaste.

 

Q: Why would someone remove Patina?
A: Well, don’t be so judgemental. Some like patina, some others don’t.
Do as you like, it’s your PUNCH BRACELET after all! ;)

story:
A Full Skeleton Tourbillon watch full of light and transparency

 

 

 

An innovative Full Skeleton Tourbillon watch with the scratch-resistant sapphire glass

 

 

An ultimate form of transparency realized by merging the luxuriousness of tourbillon watches, one of the world's three grand complications, with a full skeleton body to allow a 360-degree view of the elegant and beautiful inner structure.

 

The tourbillon movement, which is the heart of the watch, dazzles all who see it

 

 

Original full skeleton case developed in-house. The frame case is made out of 316L stainless steel which is the same material used in luxury watch brands. The case that brings out the transparency and clearness of the watch utilizes crystal glass. A truly unique and special wristwatch - a tourbillon which is one of the most complex of mechanical complications - has been created.

 

 

 

Featured in multiple world-renowned design & watch media

*YANKO offers special coupon for readers only!

 

Full Skeleton Tourbillon watch - A passion to create a watch that has never been created

 

"Why hide the magical movement of the Tourbillon?"

 

 

The project to create THE ARCHER series started when the chief designer of ZEROOTIME, SYUU, asked himself this question. In common mechanical watches, a plate is imbedded to fix the complex nature of the movement. Because of this plate, the majority of the movement itself is often hidden away. There are some designs such as the Open Heart model with a hole in the dial, still only a small section of the movement can be seen. We cannot let the beautiful mechanics of the watch go to waste. For all watch enthusiasts to enjoy the beauty of the Tourbillon movement, ZEROOTIME was determined to find a solution. After years of research and development, the T1 & T2 THE ARCHER series, ZEROOTIME's completely original full skeleton tourbillon wristwatch was born.

 

ZEROO T1 THE ARCHER FULL SKELETON TOURBILLON ROUND - a shimmering transparency that brightens your day

 

T1 Watch case diameter: 43mm

Available in 6 colors:

A Full Skeleton Tourbillon that seeks for the "ultimate form of transparency"

An innovative skeleton frame

ZEROO developed an innovative skeleton frame by removing the plate which fixes the movement of the watch. A perfect balance between firmly stabilizing the movement and enjoying the full view of the movement has been achieved.

 

Complicated tourbillon movement

The movement, which is the heart of the watch, was created especially for the ZEROO full skeleton tourbillon in collaboration with tourbillon specialist manufacturers.

The markers around the 45 minutes indicator on the T1's inner bezel have been removed, to enjoy viewing the rotation of the Tourbillon from all angles.

 

The leather strap with a convenient D-Buckle

The case-back engraving is placed along the edge, forming a gentle curve to match the round form of the case. The strap is made out of black leather with a D-Buckle (the D of the D-Buckle comes from the initial letter of deployment). Perlage, a traditional and popular type of finishing used in many luxury brand watches, is applied on the inside.

 

ZEROO T2 THE ARCHER FULL SKELETON TOURBILLON SQUARE - like a jewel that adds a special color to your everyday life

T2 Watch case diameter: 39mm

Available in 6 colors:

A Full Skeleton Tourbillon that seeks for the "ultimate form of transparency"

360° full skeleton watch design

Due to the exposed skeleton movement, the watch case too had to be made into a skeleton structure. Much focus was given on being able to enjoy the view of the movement from the side exterior. ZEROOTIME also developed in-house a full skeleton exclusive case. The frame case is made out of 316L stainless steel which is the same material used in luxury watch brands. Crystal glass which has high durability and transparency is used for the watch casing, for increased visibility of the inner mechanism from the side exterior of the watch. By achieving a high level of transparency, the precise movement of the carriage can be enjoyed looking at.

 

Highly transparent crystal glass case middle

The square case allows a better view of the entire movement. The side view of the T2 is already beautiful, but its rear view is exceptional. The movement looks as if it is floating, amidst the robust but highly transparent crystal glass case middle.

 

An exclusive strap perfectly matches the T2 square case

The 1 inch (25 mm) width strap firmly supports the watch case. The leather strap is made out of alligator leather and has a pin buckle. The strap has a classy look which is a perfect match with the case and watch face. A rubber ring has been added to the crown, not only to enhance its usability but to add some charm in the watch's design.

 

Utilizing crystal glass on case middle

The T1 round case - specially developed to enjoy the best view of the tourbillon movement from all angles

 

The T2 square case - removing all parts that obstruct the view of the movement just as transparent and luminous as the T1, and the gentle arc shape of the case back fits comfortably around your wrist

 

Although crystal glass and sapphire crystal have the same degree of transparency, the cost of crystal glass is about half of that of sapphire crystal, making it an effective material. Crystal glass has a hardness of 7 Mohs, which is more than enough to be used as a material for the case middle.

 

Hand-wind Tourbillon movement

 

The ZEROO T1 & T2 are manual winding timepieces. You can wind the spring by turning the crown clockwise. Since the crown is the part which is most often used, a lot of consideration has been given to create it in the best size and usability.

 

Luminova® luminous on the hands and index

To let the wearer enjoy the movement as well as easily tell the time, a considerable amount of time was spent studying the optimal hand thickness and luminous surface area and to realize the transparency of the clock hands. LumiNova® makes the hands and index luminous, allowing you to instantly know the time even in the dark.

 

Dial and case back using scratch-resistant sapphire crystal

 

By mounting 1st grade sapphire glass on the top and bottom of the case, the beautiful movement of the Tourbillon can be appreciated from all angles with its high transparency and trusted durability.

 

The double mainspring mechanism allows up to 70 hours of power reserve

You can also enjoy viewing the beauty and precision of the springs winding-up.

*Due to the delicate nature of the watch, we recommend no more than 30 rotations at a time 

*To avoid overwind the watch, please pay attention to winding and stop winding if you feel resistance from the crown

 

The watch strap really matters to us 

The ZEROO straps offers black, Blue and Green alligator leather, polished to perfectly complement the transparency of the timepiece. Stitched by hand, it has been scrupulously designed down to the pitch on the back. The easy-click spring bar allows for easy replacement and change of watch straps.

 

Comparison of tourbillon's value to the price of ZEROO T1 & T2

 

The world's three grand complications are the tourbillon, the minute repeater, and the perpetual calendar, and wristwatches containing any one of these are sold by luxury watch brands for hundreds of thousands of dollars.
By relying on crowdfunding (where we circumvent barriers like retail costs, brand markups, showroom fees, expensive exhibitions) and delivering to-order watches directly to passionate consumers, we have been able to make and sell watches at their ‘true cost’.

 

 

 

 

 

The Early-bird Special Perks 

 

① One watch (either ZEROO T1 or T2)

Please select one from the below options:

 

② 2 pieces watch set (both ZEROO T1 and T2)

You will receive a 2 pieces set which includes both ZEROO T1 and T2 in return. Please select your color of choice for each watch type.

 

THE MAKING OF ZEROO FULL SKELETON TOURBILLON

 

We created a simple video to show you the design process of the full skeleton case. The ZEROOTIME staff became so excited when watching this 3D modeling. It was a decisive moment which reassured the possibility to create a watch that has never been made before.

 

 

An original case to suit the beauty of the tourbillon movement

The team was very particular on creating an outstanding case that rightfully showcased the craftsmanship of the movement, as its beauty could only be fully appreciated with a full skeleton design. Light needs to reach all angles in order to appreciate the beauty of the movement: in order to achieve this concept, there was a need to develop an entirely transparent case from scratch. In order to let the slightest of more light, the lug pieces are also made in skeleton. It was especially difficult to realize the skeleton design for the side exterior, which resulted in many trials until reaching a convincing quality.

 

It is common in a Tourbillon design to mount the carriage on the 6 o'clock mark, however as the watch strap needs to be attached in this area, light cannot be captured into the watch body. Hence, the carriage in the ZEROO T1 & T2 was moved to the 9 o'clock mark to realize the beautiful and transparent full skeleton tourbillon.

Clock hands are also crafted in a skeleton design. Countless revisions and fine adjustments were made so that the clock hands do not get in the way of viewing the movement, as well as to serve its main functionality to read time with ease.

 

Package

 

A suitable watch case for the ZEROO T1 & T2 THE ARCHER has been developed with extra consideration. Each watch even comes with a 2-year warranty and sits upon a leather cushion inside its premium wooden case (with beautiful Rolls-Royce-inspired doors) that also doubles as the warranty certificate.

 

JAPAN Quality

ZEROO T1 & T2 THE ARCHER are manufactured in China. Manufacturing of watch parts used by watchmakers all over the world, including luxury Swiss watch brands, can hardly be discussed without taking into account Chinese manufacturing technology.

All products by ZEROOTIME are originally designed at the company's Tokyo Studio. To realize ZEROOTIME's policy - to provide high quality products affordably - a lot of thought is put into product development on a daily basis. Once mock-ups are created in-house, thorough communication is made with watch parts manufacturers. Multiple test runs are repeated under rigorous quality check whether it is the manufacturing of the parts or creating a sample product.

By managing such processes internally instead of outsourcing, speedy product development, reliable quality and cost reduction has been realized.

Final inspection and quality control of all products are conducted at the Tokyo Studio.

If there are any products that don't meet the required standard, they are disassembled to be adjusted and reconstructed, then undergo a final checking process such as water resistance test to ensure that only finished products with guaranteed quality are shipped.

 

WATCH SPECIFICATION SHEET

 

ZEROO T1 FULL SKELETON TOURBILLON THE ARCHER

Model: THE ARCHER (ZEROO T1)

Product number: ZT001a

Brand: ZEROO

Movement: Cal.T1 TOURBILLON (Frequency: 28,800)

Watch type: Manual hand-wind

Dial window: Sapphire crystal

Case-back: See-through back (sapphire crystal)

Frame case: 316L stainless steel

Case middle: Crystal glass

Case color: Silver and Rose / Yellow gold

Diameter: 43mm

Thickness: 11.5mm

Strap: Alligator square-scale leather (hand stitched)

Strap color: Black and blue

Strap width: 21mm

Buckle: Deployant Buckle (with Perlage finishing)

Weight: Approximately 69g

Water resistance: 3ATM

Function: Swiss Super-LumiNova (Hands, Indices)

Dial shape: Round

Accessories: Authentic ZEROOTIME wooden case

Warranty period: 2 years

Country of design & quality inspection: Japan

Country of manufacture: China

Quality control: ZEROOTIME Tokyo Studio

 

ZEROO T2 FULL SKELETON TOURBILLON THE ARCHER

Model: THE ARCHER (ZEROO T2)

Product Number: ZT002

Brand: ZEROO

Movement: Cal.T1 TOURBILLON (Frequency: 28,800)

Watch type: Manual hand-wind

Dial window: Sapphire crystal

Case-back: See-through back (sapphire crystal)

Frame case: 316L stainless steel

Case middle: crystal class

Case color: Silver and Rose / Yellow gold

Diameter: 39mm

Thickness: 11.2mm

Strap: Alligator round-scale leather (hand stitched)

Strap color: Black and blue

Strap width: 25mm

Buckle: Pin Buckle

Weight: Approximately 64g

Water resistance: 3ATM

Function: Swiss Super-LumiNova (Hands, indices)

Dial shape: Square

Accessories: Authentic ZEROOTIME vanity case

Warranty period: 2 years

Country of design & quality inspection: Japan

Country of manufacture: China

Quality control: ZEROOTIME Tokyo studio

 

 

Warranty

 

2 year warranty period

ZEROO T1 & T2 THE ARCHIER comes with a 2 year warranty.

Any watch within the warrant period can be repaired by ZEROOTIME without charge if it is within the scope of natural damages (whether it can be classified as a natural damage or not will be judged carefully by ZEROOTIME after receiving the product).

We kindly ask customers to cover shipping expenses for sending and receiving the product for repair.

*If there are any traces of the case-back being opened or any traces of repair by the customer (or repair shops), we may not be able to cover the repairs under the warranty

*If you lose the warranty certificate you will not be eligible for the warranty

*Please bear the cost of watch parts in the case of repair under property damage. However, ZEROOTIME will bear the cost if we classified as natural damage

 

Precautions for handling and storage

The watch has a delicate structure, therefore please avoid subjecting it to strong impact and exposing it to water. Please handle the crown with care as it directly operates the movement of the watch. When storing, please make sure to avoid magnetism, humidity, and UV light.

Please avoid below actions to avoid malfunction.

*Open the back case on your own

*Wearing the watch without tighten the crown

*Swim, bath or soak the watch into water

 

Overhaul Service

COA (Cleaning, Oiling and Adjusting) will be charged 500USD (incl. tax) per once. We recommend the overhaul service every 3 - 5 years depends on usage. The overhaul service takes 2 months to be completed and ship-back.

We kindly ask customers to cover shipping expenses for sending and receiving the product for overhaul.

 

Redefining watches from scratch

 

Watches are no longer just a tool to track time - it has transformed into an expression for self-identity. If you just want to track time, a smartphone, laptop, TV or radio can provide you with accurate information. Then why do we still wear watches? Is it to add color to your life, or to express your way of living, or to deepen bonds with those around you? So many reasons and beliefs to this question can be thought of...

ZEROOTIME constantly asks itself the question "what is the true meaning of a wristwatch?" and seeks to turn its philosophy and ideas into reality.

 

 

 

ABOUT US

 

 

ZEROO TIME Co., Ltd is a watchmaker based in the outskirts of Tokyo, which was established in December 2017. In 2018, it released ZEROO ART, a fashion watch without hands. In August 2018, it officially started the sales of its wristwatches. Since then, it has continued to produce innovative wristwatches and in August 2020 the CLASSIC MOON PHASE I was released. There are several other projects that are currently ongoing. The T1 THE ARCHER which was recently produced is positioned as one of the main projects for the company, with all of the resources being devoted into its development.

 

 

OUR HISTORY

 

December 2017: Established ZEROOTIME Co., Ltd

May 2018: Released ZEROO ART series

August 2020: Released CLASSIC MOON PHASE I series

October 2020: Released full skeleton tourbillon ZEROO T1 series

January 2021: Released CLASSIC MOON PHASE II C2 series

January 2021: Released skeleton mechanical M1 series

 

 

ZEROO is a new watch brand that is produced by watchmaker ZEROO TIME Co., Ltd. Under the motto "redefining watches from scratch", ZEROO TIME Co., Ltd has been producing unique hand watches.

In 2018, ZEROOTIME released a fashion watch series ZEROO ART.

In 2020, the CLASSIC moonphase I series and full skeleton tourbillon watches were released, and the project launched on Makuake which is a Japanese crowdfunding platform, ended in success as it achieved its target in just one week resulting in a total of 500,000 USD in funds.

Two additional projects which were recently launched, the C2 CLASSIC moonphase II series which is a reconstruction of the moon phase, and the skeleton mechanical M1 series, a tonneau watch with an ultra-thin hand-wounded movement installed, were also successful.

There are three product categories in the ZEROO brand: ART, MODERN, TOURBILLON and CLASSIC.

The ART and MODERN series consist of an unique and dynamic product line-up, where as the CLASSIC series consist of watches that respect tradition and history, which can be positioned as the "origin of watches".

ZEROOTIME bases its core belief in "redefining watches from scratch", and seeks to deliver high quality but affordable products.

 

RISK & CHALLENGES

 

The team at ZEROOTIME are making their utmost effort with strong determination to drive the ZEROO T1 & T2 project in partner with local teams and manufacturers. However, there may incur slight changes in the design or specifications throughout the development process. Furthermore, shipping delays may occur due to issues such as manufacturing delays, weather, situation of the recent pandemic. If any delays or changes are to occur, it will be announced on official platforms as soon as confirmed.

Finally, the team at ZEROOTIME will work closely together so that every supporter who receives the ZEROO watch will be satisfied with our product. Thank you for your continuous support for ZEROOTIME.

 

*Returns or refunds regarding usability etc. will not be accepted.

*Design and specifications of products under development may partially change.

*If the number of funds exceeds expectations, the shipping time may be delayed due to manufacturing circumstances.

*If the number of funds exceeds expectations and if further improvements in mass production can be realized, the regular sales price may be lower than the planned sales price.

*Please note that even we have international patented design product, it may not be possible to prevent the sales of similar products from other companies.

 

We ask for your understanding in advance regarding the above points. Thank you again for your understanding and support.

 

Partnership

This project is powered by Japan Crowdfunding Co., LTD.

ZEROOTIME constantly asks itself the question "what is the true meaning of a wristwatch?" and seeks to turn its philosophy and ideas into reality.

 
 
 
ABOUT US
 

 
ZEROO TIME Co., Ltd is a watchmaker based in the outskirts of Tokyo, which was established in December 2017. In 2018, it released ZEROO ART, a fashion watch without hands. In August 2018, it officially started the sales of its wristwatches. Since then, it has continued to produce innovative wristwatches and in August 2020 the CLASSIC MOON PHASE I was released. There are several other projects that are currently ongoing. The T1 THE ARCHER which was recently produced is positioned as one of the main projects for the company, with all of the resources being devoted into its development.
 
 
OUR HISTORY
 
December 2017: Established ZEROOTIME Co., Ltd
May 2018: Released ZEROO ART series
August 2020: Released CLASSIC MOON PHASE I series
October 2020: Released full skeleton tourbillon ZEROO T1 series
January 2021: Released CLASSIC MOON PHASE II C2 series
January 2021: Released skeleton mechanical M1 series
 

 
ZEROO is a new watch brand that is produced by watchmaker ZEROO TIME Co., Ltd. Under the motto "redefining watches from scratch", ZEROO TIME Co., Ltd has been producing unique hand watches.
In 2018, ZEROOTIME released a fashion watch series ZEROO ART.
In 2020, the CLASSIC moonphase I series and full skeleton tourbillon watches were released, and the project launched on Makuake which is a Japanese crowdfunding platform, ended in success as it achieved its target in just one week resulting in a total of 500,000 USD in funds.
Two additional projects which were recently launched, the C2 CLASSIC moonphase II series which is a reconstruction of the moon phase, and the skeleton mechanical M1 series, a tonneau watch with an ultra-thin hand-wounded movement installed, were also successful.
There are three product categories in the ZEROO brand: ART, MODERN, TOURBILLON and CLASSIC.
The ART and MODERN series consist of an unique and dynamic product line-up, where as the CLASSIC series consist of watches that respect tradition and history, which can be positioned as the "origin of watches".
ZEROOTIME bases its core belief in "redefining watches from scratch", and seeks to deliver high quality but affordable products.
 
RISK & CHALLENGES
 
The team at ZEROOTIME are making their utmost effort with strong determination to drive the ZEROO T1 & T2 project in partner with local teams and manufacturers. However, there may incur slight changes in the design or specifications throughout the development process. Furthermore, shipping delays may occur due to issues such as manufacturing delays, weather, situation of the recent pandemic. If any delays or changes are to occur, it will be announced on official platforms as soon as confirmed.
Finally, the team at ZEROOTIME will work closely together so that every supporter who receives the ZEROO watch will be satisfied with our product. Thank you for your continuous support for ZEROOTIME.
 
*Returns or refunds regarding usability etc. will not be accepted.
*Design and specifications of products under development may partially change.
*If the number of funds exceeds expectations, the shipping time may be delayed due to manufacturing circumstances.
*If the number of funds exceeds expectations and if further improvements in mass production can be realized, the regular sales price may be lower than the planned sales price.
*Please note that even we have international patented design product, it may not be possible to prevent the sales of similar products from other companies.
 
We ask for your understanding in advance regarding the above points. Thank you again for your understanding and support.
 
Partnership

This project is powered by Japan Crowdfunding Co., LTD.

story:
Introducing ATTENU8™ 

ATTENU8™ are metal-bodied ear plugs that provide an easier fit and better sound reduction. It has an SNR 32 rating, a concave aluminium body and comes with 3 sizes of durable memory foam tips. A pair of bottom foam tips are included for side sleepers. 

With your ideal foam tip size and the metal body, simply 'squeeze & fit' and get the peace you finally deserve with these quality ear plugs. 
 


Features 


As seen on:


 

Issues with other ear plugs

#1 Foam ear plugs are difficult to fit:
When we set out to create ATTENU8™, we talked to many ear plug users. Majority who used foam ear plugs found it wasteful to regularly throw them away. They also struggled to attain the right fit which affected sound reduction. Does this look familiar to you? 

A research participant trying to fit foam ear plugs

In 2013, a research investigated the relationship between depth of insertion and sound reduction with foam ear plugs. Even with instructions provided, the subjects could not achieve the standard insertion of 50%-60% but only a 15%-20% fit. (Berger, 2013).

 

Foam ear plugs are malleable, making it harder to achieve a deeper fit in our ear canals. 

 

#2 Bulky metal-bodied ear plugs with 'melting' foam tips:
Those who have used other metal-bodied ear plugs for sleeping, feedback that they were too big and uncomfortable. They wanted something smaller. They also complained that the foam tips were not durable and 'melts' onto the metal stem - making it a hassle to clean off and replace:

'Melted' foam tips

#3 Improper usage of ear plugs:
Lastly, with the COVID-19 outbreak, many were forced to work from home. This may be the new normal - yay or nay? But regardless, users started using their sleeping ear plugs during the day, and their day ear plugs for sleeping at night - sometimes this worked out, but sometimes it didn't.
 

Our Solution

Simply introducing another ear plug that claims to be 'more effective or comfortable' won't cut it because that's what users already expect.

When you least expect it, you can count on ATTENU8™ to reduce that sudden f.r.u.s.t.r.a.t.i.n.g.l.y noisy situation. So not only is ATTENU8™ effective, comfortable and durable - it will be at your corner when the time comes. 

 

Delivering the peace you deserve

 

The case for an aluminium body

With the aluminium body, it is easier to fit ATTENU8™ properly into the ear canal, offering better sound reduction. Other than an easier fit, an aluminium body helps in the following ways:

1. Density:
By using a denser material like aluminium, increases mass per unit area which then increases transmission loss. That being said, ATTENU8™ is still lightweight and comfortable.

ATTENU8™ - as light as a paper clip

2. Structure & rigidity between materials:
By combining aluminium with a polyurethane (PU) foam tip, increases sound attenuation as PU is a good sound absorber. With this combination, sound energy is lost through different materials with varying densities.
 

3. Barrier against stubborn lower frequencies:
Low-frequency sound waves are harder to absorb as it has longer wavelengths that reach greater distances; passing through without much vibration. Because of the mass and density of aluminium, the aluminium body is able to de-couple lower frequency sound waves before reaching the ear, offering more attenuation.

 

Memory foam tip experiment

We conducted an experiment with 4 brands of foam tips: Brand I, Brand T, Brand M and our foam tips (Brand A) to test the durability of our foam tips.

Experiment details

 

ATTENU8™ and Brand M emerged at the top while the others disintegrated.

 

Results here: 

Experiment results with hand sanitizer

Experiment results with H2O

*Please do not use any harsh chemicals to clean your ear plugs. The purpose of the experiment was to intentionally test the ear plugs with harsh conditions to test for durability. Do follow the care instructions provided.

 

Efficacy

ATTENU8™ ear plugs have a rating of SNR32. To derive this rating, a test was conducted in an acoustic test chamber with specialised equipment. 

SNR rating aside, attaining the correct fit is crucial for optimal sound reduction. We decided to conduct 2 rounds of interviews with users across different age groups with varying needs.
 

Round 1 of customer interviews


We played a series of noise clips and asked participants to rate how effective ATTENU8™ and Brand M ear plugs were in reducing noise. They were also provided fitting instructions prior to fitting the ear plugs.

Round 2 of customer interviews


A summary of the results: 

92% of participants could NOT attain the proper fit with traditional foam ear plugs. Many struggled to insert them properly, citing it was ‘too soft and malleable'. 


When the foam ear plugs expanded within the ear canal, it occasionally caused the tips to ‘retract’ out of their ear canal.

Traditional foam ear plugs fitted wrongly

  • On average, users rated ATTENU8™ 22% more effective than foam ear plugs.
  • In cases where users did not know how to fit the foam ear plugs, ratings varied with ATTENU8™ being up to 85% more effective than foam ear plugs.
  • There is a direct correlation between attaining a correct fit and effectiveness.
    With ATTENU8™, you will be getting an easier fit. 

We also selected some users to try our prototypes. Here was their feedback:

Who should use ATTENU8™? 

Consider ATTENU8™ if you're trying to:

  • Get a decent night’s sleep from your snoring partner or crying baby
  • Work-from-home despite noisy family members/neighbours
  • Tolerate house renovation/construction
  • Attain better hearing protection given your nature of work (aircraft technician, construction, etc)
  • Find a better alternative to your existing ear plugs

 

Jam, sleep and travel with ATTENU8™

 

What's Included?  

 

Add-ons  

Accessories available in black only.  Do note that a mesh pouch is already included with the purchase of ATTENU8™.  Dimensions of the metal capsule are 2cm (W) x 6cm (H).

Check out these unboxing videos 

 

Product Specifications

Dimensions:

  • Metal body: 16mm (H) x 6.5mm (W)

  • Metal body with S foam tip fitted: 21mm (H) x 10mm (W) 

Estimated dimensions of ATTENU8™

Weight:

  • A pair of ATTENU8™ metal body: 1.5g
  • A pair of ATTENU8™ with S foam fitted: 2g 

Weight of ATTENU8™

 

Why do we need your help

After testing with users and getting their feedback, we need your help to:

  • Ramp up on mass production
  • Increase awareness through continued marketing
  • Revamp our website
  • Attract major retailers/brands to stock ATTENU8™
  • ​R&D for future products and accessories

 

What is in it for you? 

You get it earlier and cheaper than RRP. You are also NOT backing a long-drawn project. We have already started production. 

From sketching to actual prototypes and testing


Our manufacturing is near complete and we are ready to get ATTENU8™ in your hands. 

Also, our future proceeds will be donated to SG Enable to help sustain their work in enhancing employment for persons with disabilities and enabling them as integral members of society. Having seen how their program first-hand, we'd love to play a part and make a difference. 
 

How to get?


Timeline 

 

When will this be shipped? 

We aim to ship your order by mid-November 2021 and depending on where you are located, you should expect to receive ATTENU8™ between 4-20 days from shipping. 

If you know someone who deserves some peace in their life, get ATTENU8™ as a gift. We are confident of getting it to you before Christmas.

Rewards will be delivered via air freight directly from our distribution centre in Singapore. Quality checks are done on every ATTENU8™ to ensure that it meets our exacting standards. 

 

Our Story 

We first started selling a range of ear plugs in 2020. Since then, we've had feedback + frequently asked questions from customers on some of the products sold and we wanted to address those gaps. We wouldn't call ourselves 'revolutionary' or 'game-changing', neither are we the 'world's first'. But it was important that we tried to close the gaps that our customers faced and make improvements to something as simple as a 'ear plug'. 

 

"Sometimes, little things make a big difference"

- Nino Varsimashvili

 

We didn't reinvent the wheel but rather, designed with intent - making the tweaks that matter. After which, it is crucial to follow through with educating our users on the importance on 'fit'. We have included step-by-step instructions, a fitting instruction demo video and an email address to address questions relating to 'fit'. It is the key ingredient to making ATTENU8™ a success and frankly, we know we cannot do it without you.


We want to set the gold standard of ear plugs and more importantly, rid the notion that ear plugs are ‘uncool’ and encourage the use of hearing protection in our daily lives. This starts with encouraging the use of ear plugs and education on how to attain the correct fit to maximise sound attenuation.


We believe in continuous reiteration to give our end users the ideal experience. After some concepts, prototypes, user testing and refinement, we created ATTENU8™. 

About The Founder  

The team of advisors consists of entrepreneurs, designers and marketers who've worked together since 2020 to overcome painstaking obstacles to bring to life the vision of ATTENU8™. 

Bringing The Project To Life With: 

Importantly, we have a big team of product designers whom we’d like to thank - our research participants. Here’s a big, ‘THANK YOU!’ for being part of our journey.  We hope you see your feedback incorporated in some way or another. We raise our glasses and tips our hats off to you.

###

Effective, comfortable, durable ear plugs that are an easier fit and a better fix. Get yours earlier and at a discount.   

Rid the noise, get the peace you deserve.
