story:
INDEPENDENT WATCH MAKER SINCE 1999

 

 

 
 

Introducing the new YES WorldWatch V7 with wireless induction charging.

After a lengthy process of development and testing the wireless charging system has proven flawless. Getting it manufactured is proving to be a financial challenge. 

To put watches into production we need to raise an additional $10,000 plus quickly, and to that end we are re-opening our existing Indiegogo crowd funding campaign offering 5 unique perks at great pricing. 

Just remember, this current fund raising tally started at $147,085. We’ll reach this new and expanded goal when hopefully we get to $157,085.

 

The YES V7 silver tone on a soft strap.

Titanium case fitted with your choice of bezel and soft strap, satin or shiny finish. Once you have placed the pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your choices. Like custom making your favorite time piece. The picture above shows the shiny finish with a sky blue AM/PM bezel and the sky blue and white striped NATO. The quartz movement variance will have been established by a special reader at the factory, which will enable us to send it to you set at a +/- 0.5 seconds a month accuracy.
WS-SS-IC
MSRP $795
Indiegogo perk $495

 

The black YES V7 on a soft strap.

Black IP titanium case fitted with your choices of bezel and soft strap, satin or polished finish. Once you have placed the pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your specifications. Shown here with the yellow metallic solunar bezel and silicon strap with yellow stitching. The custom made wireless charging in the V7 will run for about 3 months on a full night of charging.
WB-SS-IC
MSRP $845
Indiegogo Perk $545

 

The YES V7 silver tone on a bracelet.

Titanium case in satin or polished finish, with your choice of bezel and a 3-link or 5-link bracelet plus a soft strap. Shown here with the sky blue symbol bezel. Once you have placed this pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your choices. Include your wrist circumference and we’ll adjust the bracelet for you. All the V7 watches are constructed to a water-resistance of 10 ATM and are fitted with a scratch proof sapphire crystal.
WS-BT-IC
MSRP 995
Indiegogo perk $675

 

The YES V7 black IP on a bracelet.

Black IP titanium case in satin or polished finish, with your choice of bezel and a 3-link or 5-link bracelet plus a soft strap. Once you have placed this pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your choices.  The black finish combined with the orange 2400 bezel and the satin rose-gold hand will sparkle like a ray of light. All the V7 comes with a Two Year Warranty
WB-BT-IC
MSRP $1045
Indiegogo perk $ 695

 

The Big Pack, get one of each, awesome deal.

The perfect way to stack up gifts for watch buddies, loved ones and incentives alike. One of each, four ways to make a unique expression in time.  Once you have placed the pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your choices.  The YES WorldWatch V7 is preprogrammed to 650 cities worldwide, automatically adjusts for DST and has a range of alarms. If you wear a watch for time keeping, this is the one.
W4-BP-IC
MSRP $3680
Indiegogo Perk $2195

 

All of the V7 wireless have the exact same time data as listed in the link below, except it has the wireless charging and the addition of a minute marker in the outer yellow dial, which is available with a 60-minute bezel design:
https://www.yeswatch.com/wrist-watch/worldwatch/worldwatchV7-specifications.html

 

A custom made charging bed, which will be made black in production, allows the watch to be charged with bracelet and straps attached to the watch. The battery icon in watch read charging level. On a full night of charging you’ll get about 3 months of battery life.

Many of us wear our YES watches with the digits turned off. To make the reading of time more accurate in this mode, we added the option to set the outer yellow dial to show 60 minutes. Combined with a 60 minutes bezel, it will give an accurate hour and minute read without turning on the digits.

The back plate will have a golden crystal that covers the interior charging coil. This solution will allow for a very speedy charging process and it will look much cooler than it does in this rendering

For our story and more technical data, check out this link :
https://www.yeswatch.com/wrist-watch/worldwatch/our-story.html

 

The YES watch  is a 24-hour clock that through an ingenious screen reflects the actual times of sunrise, sunset, zenith, twilight, moonrise, moonset and moon phase along with the passing of hours, minutes and seconds. The  trim tab feature makes the quartz movement run to an accuracy of plus/minus 0.5 seconds a month.

 

Geoff is a seasoned watch enthusiast, world traveler and a captain piloting B787’s for Air Canada. He has been testing one of the four V7 prototypes in existence for a month. He sent me a picture from the flight deck, and posted a review on WatchUSeek. Click on this link to see what he had to say:  Geoff's WatchUSeek Review

 

    The tritium tubes combined with the electroluminescent back light makes for a crisp nighttime read of the watch face.

People  from all walks of life have found their YES watch to offer practical applications and insights for time management not found in your ordinary watch. It will predict time ahead for travelers, astronomers, photographers, military personnel, astronauts, pilots, hunters, outdoorsmen and Harley riders alike so they can  plan their actions without a worry. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The following are the specifications for the YES WorldWatch V7.

  • Preprogrammed for 650 cities worldwide through year 2099. 
  • Location can also be set by LAT/LON and it has 10 cities always kept in memory. 
  • Digital time, LCD display and hand automatically adjusts for Daylight Saving Time and Time Zone.
  • Times for sunrise, zenith, sunset, twilight (all 3 levels) and true midnight.
  • Sunrise and sunset alarm with 0-99 minutes pre-alarm.
  • Equinox, solstice and cross quarter day alerts with event times.
  • Times for moonrise, moonset, moon phase, % illumination plus exact time and date for the next new and full moons.
  • LCD ARC day/night display with twilight.
  • HRS:MIN:SEC in AM/PM or 2400 format. 
  • Month, date, day, year and DOY.
  • Regular set alarm with 10 minute snooze, 99 minute timer, top of the hour alarm with user choice of active range and 999 day countdown/up.
  • 24 hour stop with with lap time and memory measured in 1/100 of a second.
  • Electronic compass with NSEW direction and degree readout.
  • 7 languages: English, Spanish, German, French, Norwegian, Italian and Portuguese.
  • Wireless rechargeable battery system. 3  months plus of operation on one full night of charging with expected battery life of 5 years plus. The battery can be replaced.
  • Crisp night time viewing provided by 24+1 tritium tubes on dial+hand coupled with the electroluminescent back light. This applies to the USA market. For the EU market the V7 will be fitted with an inner 24-hour dial with LUME.
  • Unique software time trim allows for adjusting the watch  to a +/-0.5 second monthly accuracy.
  • Ronda Swiss Made servo driven 24-hour analog hand.
  • 46x16mm case, 22 mm lug nut width, adjustable locking clasp on titanium bracelets.
  • Titanium case construction with scratch proof sapphire crystal to 10 ATM water resistance.
  • Your choice of bezel design, color, finish, bracelet and soft straps.
  • Comes in a sturdy box made for worldwide shipping. Instruction Manual and jewelers tools included.
  • Two Year Warranty.
 

 Across the planet there are upwards of 20 different Daylight Saving Time systems. The WorldWatch incorporates all of them in the programming for the relevant cities and automatically adjusts for them. If need be, DST can also be turned ON and OFF manually. Check out this video to see what happens at the time of DST change.

 

In video clip below you can see how the WorldWatch switches time between your HOME and AWAY city.

 

This clip shows you how to set the WorldWatch to one of the 7 languages.

 

This video shows you how to set the outer yellow LCD ring to show times for either MOONRISE/MOONSET or SUNRISE/SUNSET for the alternate city.

 

This video shows you how to engage the compass. 

 

In today’s world of over connecting the WorldWatch offers a fresh perspective on being completely independent. It doesn’t need a signal, it doesn’t need a phone, cannot be tracked and doesn’t need to be charged every day. It focuses solely on your time, like a personal time keeper that travels incognito.

 

 

 

Building a business.

In business since 1999, we set out to build a unique time piece that would connect the natural  cycles of the sun and the moon with the constant ticking of hours, minutes and seconds. You may ask why would we want to do that? Connecting the dots surely proved much more complex and intriguing than imagined, but the simple reason is that it helps to manage time with greater accuracy and timing in order to get the most out of it. Whether you are a slow going seeker or an extreme sports enthusiast it would be naive to think that the day and night, the sun and moon, has nothing to do with the experience. 

Check out this interview. It is from a long time ago, but it  does cover some of the highlights on how we got started:   An Interview with the Founder! 

 

 

 

Your choice of bezel and soft strap.

Once you have placed your pre-order we will contact you to confirm your choice of bezel and soft strap. You can put together any combination you want.

 

 

 

Our Hong Kong, Japanese, Chinese, Thai and Swiss manufacturing partners.

I came at the watch business as a total rookie, with an idea only, just wanted a watch that could tell me times for sunrise.  Couldn't be that hard, right? 20 years later I feel like a graduate whose wings have been carefully clipped. We couldn't have done it without the  caring involvement and expertise of our manufacturing partners. The WorldWatch V7 is the best timepiece we have ever put together. 

ALPHASOFT 

Ms. Yang with her team has  been our programmer, and our rock, in Hong Kong since we got started in 1999. Their programming expertise,  commitment and relentless attention to detail have been crucial in bringing us to where we are today

RONDA

Chris and Kinson with Ronda out of Aberdeen, HK, has been our analog hand movement supplier since day one. Started in Switzerland in 1946 Ronda now has offices worldwide. Our movements are assembled in Thailand.  www.ronda.com 

KEYTIME

Nathan with Keytime is our main agent in Hong Kong. With great care he and his team make sure it all comes together.  They specialize in assembling watches with tritium tubes, as well as providing keystone services regarding case and bracelet manufacture.  www.keytimewatch.com 

YEEBO 

Since our beginning Wallace with Yeebo has steadfastly stood by us in creating what I think must be the most complex LCD watch screen ever made. There is a total of 1430 separate segments in the V7 ARC LCD. Simply amazing. Yeebo has been a top quality provider of LCD technology since 1988.  www.yeebo.com.hk 

 

Over the years we have gotten the kindest reviews, promotions and watch sales from all over the world. The logos below represent many of those who helped us, we are most grateful to you all. As we are to all our dear customers who have shown us loyalty and support. Thank you!​

 

Peterson, a dear friend, a bon vivant, angel investor, pilot, farmer and a loving dad sent me this video. He was one of the earliest adopters of the classic WorldWatch, almost 20 years ago. It made a most beautiful cameo in this video. California Flight

 

Karl is a true early adaptor, but not one of those who talks about it. So I will do it for him. He was the 4th to contribute to our EQ campaign and he bought the first WorldWatch V7 prototype off my hands just a couple of weeks ago. It arrived in Germany a few days ago and this is what he had to say:

          Hey Björn,

My World Watch has arrived.

I am really so impressed... the blue hand and silver case, the colors of the display- definitely the most beautiful watch you have ever made! Also love the ratcheted bezel ring, moveable in 12-minute steps. Of course I noticed that the serial number on the back plate is actually ONE. How cool is that? I feel very honored! 

The WW is really such a big step forward, though it is essentially the EQ combined with advantages of the older versions. The solar and lunar rings, also the moon not visibly divided into segments- looks better, day/night division of the whole watch face. There are so many little things: the light stays on just a little bit longer, the alarm sound seems just a little bit louder, the buttons will not be activated involuntarily and most importantly: the hand is now thinner and the digits bigger, so the hand will no more interfere with readability. 13:00? 13:06? 13:08?

I would say this watch is really your masterpiece. Finally I found the watch I had dreamed of... and it did NOT cost 20,000 as expected. Thank you so much!

          Karl, Doctor of Medicine.

If you read German, here  is the link: Karls forum posting

 

In 2008 Stephen Fricke, Atlantis Shuttle Commander, wore his INCA to the ISS. On the other wrist he wore his wife's TATI. That must be what you call cosmic love. Cheers!
 

The WristWatchReview is the web’s oldest watch blog. It is run by John Biggs, Victor Marks and Patrick Kansa. Click on this link  to see what Patrick had to say about our cosmic perspective on time. 

 

From 2005, an Instagram moment from before Instagram.
story_txt:
INDEPENDENT WATCH MAKER SINCE 1999
 

 

 

 
Introducing the new YES WorldWatch V7 with wireless induction charging.
After a lengthy process of development and testing the wireless charging system has proven flawless. Getting it manufactured is proving to be a financial challenge. 
To put watches into production we need to raise an additional $10,000 plus quickly, and to that end we are re-opening our existing Indiegogo crowd funding campaign offering 5 unique perks at great pricing. 
Just remember, this current fund raising tally started at $147,085. We’ll reach this new and expanded goal when hopefully we get to $157,085.
 

The YES V7 silver tone on a soft strap.
Titanium case fitted with your choice of bezel and soft strap, satin or shiny finish. Once you have placed the pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your choices. Like custom making your favorite time piece. The picture above shows the shiny finish with a sky blue AM/PM bezel and the sky blue and white striped NATO. The quartz movement variance will have been established by a special reader at the factory, which will enable us to send it to you set at a +/- 0.5 seconds a month accuracy.WS-SS-ICMSRP $795Indiegogo perk $495
 

The black YES V7 on a soft strap. 
Black IP titanium case fitted with your choices of bezel and soft strap, satin or polished finish. Once you have placed the pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your specifications. Shown here with the yellow metallic solunar bezel and silicon strap with yellow stitching. The custom made wireless charging in the V7 will run for about 3 months on a full night of charging.WB-SS-ICMSRP $845Indiegogo Perk $545
 

The YES V7 silver tone on a bracelet. 
Titanium case in satin or polished finish, with your choice of bezel and a 3-link or 5-link bracelet plus a soft strap. Shown here with the sky blue symbol bezel. Once you have placed this pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your choices. Include your wrist circumference and we’ll adjust the bracelet for you. All the V7 watches are constructed to a water-resistance of 10 ATM and are fitted with a scratch proof sapphire crystal.WS-BT-ICMSRP 995Indiegogo perk $675
 

The YES V7 black IP on a bracelet. 
Black IP titanium case in satin or polished finish, with your choice of bezel and a 3-link or 5-link bracelet plus a soft strap. Once you have placed this pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your choices.  The black finish combined with the orange 2400 bezel and the satin rose-gold hand will sparkle like a ray of light. All the V7 comes with a Two Year WarrantyWB-BT-ICMSRP $1045Indiegogo perk $ 695
 

The Big Pack, get one of each, awesome deal.
The perfect way to stack up gifts for watch buddies, loved ones and incentives alike. One of each, four ways to make a unique expression in time.  Once you have placed the pre-order we’ll send you a form to fill in your choices.  The YES WorldWatch V7 is preprogrammed to 650 cities worldwide, automatically adjusts for DST and has a range of alarms. If you wear a watch for time keeping, this is the one.W4-BP-ICMSRP $3680Indiegogo Perk $2195
 
All of the V7 wireless have the exact same time data as listed in the link below, except it has the wireless charging and the addition of a minute marker in the outer yellow dial, which is available with a 60-minute bezel design:https://www.yeswatch.com/wrist-watch/worldwatch/worldwatchV7-specifications.html
 

A custom made charging bed, which will be made black in production, allows the watch to be charged with bracelet and straps attached to the watch. The battery icon in watch read charging level. On a full night of charging you’ll get about 3 months of battery life.

Many of us wear our YES watches with the digits turned off. To make the reading of time more accurate in this mode, we added the option to set the outer yellow dial to show 60 minutes. Combined with a 60 minutes bezel, it will give an accurate hour and minute read without turning on the digits.

The back plate will have a golden crystal that covers the interior charging coil. This solution will allow for a very speedy charging process and it will look much cooler than it does in this rendering
For our story and more technical data, check out this link :https://www.yeswatch.com/wrist-watch/worldwatch/our-story.html
 

The YES watch  is a 24-hour clock that through an ingenious screen reflects the actual times of sunrise, sunset, zenith, twilight, moonrise, moonset and moon phase along with the passing of hours, minutes and seconds. The  trim tab feature makes the quartz movement run to an accuracy of plus/minus 0.5 seconds a month.
 

Geoff is a seasoned watch enthusiast, world traveler and a captain piloting B787’s for Air Canada. He has been testing one of the four V7 prototypes in existence for a month. He sent me a picture from the flight deck, and posted a review on WatchUSeek. Click on this link to see what he had to say:  Geoff's WatchUSeek Review
 

    The tritium tubes combined with the electroluminescent back light makes for a crisp nighttime read of the watch face.
People  from all walks of life have found their YES watch to offer practical applications and insights for time management not found in your ordinary watch. It will predict time ahead for travelers, astronomers, photographers, military personnel, astronauts, pilots, hunters, outdoorsmen and Harley riders alike so they can  plan their actions without a worry. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
The following are the specifications for the YES WorldWatch V7.

Preprogrammed for 650 cities worldwide through year 2099. 
Location can also be set by LAT/LON and it has 10 cities always kept in memory. 
Digital time, LCD display and hand automatically adjusts for Daylight Saving Time and Time Zone.
Times for sunrise, zenith, sunset, twilight (all 3 levels) and true midnight.
Sunrise and sunset alarm with 0-99 minutes pre-alarm.
Equinox, solstice and cross quarter day alerts with event times.
Times for moonrise, moonset, moon phase, % illumination plus exact time and date for the next new and full moons.
LCD ARC day/night display with twilight.
HRS:MIN:SEC in AM/PM or 2400 format. 
Month, date, day, year and DOY.
Regular set alarm with 10 minute snooze, 99 minute timer, top of the hour alarm with user choice of active range and 999 day countdown/up.
24 hour stop with with lap time and memory measured in 1/100 of a second.
Electronic compass with NSEW direction and degree readout.
7 languages: English, Spanish, German, French, Norwegian, Italian and Portuguese.
Wireless rechargeable battery system. 3  months plus of operation on one full night of charging with expected battery life of 5 years plus. The battery can be replaced.
Crisp night time viewing provided by 24+1 tritium tubes on dial+hand coupled with the electroluminescent back light. This applies to the USA market. For the EU market the V7 will be fitted with an inner 24-hour dial with LUME.
Unique software time trim allows for adjusting the watch  to a +/-0.5 second monthly accuracy.
Ronda Swiss Made servo driven 24-hour analog hand.
46x16mm case, 22 mm lug nut width, adjustable locking clasp on titanium bracelets.
Titanium case construction with scratch proof sapphire crystal to 10 ATM water resistance.
Your choice of bezel design, color, finish, bracelet and soft straps.
Comes in a sturdy box made for worldwide shipping. Instruction Manual and jewelers tools included.
Two Year Warranty.
  Across the planet there are upwards of 20 different Daylight Saving Time systems. The WorldWatch incorporates all of them in the programming for the relevant cities and automatically adjusts for them. If need be, DST can also be turned ON and OFF manually. Check out this video to see what happens at the time of DST change.

 
In video clip below you can see how the WorldWatch switches time between your HOME and AWAY city.

 
This clip shows you how to set the WorldWatch to one of the 7 languages.

 
This video shows you how to set the outer yellow LCD ring to show times for either MOONRISE/MOONSET or SUNRISE/SUNSET for the alternate city.

 
This video shows you how to engage the compass. 

 
In today’s world of over connecting the WorldWatch offers a fresh perspective on being completely independent. It doesn’t need a signal, it doesn’t need a phone, cannot be tracked and doesn’t need to be charged every day. It focuses solely on your time, like a personal time keeper that travels incognito.
 

 

 
Building a business.
In business since 1999, we set out to build a unique time piece that would connect the natural  cycles of the sun and the moon with the constant ticking of hours, minutes and seconds. You may ask why would we want to do that? Connecting the dots surely proved much more complex and intriguing than imagined, but the simple reason is that it helps to manage time with greater accuracy and timing in order to get the most out of it. Whether you are a slow going seeker or an extreme sports enthusiast it would be naive to think that the day and night, the sun and moon, has nothing to do with the experience. 
Check out this interview. It is from a long time ago, but it  does cover some of the highlights on how we got started:   An Interview with the Founder! 
 

 
 
Your choice of bezel and soft strap.
Once you have placed your pre-order we will contact you to confirm your choice of bezel and soft strap. You can put together any combination you want.

 

 

 
Our Hong Kong, Japanese, Chinese, Thai and Swiss manufacturing partners.
I came at the watch business as a total rookie, with an idea only, just wanted a watch that could tell me times for sunrise.  Couldn't be that hard, right? 20 years later I feel like a graduate whose wings have been carefully clipped. We couldn't have done it without the  caring involvement and expertise of our manufacturing partners. The WorldWatch V7 is the best timepiece we have ever put together. 
ALPHASOFT 
Ms. Yang with her team has  been our programmer, and our rock, in Hong Kong since we got started in 1999. Their programming expertise,  commitment and relentless attention to detail have been crucial in bringing us to where we are today
RONDA
Chris and Kinson with Ronda out of Aberdeen, HK, has been our analog hand movement supplier since day one. Started in Switzerland in 1946 Ronda now has offices worldwide. Our movements are assembled in Thailand.  www.ronda.com 
KEYTIME
Nathan with Keytime is our main agent in Hong Kong. With great care he and his team make sure it all comes together.  They specialize in assembling watches with tritium tubes, as well as providing keystone services regarding case and bracelet manufacture.  www.keytimewatch.com 
YEEBO 
Since our beginning Wallace with Yeebo has steadfastly stood by us in creating what I think must be the most complex LCD watch screen ever made. There is a total of 1430 separate segments in the V7 ARC LCD. Simply amazing. Yeebo has been a top quality provider of LCD technology since 1988.  www.yeebo.com.hk 
 
Over the years we have gotten the kindest reviews, promotions and watch sales from all over the world. The logos below represent many of those who helped us, we are most grateful to you all. As we are to all our dear customers who have shown us loyalty and support. Thank you!​

 
Peterson, a dear friend, a bon vivant, angel investor, pilot, farmer and a loving dad sent me this video. He was one of the earliest adopters of the classic WorldWatch, almost 20 years ago. It made a most beautiful cameo in this video. California Flight

 
Karl is a true early adaptor, but not one of those who talks about it. So I will do it for him. He was the 4th to contribute to our EQ campaign and he bought the first WorldWatch V7 prototype off my hands just a couple of weeks ago. It arrived in Germany a few days ago and this is what he had to say:
          Hey Björn,
My World Watch has arrived.
I am really so impressed... the blue hand and silver case, the colors of the display- definitely the most beautiful watch you have ever made! Also love the ratcheted bezel ring, moveable in 12-minute steps. Of course I noticed that the serial number on the back plate is actually ONE. How cool is that? I feel very honored! 
The WW is really such a big step forward, though it is essentially the EQ combined with advantages of the older versions. The solar and lunar rings, also the moon not visibly divided into segments- looks better, day/night division of the whole watch face. There are so many little things: the light stays on just a little bit longer, the alarm sound seems just a little bit louder, the buttons will not be activated involuntarily and most importantly: the hand is now thinner and the digits bigger, so the hand will no more interfere with readability. 13:00? 13:06? 13:08?
I would say this watch is really your masterpiece. Finally I found the watch I had dreamed of... and it did NOT cost 20,000 as expected. Thank you so much!
          Karl, Doctor of Medicine.
If you read German, here  is the link: Karls forum posting
 

In 2008 Stephen Fricke, Atlantis Shuttle Commander, wore his INCA to the ISS. On the other wrist he wore his wife's TATI. That must be what you call cosmic love. Cheers! 
The WristWatchReview is the web’s oldest watch blog. It is run by John Biggs, Victor Marks and Patrick Kansa. Click on this link  to see what Patrick had to say about our cosmic perspective on time.  From 2005, an Instagram moment from before Instagram.

story:
Tenuis3 Leather TL​, an advanced version of Tenuis3, which raised 24 million Japanese yen in  crowdfunding is here. While maintaining the popular "¼-Inch (6mm) thinness", the appearance has evolved with a leather material suitable for a wide range of situations. The innovative "Hidden Pocket 2.0" has been added for higher storage capacity. It is ½-Inch(12mm) thick while it can hold 8 cards, 10 bills, and 18 coins.

We are on an affiliate program!
https://tenuis3-leather-tl-the-thin.kickbooster...
 

Tenuis3 Leather TL on Campfire crowdfunding in Japan.
Raised more than US$200,000 from 2400 backers.
https://camp-fire.jp/projects/view/413255
 

Tenuis3 (Canvas version) on Campfire crowdfunding in Japan.
Raised more than US$400,000 from 4600 backers.
https://camp-fire.jp/projects/view/185652

 

Thinness that doesn't change even if you put things in

Tenuis3 Leather TL is a thin wallet that is only ¼-Inch (6mm) thin. However, it's not just a thin wallet, it's a wallet that can be filled with cards and coins and still remain thin.

In recent years, we have seen a lot of wallets with thin designs. However, a common problem with these thin wallets is that the wallet itself is thin, but when you actually put bills, coins, and cards in it, it becomes thick. Needless to say, the thinness of the wallet itself is important, but we think it is equally important to be able to keep it thin even when carrying things.

Tenuis3 Leather TL we are introducing here is not only thin in material, but also incorporates a number of innovations that allow the wallet to remain thin in actual use.

 

 Industry's thinnest class, 0.03-Inch (0.8mm) surface leather

In producing an extremely thin wallet, it is important to use thin materials.

The surface leather of Tenuis3 Leather TL is Toscano Liscio, a cowhide leather produced by the Italian company Conceria 800. Through the process of straining (shaving thick leather into thin layers), we have achieved a thickness of 0.03-Inch (0.8mm), which is just enough to maintain strength. It is one of the thinnest leather materials in the industry.

We pursued not only thinness but also attractiveness as a leather material. The leather is processed using the traditional Italian vachetta oil method. The process of vegetable tanning takes time to soak into the leather, resulting in a very soft and supple leather material. This vachetta leather is soaked with plenty of oil, so you can enjoy the color and luster deepening with aging.

The inside of Tenuis3 Leather TL is made of 0.019-Inch (0.5mm) goat leather. Goat leather is an unfamiliar material in Japan, but it is a leather material that is lightweight, durable, thin, and stretchable. It is also known for its fine and beautiful wrinkles called "grain patterns".

 

The industry's first "twin card pocket" that thoroughly eliminates waste

The card slots of Tenuis3 Leather TL are designed as "twin card pockets" for easy access and storage. The card pockets are arranged parallel to each other to distribute the thickness, making it easy to see and insert and remove cards. The size of the two card pockets is almost the same as that of the entire wallet, leaving no wasted space.

The recommended storage capacity is four cards in each pocket, for a total of eight cards, which is sufficient for daily use. Since it is made of leather, it may feel tight at first to put about three cards in, but after a week or so, the elastic leather will become accustomed to it and you will be able to store them smoothly.

Also, the twin card pockets are capable of keeping the overall thickness of the wallet even, so it won't get bumpy even if you have a lot of cards in it. This feature allows the wallet to maintain its smart appearance even after several years of use.

 

A divider to eliminate uneven coin distribution

Even if your wallet is thin, the coin pocket will bulge out as you use it. The coin pocket of Tenuis3 Leather TL is equipped with "a divider". Even if you carry coins in it, they are less likely to be unevenly distributed in one place and the thickness is distributed. 

The zipper is a "thin zipper" with few bumps. Not only is it thin but easy to use.

 

Advanced "Hidden Pocket 2.0" for additional storage of cards and keys

Since the release of our previous model, Tenuis3, we have been extremely grateful for feedback from our users. Among them, was a great demand for carrying more cards and valuables other than money. That’s why we greatly enhanced the functionality of the pockets inside the wallet, which were introduced as "hidden pockets" in the previous product. 

This time, a new pocket for card storage has been added, for a total of two pockets that can hold two cards. This means that together with the aforementioned number of twin card pockets (8 cards), a total of 10 cards can be stored. In addition, this advanced "hidden pocket" has four key pockets that can hold most common types of keys, allowing you to keep a spare key in your wallet in case of emergency.

 

Available in 9 colors

The bottom of each picture shows the approximate color change after about 6 months to a year of use.

※The actual color and dying condition of the leather may change depending on a production lot.

Jet Black

Dark Green

Indigo Blue

Bright Green

Vermilion Red

Golden Yellow

Smog Brown

Rusty Brown

Olive Brown

 

New colors added on May 27th, 2021!

Three brownish colors, which are standard for leather products, have been added. 

From left to right: Smog Brown, Olive Brown, Rusty Brown

Smog Brown is a brownish color, but it is close to gray or black, and depending on the brightness and environment, it may not look brownish leaving a hint of coolness.

Olive Brown is an olive-type color, but it is more yellow than green, and a calming color that is closer to brown, which may catch people's attention.

Rusty Brown is a standard brown color, not too dark, not too light, but in the middle, which is probably the easiest color to imagine the leather changing over time.

 

Specifications of Tenuis3 Leather TL

Material:

Cowhide leather, goat leather, polypropylene sheet (PP), rigid vinyl chloride sheet (PVC), thin zipper for wallets

Manufacturing:

Cowhide leather: Tanned, traditional Italian vachetta oil process

Goat leather: chrome tanned

Dimensions:

Width 3.5-Inch (90mm) x Length 4.3-Inch (110mm) x Thickness 1/4-Inch(6mm) (when not stored)　

Weight:

Approx. 50g (1.76oz)

Storage (recommended capacity):

8 cards + 2 cards (8 twin card pockets, one in each hidden pocket), up to 10 bills, 15 coins, up to 4 keys, small items, etc.

Approx. 0.47-Inch (12mm) thick when holding 8 cards + 10 bills + 18 coins

Tenuis3 Leather TL is a thin wallet, but it does not strictly limit the amount of contents. It is possible to put more than the recommended amount in each section. It also has two hidden pockets to keep your change and bills. In addition, there are two hidden pockets. You can store one or two cards each, up to four keys, business cards, receipts, and other small items.

It's a capacity design that can meet your needs in any situation.
 

Front view: for right-handed use

Front view: for left-handed 

Front view: lower layer, the design is same for both right and left hand model.

About the price of Tenuis3 Leather TL

Tenuis3 Leather TL is available at a discounted price during the crowdfunding campaign. After the campaign is over, we are planning to sell it for $118, which is lower than the average price of similar products from other manufacturers. 

The reason for this is that we do most of the operations in the development stage, such as prototyping and sample making, directly with overseas factories without any intermediaries, and do not go through unnecessary intermediaries when we sell our products to the public after the crowdfunding campaign is over. Basically, we take a direct business-to-consumer approach. This is how the lower costs are realized.

In addition, we procure all materials directly from the manufacturers in each country. This also prevents unnecessary middlemen from raising costs and prices.

Because SOLAHANPU began with the concept of a travel enthusiast, we have the advantage of being able to work as a team using our experiences and languages learned from around the world.

In addition to product design, we also aim to keep prices and profits minimal. Not only do we aim for minimalism in terms of price and profit., we will continue to make products that are sustainable.

 

Tenuis3 Leather TL has been featured. (In order of publication date). 

-Mikasu-channel / youtube

-Koji Kawai / youtube

-Men's wallet review channel / Youtube

 

 

Return for Tenuis3 Leather TL

1. Super early bird discount: $69 (about 25% off) limited to 30 people

2. Early bird discount: $79 (about 15% off) limited to 30 people

3. Mini early bird discount: $84 (about 10% off) limited to 50 people

4. INDIEGOGO price: $89 (approx. 5% off), no limit

5. Double discount: $169 (approx. 15% off), no limit

*Shipping cost is $12 for all countries.
*The discount percentages are applied to a whole price including 
the shipping cost $12 comparing with Scheduled retail price: $107.

 

Scheduled retail price: $107

*Please note that the detailed structure and design may be subject to change.

*The color on the page may look different from the actual color.

*Please note that we do not accept backers living in Japan.
We are planning to launch a campaign in Japan soon, so please apply from there!

 

About the team 

SOLA is a Japanese design studio that designs and produces bags, wallets, accessories, and other items. Our products are created using superior quality canvas that is coated with a special paraffin wax that creates a leather-like texture.

The concept of Minimalism has been a great influence on our work, and we specialize in extremely minimalistic items. We believe in pragmatic and beautiful products, and our aim is to design and create goods that feature a practical shape and structure. We hope to share our vision with like-minded people.

Tenuis3 Leather TL on Campfire crowdfunding in Japan.
Raised more than US$200,000 from 2400 backers.

 

Tenuis3 (Canvas version) on Campfire crowdfunding in Japan.
Raised more than US$400,000 from 4600 backers.

 

We are on an affiliate program!
https://tenuis3-leather-tl-the-thin.kickbooster...

 

Thank you very much!

In addition, this advanced "hidden pocket" has four key pockets that can hold most common types of keys, allowing you to keep a spare key in your wallet in case of emergency. Available in 9 colorsThe bottom of each picture shows the approximate color change after about 6 months to a year of use.※The actual color and dying condition of the leather may change depending on a production lot.Jet BlackDark GreenIndigo BlueBright GreenVermilion RedGolden YellowSmog BrownRusty BrownOlive Brown New colors added on May 27th, 2021!Three brownish colors, which are standard for leather products, have been added. From left to right: Smog Brown, Olive Brown, Rusty BrownSmog Brown is a brownish color, but it is close to gray or black, and depending on the brightness and environment, it may not look brownish leaving a hint of coolness.Olive Brown is an olive-type color, but it is more yellow than green, and a calming color that is closer to brown, which may catch people's attention.Rusty Brown is a standard brown color, not too dark, not too light, but in the middle, which is probably the easiest color to imagine the leather changing over time. Specifications of Tenuis3 Leather TLMaterial:Cowhide leather, goat leather, polypropylene sheet (PP), rigid vinyl chloride sheet (PVC), thin zipper for walletsManufacturing:Cowhide leather: Tanned, traditional Italian vachetta oil processGoat leather: chrome tannedDimensions:Width 3.5-Inch (90mm) x Length 4.3-Inch (110mm) x Thickness 1/4-Inch(6mm) (when not stored)　Weight:Approx. 50g (1.76oz)Storage (recommended capacity):8 cards + 2 cards (8 twin card pockets, one in each hidden pocket), up to 10 bills, 15 coins, up to 4 keys, small items, etc.Approx. 0.47-Inch (12mm) thick when holding 8 cards + 10 bills + 18 coinsTenuis3 Leather TL is a thin wallet, but it does not strictly limit the amount of contents. It is possible to put more than the recommended amount in each section. It also has two hidden pockets to keep your change and bills. In addition, there are two hidden pockets. You can store one or two cards each, up to four keys, business cards, receipts, and other small items.It's a capacity design that can meet your needs in any situation. Front view: for right-handed useFront view: for left-handed Front view: lower layer, the design is same for both right and left hand model.About the price of Tenuis3 Leather TLTenuis3 Leather TL is available at a discounted price during the crowdfunding campaign. After the campaign is over, we are planning to sell it for $118, which is lower than the average price of similar products from other manufacturers. The reason for this is that we do most of the operations in the development stage, such as prototyping and sample making, directly with overseas factories without any intermediaries, and do not go through unnecessary intermediaries when we sell our products to the public after the crowdfunding campaign is over. Basically, we take a direct business-to-consumer approach. This is how the lower costs are realized.In addition, we procure all materials directly from the manufacturers in each country. This also prevents unnecessary middlemen from raising costs and prices.Because SOLAHANPU began with the concept of a travel enthusiast, we have the advantage of being able to work as a team using our experiences and languages learned from around the world.In addition to product design, we also aim to keep prices and profits minimal. Not only do we aim for minimalism in terms of price and profit., we will continue to make products that are sustainable. Tenuis3 Leather TL has been featured. (In order of publication date). -Mikasu-channel / youtube-Koji Kawai / youtube-Men's wallet review channel / Youtube
 
 Return for Tenuis3 Leather TL1. Super early bird discount: $69 (about 25% off) limited to 30 people2. Early bird discount: $79 (about 15% off) limited to 30 people3. Mini early bird discount: $84 (about 10% off) limited to 50 people4. INDIEGOGO price: $89 (approx. 5% off), no limit5. Double discount: $169 (approx. 15% off), no limit*Shipping cost is $12 for all countries.*The discount percentages are applied to a whole price including the shipping cost $12 comparing with Scheduled retail price: $107. Scheduled retail price: $107*Please note that the detailed structure and design may be subject to change.*The color on the page may look different from the actual color.*Please note that we do not accept backers living in Japan.We are planning to launch a campaign in Japan soon, so please apply from there! About the team SOLA is a Japanese design studio that designs and produces bags, wallets, accessories, and other items. Our products are created using superior quality canvas that is coated with a special paraffin wax that creates a leather-like texture.The concept of Minimalism has been a great influence on our work, and we specialize in extremely minimalistic items. We believe in pragmatic and beautiful products, and our aim is to design and create goods that feature a practical shape and structure. We hope to share our vision with like-minded people.Tenuis3 Leather TL on Campfire crowdfunding in Japan.Raised more than US$200,000 from 2400 backers. Tenuis3 (Canvas version) on Campfire crowdfunding in Japan.Raised more than US$400,000 from 4600 backers. We are on an affiliate program!https://tenuis3-leather-tl-the-thin.kickbooster... Thank you very much!

story:
It’s time for a new standard in smartwatches. With its extra-wide curved display, the Amazfit X fits more of the important stuff on your wrist, without all the scrolling to find it. It applies the continuous heart rate monitoring system to help reach your fitness goals and monitor your health effectively, wherever your day takes you. And with a lithium battery that can run for 7 days on a single charge, the Amazfit X has the power to get you through your whole week worry-free. Even when you’re living around-the-clock.

Move more. Stressless. Monitor your health. And go all week on a single charge. The Amazfit X has all the right curves to keep you comfortable, and all the right data to keep you motivated. All on a large color-rich display.

The new standard in smartwatches has arrived.

 

 

Intricate in its design, Amazfit X exemplifies the clarity with a 326 PPI HD resolution and enhances its expression through a 400 NIT high-brightness display. Enjoy sharp and bright display even under direct light with Amazfit X.

The Amazfit X is all curves, so it fits your wrist whether you’re shaking hands in the boardroom or crushing goals in the gym. It’s designed with a 92° curvature that helps the Amazfit X rest comfortably on your wrist. Falling asleep wearing the Amazfit X is no problem — with all these curves, it’s designed with “Do Not Disturb” in mind.

How do we get that perfect curve?

The Amazfit X was made with a level of precision you’d expect from a finely crafted watch. First, our engineers heat the glass cover to over 700°C. Then they use a 6-step bending process until the Amazfit X reaches a 92° super arc that wraps comfortably around your wrist. Even the 7-day lithium battery is curved for your comfort.

How many brands are willing to go this far for your comfort?

 

Your time is valuable, so why waste it scrolling through endless menus? The Amazfit X shows you more of what you need in a single glance, as it surpasses a 6% display area of the smartwatch industry leader. 

With a color-rich 2.07” curved display, the Amazfit X fits more on your wrist than most smartwatches. That means more room for apps to track your health and organize your day. And less time spent scrolling to find what you need.

 

Additionally, a titanium alloy uni-body makes the watch extremely lightweight and the design super sleek.

 

Your phone is button-free, so why not your watch? More of our devices are ditching bulky buttons for a more integrated approach. The Amazfit X features a minimalistic design that does away with buttons and crowns that can dig on your wrist. Instead, this watch stays sleek with a pressure-sensitive sensor that helps you access everything with a press of your finger.

 

So much more battery life. And so much less to worry about.

With the Amazfit X, our engineers wanted to deliver a full 7-day battery life without sacrificing features like professional level heart rate monitoring, round the clock text and call notifications, and tracking for your weekly workouts.

The challenge? It takes a lot to power a watch this smart and packed with features.

So our engineers actually came up with the idea of curving the high-powered lithium battery. It allows them to fit more battery power into the Amazfit X, all while maintaining its futuristic curved design. No fuzz, at your convenience. Charging has never been easier with an utterly effortless experience.

Heading out of town? Leave your charger and your worries at home. Amazfit X gives you plenty more run-time than other smartwatches. So it will keep going while you’re out conquering the business world. Or off conquering the beach.

All-day. Everyday. 7 days a week.

We gave you the best smartwatch battery performance we could. Because… well, why wouldn’t we?

 

 

Amazfit X always has your heart in mind. It monitors your heart rate 24 hours a day, continuously and uninterruptedly, for a more comprehensive fitness data on a glance.

The result: the Amazfit X is setting a new standard for heart rate monitoring in smartwatches. 

Amazfit X keeps an eye on your cardiovascular health and your fitness with a bigger sensor. Effectively. Remotely. Even when you’re pushing for that extra mile.

 

Find your way around all life’s corners. With the Amazfit X, you’ve got two of the world’s top Geo-tracking systems on your side: GPS and GLONASS.

That means if one system has trouble finding you, the other one will jump in to help. So you can have peace of mind even when you travel abroad, knowing you’ve got both satellite systems lighting your way.

Sticking closer to home? Track your running course, speed, and distance in real-time with spot-on accuracy. And no more chasing your location as it drunkenly floats across the screen when the signal gets weak.

The Amazfit X will give you pinpoint accuracy even on your most unfamiliar routes. So you can run further than ever. With Confidence.

 

Get the most out of every workout. Whether you’re open water swimming or cycling in the gym, the Amazfit X will track your progress and help you reach your fitness goals. With 9 versatile sports modes, it offers customizable tracking and coaching for every activity. It’s the coach on your wrist giving you the stats and the motivation you need to level up.

 

Take your Amazfit X in the pool without worry. Or play at the beach till sunset without losing track of the time. With water resistance up to 50 meters, this watch will help push you through your laps and improve your personal best time.

*Remember to remove the Amazfit X before you hit the shower or a trip to the sauna, since all that steam can affect the seal and make it less water-resistant next time.

 

 

A 100-point scoring system to make healthier living simple and fun. The better you move, the higher your score. Count your steps each day. Measure your calories. Get reminders when you’re sitting too much. And let the Amazfit X nudge you towards a higher score for your health.

Amazfit X uses big data to know the leading predictors of longevity and good health. Its *Personal Activity Intelligence (PAI) gives you easy to understand assessments, helping you set and then crush your fitness goals. Over time the Amazfit X can help you raise your score, helping you create a healthier, more active life.

And the large 2.07-inch AMOLED screen lets you get a quick read on your heart rate and activity levels all in one glance, without scrolling. Because your health deserves to be front and center.

 

Your blood cells need the right balance of oxygen to keep you healthy. And to keep your mind sharp and alert. The Amazfit X uses an infrared light test to measure your *blood oxygen levels without pricking fingers.

 

Your day started last night. The Amazfit X can help you get the most out of your day with a great night’s sleep. With its curved design, you’ll barely notice the Amazfit X on your wrist as it follows you through the 4 stages of sleep: Light Sleep (Stages 1 and 2), Deep Sleep, and REM. It tracks you 24/7 to give you accurate, insightful data to help you understand and improve your sleeping patterns. The Amazfit X can even monitor your napping so that you can find the best time and length for that midday recharge.

Sleep better, improve performance, and be ready for your next big moment with Amazfit X.

 

The Amazfit X helps you stay stress-free. It monitors your heart rate throughout the day and will give you updates on where your stress levels are: Relaxed, Normal, Medium, and High. When stress levels are on the rise, the Amazfit X will be your hands-on indicator.

 

The watch takes on the responsibilities of a butler, proficiently handling your personal agendas, such as notifying incoming calls or messages and reminding you of sitting too long, not to mention calling for events and schedules.

 

Feel a world of smart design just below the surface. The Amazfit X responds to your touch with textured, natural vibrations, so your fingertips know they’re in control. It’s built with quality and precision from the inside out, like a finely crafted watch should be. Your fingertips will feel the difference. On top of the smart control, the watch is incorporated with multiple handy settings such as Do Not Disturb, nap mode, timer, stopwatch, wake-up alarms, and weather forecast. Your outings will be hassle-free and very well established.

 

With Amazfit X, your wrist becomes another canvas to express yourself. With customized watch faces, you can find themes to suit your personality, the season, or one that gets you in the holiday spirit. Choose a watch face that tracks your steps and measures your heart rate with a personal flair, or find one that goes big on fashion (a choice of 40+ widgets). The Amazfit X makes it simple to put more of yourself into your watch.

 

We offer a separate package of black watch bands consisting of one buckle-side band and two point-side bands (one ranges from 145mm~180mm and the other ranges from 162mm~205mm). As the watch bands are made of fluororubber, the material texture is soft and skin-friendly, which would be the best gear for sports as well as the most simplistic presentation according to most users’ profiles. This package can be purchased ONLY along with the watch unit(s). If you haven't placed your order, simply click the add-on option when you purchase. However, if you have already bought the device, you can place a separate order of this package on the campaign page. 

For more details to unscrew the buckle side, please refer to the video below: 

 

Huami is a cloud-based healthcare services provider with world-leading smart wearable technology. Since its inception in 2013, Huami has quickly established its global market leadership and recognition by shipping millions of units of smart wearable devices. In 2019, Huami shipped 42.3 million units of smart wearable devices. Huami has one of the largest biometric and activity databases in the global smart wearables industry. Huami's mobile apps work hand in hand with its smart wearable devices and provide users with a comprehensive view and analysis of their biometric and activity data.

 

 

Huami is constantly pushing limits on its journey to build the global healthcare ecosystem and the most trusted smart wearable provider to its users. This pursuit is indeed solidified by our self-brand Amazfit’s new product - Amazfit X Smartwatch. After years of technological advancements, Huami is proudly introducing the Amazfit X, a curved smartwatch with AMOLED extended display, 24/7 PPG heart-rate monitoring, self-developed AI technology, and PAI health analysis that performs both business and sports style.

The reason why we want to launch our product through crowdfunding is to firstly establish a tight connection with tech-seekers and then set up a worldwide community with first-hand feedback before officially stepping out into the market. Indiegogo platform happens to be the perfect channel as its community is full of open-minded and innovative individuals, willing to challenge the conventions and adopt the new concept, with which they are determined to engage until it becomes a reality. 

We are ready for production, as verified by Indiegogo. With over 100 million units shipped to its happy owners globally, we stand behind our products and supply chain with confidence and ensure 100% guaranteed delivery. The shipment will start in Octorber.

 

 

Amazfit X products have entered the mass production stage. As a global leader of smart wearables, we honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with the customers and we promise guaranteed delivery as an official team. Hence, with a 1-year warranty for the whole body and the charger and a 2-month warranty for the watch band from the day that you receive the product, you will always have our back.

 

 

The box comes with a whole watch unit, an additional watch band and a charger. We offer the additional band on the side with the band holes. The original band ranging from 145mm~180mm is installed readily on the watch, while the additional one wraps your wrist with a length at 162mm~205mm, which you can easily switch to upon discovering the other one being too tight. Whichever fits better, you can decide.

 

 

*7-Day Battery Life: Tests conducted in-lab, so battery life may vary according to usage, settings and other factors.

*BioTracker™​ PPG sensor: This is not a medical device and is not intended for use in the diagnosis or monitoring of any medical condition.

*5 ATM Water Resistance: Waterproofing is tested according to the GB/T 30106-2013 standard, and meets the 5 ATM atmospheric pressure waterproofing standard. The Amazfit X has passed testing by the National Watch Quality Supervision and Inspection Center.

*Blood Oxygen Measurement: This is not a medical device and is not intended for use in the diagnosis or monitoring of any medical condition.

*PAI (Personal Activity Intelligence): It is a science-backed health score, which measures the impact of your physical activity on your heart and guides you to a longer, healthier life. Back by Professor Ulrik Wisloff's HUNT Fitness Study (lasted 25 years and involved 45,000 participants), maintaining 100 PAI or more is scientifically proven to provide maximum protection from heart disease and other lifestyle diseases.

story:
Stay warm and comfortable at your preferred temperature!

Our wearables feature our proprietary system of built-in sensors that measure the temperature inside the wearable, regulate heat, and maintain your exact, preferred temperature down to the degree.

Our Integrated Smart Sense Apparel Control is capable of detecting component performance, such as heating and battery performance, and reporting technical issues, as well as acting on them. The devices can receive updates from our cloud through the app, so you can always stay up-to-date with our latest technology. Additionally, our electronics have been designed in such a way that prevents it from abusing the technology, even on purpose.

 

 Tap and connect your Quanta Vici Smart Wearables to your phone to:

  • See your wearables’ sensed temperature (C/F)
     
  • Set your desired temperature (up to 55℃ 130℉)
     
  • Voice Control
     
  • Estimated Battery Time Left
     
  • Access warranty check & support
     

Our app is secure through military-level encryption and will be available for both Android and iOS.

 

 

Stay Warm All Day!

On a single charge, Quanta Vici Smart Wearables can last up to 6.5 hours in cold conditions at the highest setting, or up to several days on the low heat setting. 

Easy, Fast Charging

Both the socks and gloves are easily and conveniently charged via USB-C.

Max Efficiency 

To maximize the efficiency of the battery use and for your optimal comfort, Quanta Vici's Smart Sense Apparel Control technology senses the inside temperature of the wearables to generate the exact amount of heat needed to maintain your desired temperature, down to the degree. 

Unlimited Battery Life

Need to charge on the go? No problem. Simply connect your portable power bank in the sock or glove to extend the battery life endlessly — the wearables can be safely used as they are charging!

 

Our team of industry-leading professionals brings experience from your favorite brands such as Adidas, Ralph Lauren, BMW, and even NASA to design beautiful, luxurious, and comfortable gloves and socks that will keep you warm throughout the day, without the bulky extra layers and cheap fabric.

True Dexterity

Our gloves are thin and lightweight, so they won't hinder any movements. They also feature an anti-slipping texture so you won't lose your grip.

 

With an IP67 waterproof rating, Quanta Vici Smart Wearables are waterproof to keep you warm no matter the weather!

The wearables are also machine washable for easy cleaning, but make sure to remove the rechargeable battery before washing.

No more nonsense low, medium, and high settings.

Quanta Vici Smart Wearables offer high-precision smart comfort so you can choose your exact temperature – up to 131°F (55°C)!

 

The heating fibers are carefully placed in Quanta Vici Smart Wearables, spread to cover all the sensitive areas of your hands and feet to provide even heat distribution at all times.

 

 

 

 

At Quanta Vici Inc. we design and produce go-to smart apparel solutions. Our goal is to create clothing that looks good, feels good and is high-functioning for everyday wear.

Our team at Quanta Vici Inc. consists of nearly 20 members and includes designers and engineers from brands like Adidas, BMW and Ralph Lauren. We have spent nearly four years developing Quanta Vici Smart Wearables and we’re super excited to help change people's lives with amazing, innovative technology that is functional, stylish and practical!

 

Note: The following demonstrates the countless rounds of iteration and prototyping until the final version came to life.

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Quanta Vici Smart Wearables a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order your own set of Quanta Vici Smart Wearables, if you’re a supporter of Quanta Vici Smart Wearables, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!
story_txt:
Unboxing Video
 

 
 
 
   

 Stay warm and comfortable at your preferred temperature!Our wearables feature our proprietary system of built-in sensors that measure the temperature inside the wearable, regulate heat, and maintain your exact, preferred temperature down to the degree.Our Integrated Smart Sense Apparel Control is capable of detecting component performance, such as heating and battery performance, and reporting technical issues, as well as acting on them. The devices can receive updates from our cloud through the app, so you can always stay up-to-date with our latest technology. Additionally, our electronics have been designed in such a way that prevents it from abusing the technology, even on purpose.  Tap and connect your Quanta Vici Smart Wearables to your phone to:
See your wearables’ sensed temperature (C/F) 
Set your desired temperature (up to 55℃ 130℉) 
Voice Control 
Estimated Battery Time Left 
Access warranty check & support 
Our app is secure through military-level encryption and will be available for both Android and iOS.  Stay Warm All Day!On a single charge, Quanta Vici Smart Wearables can last up to 6.5 hours in cold conditions at the highest setting, or up to several days on the low heat setting. Easy, Fast ChargingBoth the socks and gloves are easily and conveniently charged via USB-C.Max Efficiency To maximize the efficiency of the battery use and for your optimal comfort, Quanta Vici's Smart Sense Apparel Control technology senses the inside temperature of the wearables to generate the exact amount of heat needed to maintain your desired temperature, down to the degree. Unlimited Battery LifeNeed to charge on the go? No problem. Simply connect your portable power bank in the sock or glove to extend the battery life endlessly — the wearables can be safely used as they are charging! Full Video: Performance Comparison Time-Lapse
Spoiler Alert: Quanta Vici lasts multiple times longer! Our team of industry-leading professionals brings experience from your favorite brands such as Adidas, Ralph Lauren, BMW, and even NASA to design beautiful, luxurious, and comfortable gloves and socks that will keep you warm throughout the day, without the bulky extra layers and cheap fabric.True DexterityOur gloves are thin and lightweight, so they won't hinder any movements. Our goal is to create clothing that looks good, feels good and is high-functioning for everyday wear.Our team at Quanta Vici Inc. consists of nearly 20 members and includes designers and engineers from brands like Adidas, BMW and Ralph Lauren. We have spent nearly four years developing Quanta Vici Smart Wearables and we’re super excited to help change people's lives with amazing, innovative technology that is functional, stylish and practical! Note: The following demonstrates the countless rounds of iteration and prototyping until the final version came to life.

story:
Rokid Air AR glasses are powerful, intuitive and lightweight enough for daily use. Simply put them on to experience a huge 120'' virtual screen that provides an unprecedented, immersive, multimedia experience for apps, games, and movies. With voice control and advanced features, you can see more and do it all hands-free with Rokid Air.

 

Rokid Air is the most affordable AR Glasses created for everyone. With wide applications for business, study, and entertainment, you can see movies bigger than ever before, play games, or follow along with maps while hiking. In the kitchen, you can even create a gourmet meal with AR help as you follow along with your favorite recipes overlaid onto the real world view in front of you. Rokid Air unlocks infinite possibilities.

  • Play games
  • Video meeting
  • Watch movies
  • Follow the exercising tutorial 
  • Watch Immersive Videos

We are glad to invite Eddy, a gadget enthusiast to visit Rokid's headquarters in Hangzhou and try Rokid Air. Let's see how he uses Rokid Air to connect with an Android phone & MacBook and enjoys the immersive screen.

  • Connect with an Android phone and MacBook:
  •  What you'll see on Rokid Air:
  •  Always Stay Hands-Free 

Thanks to the noise-canceling microphone and voice recognition technology, Rokid Air can clearly pick up your voice commands. This built-in smart assistant is always ready to help and is highly capable of performing tasks. Ask Rokid Air to play videos, open installed applications, control volume and brightness, and more. 

  • No Wake Word, No Waiting

Ever find yourself wanting to replay an important movie scene or fast forward through a commercial but the remote isn’t at hand? With Rokid Air's voice detection you are in total control. Best of all, commands and responses are practically instant without the need to wait for a wake word. Nothing could be easier! 

Rokid Air is perfect for people who wear glasses. By turning the focus adjustment knobs, nearsighted users (myopia of -5.00 D or less) can achieve perfect vision. You don’t have to wear your prescription lenses or contacts anymore!

  • Turn Your Phone into a Touchpad

Unlike VR sets, Rokid Air has a new and powerful way for you to interact with its virtual screen. You don’t have to buy extra controllers to move the pointer. Your phone becomes a versatile touchpad after connecting with Rokid Air.

  • How to Use?

Tap to click, slide to control the pointer...It's as easy as operating your laptop's trackpad.

  • Touchpad Gestures - Beginner's Guide:
  • High Resolution

The 1920*1080*2 resolution that Rokid Air produces results in crisp details, vivid colors, and stunning visuals. You can run native resolution on most of your devices without any difficulty and with excellent display quality.

  • High Refresh Rate & Brightness

Rokid Air's 75Hz refresh rate means more information reaches your eyes in the same amount of time, leading to smoother-looking motion. It can indeed do wonders for gamers. Meanwhile, with the BirdBath optical engine, the brightness is up to 1800 nits, which allows Rokid Air to look bright and clear even on the sunniest of days.

  • Immersive 120'' Display

Rokid Air offers crisp images with a large FoV. It’s like watching a 120'' screen from just a few feet away! You will be impressed by the experience, especially as it overlays onto your real-world surroundings, allowing you to see both the real and virtual worlds while playing a video or viewing other content at the same time.

  • Immersive, But Private

Rokid Air lets you enjoy entertainment in your own private world anywhere and anytime. Anything on the screen is completely private and invisible to others from any angle so you can discretely enjoy your content in total privacy.

Rokid Air is super lightweight and extremely comfortable, enabling you to wear it for long periods of time. It's like a huge monitor that fits in your pocket and goes anywhere with you!

Rokid Air doesn’t need charging. The device to which it is tethered supplies the power so you can enjoy more content, games, movies and fun. It is widely compatible with all devices: Android & IOS phones, desktop computers & laptops, PS4, Xbox and Switch. Simply plug & play to see apps, videos and games in front of you rather than having to struggle to view them on a small device screen.

Add-On Items - Rokid Air Adapter:

  • What's In The Box
  •  Available For Two Colors:

With offices in San Carlos, California, and Hangzhou and Shenzhen, China, Rokid was founded in July of 2014. Rokid specializes in the research and product development of Augmented Reality, Artificial Intelligence and Robotics.

With its mission of “Leave Nobody Behind”, Rokid aims to provide superior industrial design and superlative user experience. Its products include Rokid Alien, Rokid Pebble, and Rokid Mini and Rokid Glass. And its product vision is to leverage the voice and vision AI technologies to create a smart assistant capable of improving the quality of daily life. Rokid's superior engineering and elegant design make its products essential family additions and personal assistants.

  • Our Partners

Sales consultants of Audi and other businesses are equipped with Rokid's glasses that enable them to establish an online connection, like live advice, with their customers via the Internet.

  • Rokid's Previou Version - Infrared Solutions

During the Covid-19 outbreak, Rokid added the infrared sensor to Rokid Glass 2. With this additional feature, Rokid Glass 2 can detect the temperatures of nearly 1000 people within 1 minute from 3 meters. The infrared sensor solution is useable in airports, schools, parks, workplaces, and other high-risk places.  It's the safest and most efficient anti-pandemic equipment.

 
  •  Rokid's Previou Version - X-Craft
  •  Rokid Air's Design

story:
Summary

Brand : FULLALOVE 

Fullalove Clothing Limited 

www.fullaloveclothing.com

We are a young entrepreneurial 100% sustainable ethical fashion brand based in Leicester U.K. founded by the incredibly talented, smart, driven and resilient 27-year old Millie Fullalove.

PROLOGUE : Fast fashion is a terrible polluter with non-biodegradable oil-based synthetic textiles that get burnt or stuck in landfills polluting our planet and fast fashion often takes advantage of workers with criminally low pay levels and appalling working conditions. 

 

 

BRAND FULLALOVE : Fullalove is the antithesis of fast fashion; we are slow fashion.  We value craftmanship; we use only organic sustainable fabrics and we treat workers with respect and dignity and pay them properly. We are totally transparent in all our operations and dealings. We design and construct on-trend beautiful fashion apparel which lasts for years and never goes out of fashion as great looks and styles don't! 

We have traded for just one year now; we started trading May 2020 as the pandemic gripped the world.

We have successfully raised GBP 150,000 to date via a mix of grants, debt and equity to launch the business which started to trade just 12 months ago.

We have definitely proven concept as we now trade over 100 orders per month comprising the sale of circa 200 wonderfully-styled and constructed  organic fashion apparel garments each month.

We have secured our ethical supply line which is our Sedex-registered UK-based factory which we visit every week and we know it treats its workforce with respect and dignity and pays a good fair weekly wage

We now need scale to get to profitability and to grow our trading volumes, we need additional funding to finance our working capital needs.

Our USPs 

  • Exquisite bold unique designs : Millie’ handwriting is highly distinctive and appealing 
  • On-trend styles and bold exotic patterns
  • Co-brand collaborations with shared-value artists : a significant driver of our sales success 
  • Luxurious fabrics : origins fully traceable 
  • High quality construction in our adjacent ethical Sedex-registered factory 
  • Affordable customer prices 
  • E-commerce super savvy 

 

Current Performance

We are now e-selling in excess of 100 orders each month, north of 250 garments each month, and growing our audiences of engaged followers and transacting shoppers. 

We have our own Sedex-registered cut, make and trim [CMT] factory also based in Leicester. 

 

Next Steps to Success

We now need to scale up to reach economic cash-flow profitability levels. 

Extra funding is required to widen the currently  narrow range of each of our amazing collections, we are forced to limit the number of styles per collection today due to our limited financial resources.

We must also widen our product distribution channels.

We need to invest further in brand-building marketing and sales campaigns on social media and search engines such a Google.

We have a small highly competent leadership team supporting our mega-talented creative designer and founder Millie Fullalove.  Millie has had a burning passion for fashion since she was 8 years old and deeply cares for people and our planet. Brand Fullalove is everything she lives and breaths for. She is incredibly talented and the kindest soul ever. We have pledged our lives on supporting her to help her realize her life' ambition. She is a rare talent with a wonderful human cause backed by raw unbridled passion, a deep care for people and steely determination to succeed and to make a difference to the lives of others and our beloved planet.

She also really loves styling too!

 

I, the author of this story, am Millie' business partner; I have worked for 35 years in business with American Express and then in the SME sector across SE Asia. Millie and I make for a perfect complementary partnership of exuberant talented youth and seasoned experience.

We are now attempting crowdfunding to secure the finances required to fuel our next stage growth.  Your contribution no matter how large or small, will help Millie realize her life' ambition. 

 

Funding Target

GBP 225,000 is our required funding for growth.

We need to raise GBP 225,000 in cash to fund our increased working capital needs to get business scale. Today we have circa 100 monthly orders and this number has to increase to close to 400 to get to profitability. We know we can do it but we need extra funds for  the following :-

In descriptive terms :-

•Finance our growth plans to get scale

•Fund expansion of product range; more styles per collection

•Build brand awareness; increase our social following and foster deep engagement

•Continue to invest in consultative experts to master all aspects of e-commerce especially addressing the needs of visitors to our virtual store along every step and stage of their initial discovery, learning, trust-gaining, value-based engagement  and then finally online shopping.

•Further expand our sales and distribution channels

•Fund 3 key new personnel hires : design + logistics + grading specialist

•Fund the purchase of a grading machine system - Vetigraph : GBP 20,000

•Secure a 2nd Sedex-registered ethical factory outlet

 

In precise financial terms:-

 

The Resultant Impact

The business will get to cash-flow breakeven at GBP 20,000 sales revenue per month and we will achieve that and then move beyond.

On a personal note, Millie' life  is 100% committed to make a positive difference to other people and our planet; she lives and breaths these genuine intentions and possesses a deep desire to make a positive difference and to create and develop a successful fashion business brand

She is a wonderful human being with a caring soul and a massive commitment to people and our planet.   She is an incredibly talented fashion apparel designer.

She is a becoming a savvy young entrepreneur who understands that no one individual can do it alone and has surrounded herself with winning team of fine complimentary talents.

I have backed Millie for the last 12 month. I have worked every day on brand Fullalove all pro bono [no monetary compensation]  as I want to help her realize her life' ambitions. She is a rare talent and she is determined and these two factors taken together with financial resources will lead to success. 

I have put my money where my mouth is with a GBP 50,000 cash commitment from me into the business. Please now join me and make your contribution too.

No amount is too large or too small.

I have total belief in Millie and brand Fullalove ; both will succeed. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Yes, there are challenges and risks that lay ahead but we are quietly confident we can overcome these. 

We can grow our loyal followers to the size they need to be. Six months ago, we had 2000 store visitors each month and now we have 8000. We are growing our transacting customers by a minimum of 80 per month. We have 25% repeat shoppers.  Millie can design hundreds of eye-catching beautiful designs. We are becoming smarter by the day in all matters e-commerce from organic SEO to Google Paid ads and social media marketing. We are expanding our distribution channels beyond just the UK and presently display our products in NYC Manhattan in-store and online and similarly across Spain too.

We know there are risks; but, we can meet them head-on and overcome them.

We have rich experience in successfully dealing with problems and solving them, with our never-say-can't attitude and perseverance. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to make a financial contribution, no worries. Please instead, get the word out  about brand Fullalove. Please spread the word as far and wide as you can. Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so very much for reading this, our story and our mission in life. 

 

FOOTNOTE : a terrible experience and near-miss

Back in February this year, we were approached by an octogenarian Thai philanthropist and environmentalist who expressed his desire to invest in such benevolent sustainable causes as ours as part of his life legacy. He expressed fine ethical values and a genuine desire to now give back to others the wealth he had earned and accumulated during his long and successful life.  After almost three months of relationship building, information sharing, discussions and negotiations, we finally reached an agreement for him to invest a significant six figure amount into brand Fullalove. Millie and I were absolutely elated, really on cloud 9!

Then, right at the very last minute with agreements signed, bank of Thailand approvals obtained for overseas funds investments and with the said funds ready to be transferred to us, the truth became apparent. This entire interaction spanning three months  was actually a highly professional cyber scam. They went for the "sting" telling us that to get the funds released from Thailand, we would have to pay a GBP 25,000 fee into to Thailand. At that moment, the alarm bells rang and we realized the sad truth. We were about to be the victim of a highly professional cyber crime. Luckily, we avoided being stung but we had lost almost 90 days on this fallacious endeavor. 

It was a horrible experience for Millie and me both, but we learned from it and here we are now fully recovered and excited to be live with our very first crowdfunding campaign. 

We are hopeful for a positive outcome...please.
